Swedish: Aya, den blixtrande violen, tillhör en familj som har tjänat militären och polisen i flera generationer. Familjens kännetecknande kampstil är en gammal, enhänt svärdhållning med fokus på snabbhet och precision.
Turkish: Mor Yıldırım Aya, nesillerdir askeriyeye ve adalete hizmet eden bir ailenin çocuğu olarak dünyaya geldi. Aileye özel dövüş tarzı, eşi benzeri olmayan bir hız ve isabet yeteneğiyle kılıcın tek elle kullanılmasına dayanan kadim bir gelenektir.
Portuguese: Aya, a Violeta Lampejante, nasceu em uma família que serve às forças armadas e à polícia há gerações. O estilo de luta característico da família é o antigo uso de uma lâmina com apenas uma mão, com foco na velocidade inigualável e na precisão extrema.

English_Translator: Gulbrand the Destroyer travelled far from the cold country, in search of a new land to claim for his nomadic people. Gulbrand will use his destructive blade to raze the land and drive out its inhabitants, creating a new home for his warrior tribe. He is known by many names across the lands — Some call him "Frost Demon", while others say "Ice Giant", but in this land they simply call him, "Invader." The warriors of this land are flashy, loud and arrogant, but it does not save them on the battlefield. Their blood would run ice cold from fear of the Invader. The soothsayers had told Gulbrand of this land, that it was fertile and would lead to an age of prosperity for their people. He planned to make this their permanent home and put an end to the long, hard travel that his people are forced to constantly endure. Gulbrand's raiding parties were prepared to strike from all angles and, with superior tactics, would have the advantage. This, however, was before tragedy struck. Grulbrand watched as his people were torn from him by a colossal, grinning Titan. Gulbrand now carries on as his people always have, forced into an alliance with the very people whose homeland he planned to take for his own.
English: Gulbrand the Destroyer travelled far from the cold country, in search of a new land to claim for his nomadic people. Gulbrand will use his destructive blade to raze the land and drive out its inhabitants, creating a new home for his warrior tribe. He is known by many names across the lands — Some call him "Frost Demon", while others say "Ice Giant", but in this land they simply call him, "Invader." The warriors of this land are flashy, loud and arrogant, but it does not save them on the battlefield. Their blood would run ice cold from fear of the Invader. The soothsayers had told Gulbrand of this land, that it was fertile and would lead to an age of prosperity for their people. He planned to make this their permanent home and put an end to the long, hard travel that his people are forced to constantly endure. Gulbrand's raiding parties were prepared to strike from all angles and, with superior tactics, would have the advantage. This, however, was before tragedy struck. Grulbrand watched as his people were torn from him by a colossal, grinning Titan. Gulbrand now carries on as his people always have, forced into an alliance with the very people whose homeland he planned to take for his own.
ChineseTrad: 毀滅者哥爾布蘭德從寒冷國度長途跋涉，為的就是替他的游牧同胞奪取一塊新土地。哥爾布蘭德會用他極具破壞性的刀夷平土地並趕走土地上的居民，為他的戰士部落創造一個新家。
ChineseSimp: 毁灭者古尔布兰德远离他的寒冷故土，为他的游牧民族寻找新的土地。古尔布兰德会使用他的破坏之刃来夷平土地，将上面的居民赶走，为他的战斗部落打造一个新的家园。
Japanese: 破壊者ガルブランドは、仲間である流浪の民を引き連れ、凍てつく国から新天地を求めてはるばるやってきました。ガルブランドは彼とその戦闘部族の新たな住まいを得るために、破壊力抜群の大剣をふるって先住者を追い払います。
Korean: 파괴자 굴브랜드는 유목민 부족이 차지할 새로운 땅을 찾기 위해 추운 지방으로부터 멀리 떠나왔습니다. 굴브랜드는 강력한 검을 휘둘러 대지를 휩쓸고 주민들을 쫓아내 자신의 부족을 위한 새 보금자리를 마련할 것입니다.
Danish: Barbaren Gulbrand har rejst langt og længe fra det kolde nord i håbet om at erobre et nyt land til sit nomadiske folk. Gulbrand vil svinge sin dødbringende klinge over landet for at drive borgerne på flugt og skabe et nyt hjem til sine krigere.
Dutch: Gulbrand de vernietiger heeft ver gereisd vanuit het koude land in zijn zoektocht naar een nieuw land dat hij voor zijn nomadenvolk kon opeisen. Gulbrand gebruikt zijn vernietigende zwaard om het land met de grond gelijk te maken en de inwoners te verdrijven om zo een nieuwe thuisbasis voor zijn krijgerstam te creëren.
French: Gulbrand, le destructeur, a parcouru un long chemin depuis sa froide contrée à la recherche d'une nouvelle terre pour son peuple nomade. Pour offrir un nouveau foyer à sa tribu guerrière, il n'hésitera pas à tout raser et à chasser les actuels habitants à l'aide de son épée destructrice.
German: Gulbrand, der Zerstörer, ist von weit her aus dem kalten Land gekommen, als er nach neuem Land für sein nomadisch lebendes Volk suchte. Gulbrand wird seine vernichtende Klinge dazu nutzen, das Land zu zerstören, seine Bewohner zu vertreiben und eine neue Heimat für seinen Kriegerstamm zu schaffen.
Italian: Gulbrand, Distruttore, si è ormai allontanato molto dalle lande gelate, da cui è partito alla ricerca di una nuova terra che il suo clan nomade potesse chiamare casa. Gulbrand usa la propria spada distruttrice per spazzare via ogni cosa e far fuggire le popolazioni sul suo cammino, in modo da trovare una casa alla sua tribù.
Norwegian: Gulbrand ødeleggeren reiste helt fra det gamle landet på leting etter et nytt landområde til sitt nomadefolk. Han herjer og driver folk på flukt med sin dødelige klinge for å skape et nytt hjem for krigerstammen sin.
Russian: Галбрэнд Разрушитель путешествовал вдали от холодной страны в поисках новых земель для своего народа кочевников. Галбрэнд готов опустошить страшным мечом чужие земли и прогнать их обитателей, чтобы создать новый дом для своего племени воинов.
Spanish: Gulbrand el Destructor ha recorrido las Tierras Glaciales en busca de un lugar donde asentarse con su pueblo nómada. Gulbrand usa su espada para ahuyentar a los habitantes de cualquier lugar y lo usurpa para su tribu guerrera.
Swedish: Gulbrand, förintaren, har rest långt från det kalla landet på jakt efter en ny plats att erövra åt sitt nomadfolk. Gulbrand använder sitt förödande svärd för att rasera landet och driva ut dess invånare för att skapa ett nytt hem åt sin krigarstam.
Turkish: Yok Edici Gulbrand, soğuk ülkeden uzaklaşarak göçebe halkının sahiplenebileceği yeni bir arazi aramaya başladı. Gulbrand, araziyi yok etmek ve sakinlerini kovmak, böylece savaşçı kabilesine yeni bir yuva oluşturmak için yok edici kılıcını kullanır.
Portuguese: Gulbrand, o Destruidor, viajou bastante desde as terras glaciares, em busca de uma nova terra para reivindicar para seu povo nômade. Gulbrand usa sua lâmina destruidora para devastar a terra e expulsar seus habitantes, criando um novo lar para sua tribo guerreira.

English_Translator: Rhys, Mage of Order Evetga is a quiet and observant boy. Although meek and easily frightened, he was allowed into the Order due to the immense magical power that lies dormant within him. When fueled by his emotions, he is able to harness an incredible amount of magical energy without exhausting himself. This untapped potential only manifests itself in times of dire need, and terrible danger. The goal of the Order was to help Rhys unlock his true potential and control these dangerous abilities, but they had failed to achieve success in their endeavour. The high elders of the Order have decided to allow Rhys to travel outside the academy in hopes that in the vastness of their world, he will find someone, or something, that will teach him what they could not. Rhys, though fearful, will always try his best to do the right thing. He hopes to find great and powerful spellcasters to study under and train with in order to hone his abilities.
English: Rhys, Mage of Order Evetga is a quiet and observant boy. Although meek and easily frightened, he was allowed into the Order due to the immense magical power that lies dormant within him. When fueled by his emotions, he is able to harness an incredible amount of magical energy without exhausting himself. This untapped potential only manifests itself in times of dire need, and terrible danger. The goal of the Order was to help Rhys unlock his true potential and control these dangerous abilities, but they had failed to achieve success in their endeavour. The high elders of the Order have decided to allow Rhys to travel outside the academy in hopes that in the vastness of their world, he will find someone, or something, that will teach him what they could not. Rhys, though fearful, will always try his best to do the right thing. He hopes to find great and powerful spellcasters to study under and train with in order to hone his abilities.
ChineseTrad: 伊芙特加教團法師里斯是個安靜、觀察力敏銳的男孩。儘管溫順又易受驚嚇，他仍然因體內潛藏著強大魔力而被特准加入教團。
ChineseSimp: 伊维塔教团法师里斯是个谨守教规的安静小伙子。他虽然很温顺，也容易受惊吓，但他体内沉睡着巨大的魔法力量，所以他被允许加入教会。
Japanese: イヴェトガ教団の魔道士リースは物静かで観察力の鋭い少年です。おとなしく怖がりなところのある彼ですが、強大な魔力を秘めているために教団への加入を認められました。
Korean: 에베트가 교단의 마법사, 라이즈는 조용하고 주의 깊은 소년입니다. 라이즈는 온순하고 쉽게 겁을 먹지만, 내면에 잠재한 엄청난 마법 능력으로 인해 교단으로의 입회가 허가됐습니다.
Danish: Troldmanden Rhys fra Evetga-ordnenen er en stille og observerende dreng. Selvom han er svag og nemt bliver skræmt, blev han optaget i ordenen på grund af de umådeligt store magiske kræfter, han bærer på.
Dutch: Rhys, magiër van de Evetga-orde is een rustige en oplettende jongen. Hoewel hij zachtmoedig is en snel bang wordt, mocht hij toetreden tot de orde vanwege de immense magische kracht die in hem sluimert.
French: Rhys, le mage d'Evetga, est un garçon taciturne et observateur. Chétif et peu assuré, il a pourtant pu intégrer l'ordre grâce à l'immense pouvoir magique qui sommeille en lui.
German: Rhys, der Magier vom Orden Evetga, ist ein ruhiger und aufmerksamer Junge. Obwohl er demütig und leicht einzuschüchtern ist, erlaubte man ihm wegen der in ihm schlummernden immensen magischen Kräfte den Beitritt zum Orden.
Italian: Rhys, Mago dell'ordine Evetga, è un ragazzo tranquillo e ben educato. Pur essendo abbastanza remissivo e pusillanime, l'immenso potere magico che giace latente in lui gli aprì le porte dell'Ordine.
Norwegian: Rhys, Evetga-ordenens mage, er en stillferdig og observant gutt. Selv om han er både svakelig og lettskremt, ble han tatt inn i ordenen på grunn av de utrolige magiske kreftene som bor i ham.
Russian: Риз, маг ордена Эветга - тихий и наблюдательный паренек. Чересчур мягкий и пугливый, он попал в орден благодаря таящейся в нем безмерной магической силе.
Spanish: Rhys, el mago de la Orden Evetga, es un muchacho callado y observador. Pese a ser tímido y asustadizo, ha sido aceptado en la orden gracias al inmenso poder mágico que yace latente en él.
Swedish: Rhys, trollkarl av Evetgaorden, är en tyst och uppmärksam pojke. Han är beskedlig och lättskrämd, men släpptes in i orden på grund av den enorma magiska kraft som vilar inom honom.
Turkish: Evetga Tarikatı Büyücüsü Rhys sessiz ve dikkatli bir çocuktur. Tedirgin ve çabuk korkan bir kişiliğe sahip olmasına rağmen içinde saklı duran muhteşem büyü gücü nedeniyle Tarikata kabul edilmiştir.
Portuguese: Rhys, Mago da Ordem Evetga, é um garoto calado e observador. Apesar de ser dócil e de assustar-se facilmente, foi aceito na Ordem graças ao imenso poder mágico que tem adormecido em seu íntimo.

English_Translator: Kiki the Dragon Rider was born to ride untamable beasts. She is the first human to befriend the terrifying dragons, gaining their respect and allowed to ride atop one. One usually-menacing dragon is now a trusted steed and companion under Kiki's gentle guidance. As a child, Kiki was told to stay away from the deadly dragons that resided in the Dragon Clearing, but she would still secretly slip away in the mornings to watch the majestic creatures from afar. Kiki was always amazed seeing these legendary creatures walking right before her very eyes, so she would hide behind large rocks while watching them and dreamed of one day befriending them all. One morning, while walking through the Emerald Forest, Kiki stumbled upon a strange oval-shaped rock on the ground. Curious, she picked it up and examined its oddly smooth surface. Her eyes widened and she let out a sharp squeal when she realized what she had found. Kiki held in her hands a dragon egg. Panicked, she made a bonfire and placed the egg in the center, keeping the flame burning strong for several hours. Later that day, Kiki watched in amazement as a baby dragon emerged from the egg, untouched by the flames that danced around it. That day and every day after, she cared for the dragon and loved it with all her heart. She dubbed her tiny, winged treasure, Jade. Kiki could tell that Jade liked her new name and as the hatchling grew, she began responding to Kiki's calls and showing off with tricks. As Jade grew larger, Kiki was able to escape to the sky on the back of her dragon, just as she had always dreamed. Kiki and Jade decided to leave their home to learn more about each other and in search for other dragon riders.
English: Kiki the Dragon Rider was born to ride untamable beasts. She is the first human to befriend the terrifying dragons, gaining their respect and allowed to ride atop one. One usually-menacing dragon is now a trusted steed and companion under Kiki's gentle guidance. As a child, Kiki was told to stay away from the deadly dragons that resided in the Dragon Clearing, but she would still secretly slip away in the mornings to watch the majestic creatures from afar. Kiki was always amazed seeing these legendary creatures walking right before her very eyes, so she would hide behind large rocks while watching them and dreamed of one day befriending them all. One morning, while walking through the Emerald Forest, Kiki stumbled upon a strange oval-shaped rock on the ground. Curious, she picked it up and examined its oddly smooth surface. Her eyes widened and she let out a sharp squeal when she realized what she had found. Kiki held in her hands a dragon egg. Panicked, she made a bonfire and placed the egg in the center, keeping the flame burning strong for several hours. Later that day, Kiki watched in amazement as a baby dragon emerged from the egg, untouched by the flames that danced around it. That day and every day after, she cared for the dragon and loved it with all her heart. She dubbed her tiny, winged treasure, Jade. Kiki could tell that Jade liked her new name and as the hatchling grew, she began responding to Kiki's calls and showing off with tricks. As Jade grew larger, Kiki was able to escape to the sky on the back of her dragon, just as she had always dreamed. Kiki and Jade decided to leave their home to learn more about each other and in search for other dragon riders.
ChineseTrad: 龍騎士琦琪生來就是要騎乘未馴服的野獸。她是第一個和可怕的龍成為朋友的人類，而且贏得龍族的尊敬並獲准騎乘龍。
ChineseSimp: 龙骑士琪琪天生会乘骑无法驯服的野兽。她是第一个与可怕的龙友好相处的人类，她赢得了它们的尊重，获许骑在它们上头。
Japanese: 竜と駆けるものキキは野獣を乗りこなす才能をもって生まれました。恐ろしいドラゴンと友達になり、その背に乗ることを許されるほど認められた人間は彼女が初めてです。
Korean: 용의 기수, 키키는 야수를 길들이는 능력이 천부적입니다. 키키는 무시무시한 용들과 친구가 되어 호의를 얻고 올라탈 자격을 얻은 최초의 인간입니다.
Danish: Drageridderen Kiki er født til at ride på utæmmelige bæster. Hun er det første menneske, der er blevet venner med de frygtindgydende drager og har vist sig værdig nok til at ride på dem.
Dutch: Kiki de drakenrijdster is geboren om op ontembare beesten te rijden. Ze is de eerste mens die vrienden werd met de angstaanjagende draken, hun respect verdiende en boven op een draak mocht zitten.
French: Kiki Chevauche-dragon est, comme son nom l'indique, née pour chevaucher ces indomptables bêtes. Elle fut la première humaine à se lier d'amitié avec les terrifiants dragons. Après avoir gagné leur respect, elle reçut alors le grand honneur d'en chevaucher un.
German: Kiki, die Drachenreiterin, wurde geboren, um unzähmbare Bestien zu reiten. Sie ist der erste Mensch, der sich mit den schrecklichen Drachen anfreundete, sich ihren Respekt verdienen konnte und schließlich auf einem davon reiten durfte.
Italian: Kiki, Cavalcadraghi, è nata per domare anche le bestie più feroci. È la prima umana a essere diventata amica dei terribili draghi, ad aver guadagnato il loro rispetto e... a essere salita in sella a uno di essi!
Norwegian: Dragerytteren Kiki er født til å ri på utemmelige beist. Hun er det første mennesket som har klart å bli venn med de fryktede dragene. Ikke bare har hun vunnet deres respekt, men hun har også fått lov til å ri på en av dem.
Russian: Кики Укротительница Драконов была прирожденной всадницей, которой покорялись самые бешеные скакуны. Она стала первой из людей, кому удалось подружиться с ужасными драконами, заслужить их уважение и право стать наездницей.
Spanish: Kiki la Cabalgadragones estuvo destinada desde la cuna a montar bestias indomables. Fue la primera humana capaz de trabar amistad con dragones espeluznantes. Se ganó su respeto y estos la dejaron cabalgarlos.
Swedish: Kiki, drakryttaren, föddes för att rida på otämjbara odjur. Hon är den första människan som blivit vän med de skräckinjagande drakarna och fått rida på en.
Turkish: Ejderha Binici Kiki, evcilleştirilemeyen canavarlara binmek için doğdu. Korkunç ejderhalarla arkadaş olan ilk insan olarak bu canavarların saygısını ve onlara binecek kadar güvenini kazanmıştır.
Portuguese: Kiki, a Amazona de Dragões, nasceu para cavalgar criaturas selvagens. Ela é o primeiro humano a criar laços de amizade com os terríveis dragões, conquistando o respeito deles e recebendo permissão para cavalgá-los.

English_Translator: Lala Quickshot knows nothing about her past and sometimes feels as if her body moves on its own accord. The shot from her bow is so quick and precise that it often even catches Lala by surprise. Lala awoke one day in a strange, foreign land with nothing but her bow and quiver. Her only memories are fragmented and unclear: a palace high up in the mountains; a great battle... her people were losing; a wish... What did they mean? How did she learn how to shoot so well and how did she get to this place? As she wandered in search of answers, she began calling herself Lala when a traveller demanded her name. It was the first thing that popped into her head. Others would call her "Quickshot," due to her unmatched speed and accuracy with a bow. Lala is determined to regain her lost memories and find out the truth about her past.
English: Lala Quickshot knows nothing about her past and sometimes feels as if her body moves on its own accord. The shot from her bow is so quick and precise that it often even catches Lala by surprise. Lala awoke one day in a strange, foreign land with nothing but her bow and quiver. Her only memories are fragmented and unclear: a palace high up in the mountains; a great battle... her people were losing; a wish... What did they mean? How did she learn how to shoot so well and how did she get to this place? As she wandered in search of answers, she began calling herself Lala when a traveller demanded her name. It was the first thing that popped into her head. Others would call her "Quickshot," due to her unmatched speed and accuracy with a bow. Lala is determined to regain her lost memories and find out the truth about her past.
ChineseTrad: 快箭拉菈對自己的過往一概不知，有時她會覺得彷彿身體自己動了起來。從她的弓射出的箭是如此快速又精準，經常連拉菈自己都很驚訝。
ChineseSimp: 快箭手拉拉对自己的过去一无所知，有时感觉好像她的身体会自发地行动。她的弓射出的箭是如此快速而精准，经常让拉拉本人也感到吃惊。
Japanese: 過去の記憶を失ってしまった早撃ちのララ。しかし時としてその身体は無意識のうちに動きます。彼女の弓から放たれる矢はあまりに速く正確で、ララ自身が驚かされるほどです。
Korean: 속사수 라라는 자신의 과거를 전혀 모르며 때로는 몸이 저절로 움직이는 경우도 있습니다. 라라가 쏜 화살은 매우 빠르고 정확해 라라 자신조차도 자주 놀랍니다.
Danish: Lala Hurtigskytte ved intet om sin fortid og har det nogle gange, som om hendes krop bevæger sig rundt af egen lyst. Pilene fra hendes bue bliver affyret så hurtigt og præcist, at hun selv kan blive overrasket.
Dutch: Lala Snelschot weet niets over haar verleden en soms heeft ze het gevoel alsof haar lichaam uit zichzelf beweegt. Het schot van haar boog is zo snel en precies dat zelfs Lala er soms door wordt verrast.
French: Lala Presteflèche ignore tout de son passé et, parfois, son corps semble se mouvoir de son propre chef. Ses flèches sont tellement précises qu'elle-même en est parfois prise au dépourvu.
German: Lala Schnellschuss weiß nichts über ihre Vergangenheit und manchmal fühlt es sich so an, als würde sich ihr Körper aus eigenem Antrieb bewegen. Sie schießt so schnell und präzise mit ihrem Bogen, dass sie manchmal selbst von sich überrascht ist.
Italian: Lala, Tiro infallibile, non ha ricordi del proprio passato e, a volte, ha la sensazione che il suo corpo si muova senza seguire gli ordini della mente. Infatti, i colpi che partono dal suo arco sono talmente veloci e precisi che spesso la stupiscono!
Norwegian: Lala Hurtigpil vet ingenting om fortiden sin, og av og til føles det som om kroppen hennes beveger seg av seg selv. Hun avfyrer buen sin så raskt og presist at hun til og med blir overrasket selv iblant.
Russian: Лала Скорострел ничего не знает о своем прошлом. Порой может показаться, что ее тело движется само по себе. Выстрелы из ее лука настолько быстры и точны, что могут застигнуть врасплох даже саму Лалу.
Spanish: Lala Ojobala no sabe nada de su pasado. A veces, siente que su cuerpo se mueve por iniciativa propia. Cada flecha que dispara se mueve de forma tan rápida que hasta Lala se queda impresionada.
Swedish: Lala, snabbskytten, vet inget om sitt förflutna, och ibland känns det som att hennes kropp rör sig av sig själv. Ett skott från hennes båge är så snabbt och pricksäkert att Lala själv blir förvånad ibland.
Turkish: Hızlı Nişancı Lala geçmişiyle ilgili bir şey bilmemektedir ve bazen bedeninin onun kontrolü dışında hareket ettiğini düşünür. Okunu öyle hızlı ve isabetli atar ki zaman zaman Lala'nın bizzat kendisini bile şaşırtır.
Portuguese: Lala Tiro-rápido não sabe nada do seu passado e algumas vezes acha que seu corpo se move sozinho. O tiro do seu arco é tão rápido e preciso que muitas vezes pega Lala de surpresa.

English_Translator: Boomoh Doctor awoke one night in a cold sweat, gripping his chest. Grabbing his staff, he gazed out the window of his hut and felt the looming presence of the Old One across the night sky. Made of dust and starlight, the awakening of the Old One meant that terrible evils were roaming the lands. Boomoh's tribe was created to help the Old One, but as centuries passed, many of the tribe migrated to towns and cities, eventually losing their powers. As one of the few with remaining magical abilities, Boomoh knew that it was now time to leave and fulfill his duties - Boomoh must search for the Old One to help with its fight. He walked into the next hut and took a long look at his children and grandchildren peacefully sleeping. He did not know how long he would be away from his beloved family but wanted to remember every detail of their faces before embarking on his journey. As the early signs of dawn touched the windows, he gathered his things quietly and left on his search to help the Old One restore peace to the world, while hoping to one day to see the happy faces of his family again.
English: Boomoh Doctor awoke one night in a cold sweat, gripping his chest. Grabbing his staff, he gazed out the window of his hut and felt the looming presence of the Old One across the night sky. Made of dust and starlight, the awakening of the Old One meant that terrible evils were roaming the lands. Boomoh's tribe was created to help the Old One, but as centuries passed, many of the tribe migrated to towns and cities, eventually losing their powers. As one of the few with remaining magical abilities, Boomoh knew that it was now time to leave and fulfill his duties - Boomoh must search for the Old One to help with its fight. He walked into the next hut and took a long look at his children and grandchildren peacefully sleeping. He did not know how long he would be away from his beloved family but wanted to remember every detail of their faces before embarking on his journey. As the early signs of dawn touched the windows, he gathered his things quietly and left on his search to help the Old One restore peace to the world, while hoping to one day to see the happy faces of his family again.
ChineseTrad: 布莫醫生緊抓胸口、一身冷汗地醒來。他拿起杖，望向外頭的夜晚。如果古神甦醒，就表示可怕的惡魔們正在大地上漫遊。布莫遂開始尋找古神，要協助祂的戰鬥。
ChineseSimp: 布莫医生在冷汗中醒来，抓着他的胸口。他抓起手杖，凝视着黑夜。如果旧神觉醒了，这意味着大地上现在弥漫着可怕的邪恶力量。布莫寻找旧神，协助其战斗。
Japanese: 癒し手ブーモーは冷や汗をかき、胸を締め付けつつ目覚めました。そして杖を手に取り、夜空を見上げました。古きものが覚醒したのだ...ということはおそろしい悪がうごめいているに違いない。ブーモーは古きものを捜し、その戦いに加勢する決意をしました。
Korean: 의사 부머는 식은땀에 젖은 채 가슴을 부여잡으며 잠에서 깼습니다. 부머는 지팡이를 짚으며 밤하늘을 내다보았습니다. 고대의 존재가 깨어났다면, 지금 끔찍한 악마들이 대지를 배회한다는 뜻이었습니다. 부머는 고대의 존재를 찾아 전투를 돕기로 합니다.
Danish: Doktor Boomoh vågnede i koldsved midt om natten og tog sig til brystet. Han greb fat om sin stav og stirrede ud i natten. Hvis Den Ældste var vågnet, måtte det betyde, at en frygtelig ondskab havde fundet vej ind i landet. Boomoh leder efter Den Ældste for at hjælpe i kampen mod det onde.
Dutch: Dokter Boomoh werd badend in het zweet wakker en greep naar zijn borst. Hij pakte zijn staf en staarde de nacht in. Als de Ouwe is ontwaakt, dan betekent dit dat er een vreselijk kwaad door het land struint. Boomoh gaat op zoek naar de Ouwe om hem in het gevecht bij te staan.
French: Docteur Boomoh s'est réveillé en sueur en se tenant le torse. Empoignant son bâton, il a sondé la nuit du regard. Si le Grand Ancien s'était réveillé, c'est que de terribles fléaux écumaient maintenant la contrée. Pour l'aider dans son combat, Boomoh est ainsi en quête du Grand Ancien.
German: Doktor Buhmuh wachte in kaltem Schweiß gebadet auf. Er schnappte sich seinen Stab und starrte in die Nacht hinaus. Falls der Alte erwacht wäre, würde das bedeuten, dass das Land nun von schrecklichem Bösen heimgesucht würde. Buhmuh sucht nach dem Alten, um ihm in seinem Kampf beizustehen.
Italian: Boomoh, Guaritore, si svegliò una notte madido di sudore, tenendosi il petto. Prese il suo bastone e fissò lo sguardo nel buio. Se l'Antico si era svegliato, allora orrori indicibili erano liberi di seminare il panico in ogni continente. Boomoh è alla ricerca dell'Antico e intende aiutarlo nella sua lotta.
Norwegian: Doktor Boomoh våknet med kaldsvette og tok seg til brystet. Han grep tak i staven sin og så ut i natten. Hvis Den gamle hadde våknet, betydde det at en grusom ondskap nå var på ferde. Boomoh leter etter Den gamle – for å hjelpe ham med kampen.
Russian: Бумох Лекарь проснулся в холодном поту, схватившись за грудь. Взяв в руки посох, он взглянул в ночное небо. Если Старейший проснулся, то это означает одно: ужасное зло теперь на свободе. Бумох ищет Старейшего, чтобы помочь его одолеть.
Spanish: El doctor Boomoh se despertó empapado en sudor frío y agarrándose el pecho. Cogió su báculo y escudriñó la oscuridad. Si el Antiguo se hubiera despertado... la tierra se vería invadida por horrores. Boomoh busca al Antiguo para que lo asista en su lucha.
Swedish: Boomoh, läkaren, vaknade kallsvettig och höll om bröstet. Han greppade sin stav och såg ut i natten. Om den gamla hade vaknat innebar det att fruktansvärd ondska härjade i landet nu. Boomoh söker efter den gamla för att hjälpa dess kamp.
Turkish: Doktor Boomoh, soğuk terler içinde, eli göğsünde uyandı. Asasını kavrayarak gecenin karanlığında ileri baktı. Kadim Kişi uyandıysa, artık korkunç kötülükler dünyada kol geziyor demekti. Boomoh, yardım etmek için Kadim Kişiyi arar.
Portuguese: Doutor Boomoh acordou suando frio, agarrando o peito. Pegando seu bastão, fitou a noite. Se o Antigo estava acordado, isso significaria que um mal terrível estava vagando pelas terras. Boomoh procura pelo Antigo, para ajudar na sua luta.

English_Translator: Wally, a powerful magician, once performed spells that could destroy entire cities. However, due to Wally's arrogance with these powers, half of his strength was sealed away by the Great Council. Wally was further sentenced to travel the land and perform good deeds to fuel the magical jewel embedded into his staff. Teased by young magicians of one town, Wally made the brash decision of attempting to perform a forbidden dark spell to prove his strength to the hecklers. Wally only made it half way through the incantation before a member of the Great Council stopped him. For his actions, Wally would be tried by the Council an almost assuredly punished for them. When asked his excuse for engaging in forbidden magic, Wally defensively lied that he was merely trying to banish a creature that another magician had summoned as a spectacle. The council, angered by his arrogance, decided upon a punishment that would teach Wally some much-needed humility. In the months afterwards, Wally continued to travel the land, once again performing small good deeds. However, Wally found that no matter how many good deeds he performed, the jewel on the staff would not change. While resting in a small village one day, an injured bear broke through the wall of his hut, holding a small, unconscious bird and calling for help. Wally, though confused, healed the peculiar pair, hoping to fill the jewel. After they had recovered, the two apologized for the intrusion and told Wally that they would be on their way. Wally, concerned for the health of the two creatures, decided to follow them in case they got themselves into even worse trouble. Unbeknownst to him, the jewel in his staff glimmered with a small twinkle as they set out on a new journey.
English: Wally, a powerful magician, once performed spells that could destroy entire cities. However, due to Wally's arrogance with these powers, half of his strength was sealed away by the Great Council. Wally was further sentenced to travel the land and perform good deeds to fuel the magical jewel embedded into his staff. Teased by young magicians of one town, Wally made the brash decision of attempting to perform a forbidden dark spell to prove his strength to the hecklers. Wally only made it half way through the incantation before a member of the Great Council stopped him. For his actions, Wally would be tried by the Council an almost assuredly punished for them. When asked his excuse for engaging in forbidden magic, Wally defensively lied that he was merely trying to banish a creature that another magician had summoned as a spectacle. The council, angered by his arrogance, decided upon a punishment that would teach Wally some much-needed humility. In the months afterwards, Wally continued to travel the land, once again performing small good deeds. However, Wally found that no matter how many good deeds he performed, the jewel on the staff would not change. While resting in a small village one day, an injured bear broke through the wall of his hut, holding a small, unconscious bird and calling for help. Wally, though confused, healed the peculiar pair, hoping to fill the jewel. After they had recovered, the two apologized for the intrusion and told Wally that they would be on their way. Wally, concerned for the health of the two creatures, decided to follow them in case they got themselves into even worse trouble. Unbeknownst to him, the jewel in his staff glimmered with a small twinkle as they set out on a new journey.
ChineseTrad: 瓦利，一名強大的魔法師，曾經有能力施放足以摧毀整座城的強大咒語。然而，由於瓦利傲慢地使用能力，他的部分力量被大議會下令封印。
ChineseSimp: 强大的魔法师瓦利曾经能使用咒语毁灭整个城市。但由于瓦利自大地滥用力量，大理事会下令封印他的一部分力量。
Japanese: 強力な魔術師であるワリーは、かつて町全体を破壊できるほどの呪文を操ることができました。しかし力に溺れ慢心したワリーは、大評議会によって力の一部を封印されてしまいました。
Korean: 강력한 마술사, 월리는 한때 모든 도시를 파괴할 정도의 주문을 다룰 수 있었습니다. 하지만 능력을 오만하게 사용한 까닭에 월리의 힘은 대의회의 명령으로 일부가 봉인됐습니다.
Danish: Den mægtige magiker Wally kunne engang fremtrylle besværgelser, der var stærke nok til at rasere hele byer. Men Det Store Råd straffede hans arrogance ved at fjerne en stor del af hans evner.
Dutch: Wally, een machtige tovenaar, kon ooit bepaalde spreuken hanteren waarmee hij hele steden kon vernietigen. Maar vanwege zijn arrogante gebruik van zijn macht, werd de kracht van Wally gedeeltelijk vergrendeld in opdracht van de Grote Raad.
French: Wally, un puissant magicien, pouvait autrefois lancer des sorts capables de détruire des villes entières. Mais à force de le voir utiliser son pouvoir avec arrogance, le Grand Conseil ordonna que sa magie soit partiellement scellée.
German: Wally, ein mächtiger Magier, konnte mit seinen Zaubern einst ganze Städte vernichten. Wegen der arroganten Verwendung seiner Kräfte wurde Wallys Kraft jedoch auf Befehl vom Großen Rat teilweise versiegelt.
Italian: Un tempo, il potente mago Wally era in grado di lanciare incantesimi la cui potenza avrebbe potuto distruggere intere città. Tuttavia, a causa dell'arroganza con cui utilizzò i suoi poteri, essi furono parzialmente sigillati per ordine del Gran consiglio.
Norwegian: Wally er en mektig trollmann som i glansdagene kunne ødelegge hele byer med sine trylleformularer. Men fordi han misbrukte trolldommen sin, ble kraften i den svekket på ordre fra Storrådet.
Russian: Уолли, могущественный чародей, когда-то был способен уничтожать заклинаниями целые города. Однако его самонадеянность привела к тому, что Великий Совет отобрал у него часть этой силы.
Spanish: Wally es un poderoso mago que en el pasado fue capaz de destruir ciudades enteras con su magia. Sin embargo, el Gran Consejo no vio con buenos ojos sus abusos de poder y le arrebató parte de su fuerza.
Swedish: Wally, en mäktig magiker, kunde en gång utföra besvärjelser som kunde utplåna städer. Men på grund av hans arroganta maktmissbruk låstes Wallys styrka delvis undan av det stora konsiliet.
Turkish: Kuvvetli bir büyücü olan Wally bir zamanlar koca koca kentleri yerle bir eden büyüler yapmaktaydı. Ancak gücünü küstahça kullandığından, Wally'nin gücünün bir kısmı Büyük Konsey tarafından mühürlenmiştir.
Portuguese: Wally, um poderoso mágico, já foi capaz de executar feitiços que poderiam destruir cidades inteiras. Entretanto, devido ao seu arrogante uso do poder, sua força foi parcialmente removida por ordem do Grande Conselho.

English_Translator: Nohni the Spearit was once nothing but an empty vessel, a neutral being neither good nor evil. One fateful day, Nohni's peaceful home became flooded with dark thoughts and malicious intent, turning this once shapeless being into a faceless shadow warrior. The spear Nohni holds is its emotional pain manifested into a physical form. Nohni was shaped by anger and pain, causing it to lash out at all without any reason or remorse. The once peaceful spirit that dwells inside Nohni does not wish to harm others, but due to the twisted corruption of its malleable form, now acts on the only emotions it knows: Hate. Pain. Anger. The only thing that can stop Nohni is a creature with an equally strong spirit.  Whoever can defeat Nohni in battle will become its new master, able to change the only actions Nohni knows: Fight. Destroy. Kill. Nohni slowly absorbs the intentions of its master and can grow to become either kind or even more vile. Nohni was one day defeated by a terrified mage who, in his fear, unleashed incredibly powerful magic from within himself. Since then, Nohni began to follow the small mage on his journey: Afraid. Master. Friend.
English: Nohni the Spearit was once nothing but an empty vessel, a neutral being neither good nor evil. One fateful day, Nohni's peaceful home became flooded with dark thoughts and malicious intent, turning this once shapeless being into a faceless shadow warrior. The spear Nohni holds is its emotional pain manifested into a physical form. Nohni was shaped by anger and pain, causing it to lash out at all without any reason or remorse. The once peaceful spirit that dwells inside Nohni does not wish to harm others, but due to the twisted corruption of its malleable form, now acts on the only emotions it knows: Hate. Pain. Anger. The only thing that can stop Nohni is a creature with an equally strong spirit.  Whoever can defeat Nohni in battle will become its new master, able to change the only actions Nohni knows: Fight. Destroy. Kill. Nohni slowly absorbs the intentions of its master and can grow to become either kind or even more vile. Nohni was one day defeated by a terrified mage who, in his fear, unleashed incredibly powerful magic from within himself. Since then, Nohni began to follow the small mage on his journey: Afraid. Master. Friend.
ChineseTrad: 茅魂諾尼曾經是個空花瓶。他是無關善惡的中立性存在。諾尼和平的家園被黑暗的想法與惡意淹沒，將這原本未成形的存在變成一名無面的闇影戰士。
ChineseSimp: 矛灵诺尼曾经只是一个空虚的躯壳。一个既不好也不坏的中立存在。诺尼原本平静的家园被邪念和恶意席卷了，使这个原本无形的存在成为了一个没有面孔的影子战士。
Japanese: 槍の精霊ノーニの本質はいわば『空』でした。善でも悪でもない中立の存在だったのです。しかし平和だったノーニの故郷が疑念と悪意に満たされ、かつて形状を持たなかったこの存在は、顔を持たない影の戦士と化したのでした。
Korean: 영혼의 창, 노니는 한때 단지 빈 그릇이었습니다. 선도 악도 아닌 중립적인 존재였습니다. 평화로웠던 노니의 안식처가 어두운 생각과 사악한 의도로 범람하자 이 무형의 존재는 얼굴 없는 어둠의 전사로 변했습니다.
Danish: Åndemageren Nohni var engang blot en tom beholder. Et neutralt væsen, som hverken var godt eller ondt. Nohnis engang så fredelige hjem blev oversvømmet af dystre tanker og ondsindede planer, hvilket forvandlede dette formløse væsen til en ansigtsløs skyggekriger.
Dutch: Nohni de speergeest was ooit niet meer dan een leeg omhulsel. Een neutraal wezen dat goed noch slecht was. Het ooit vredige huis van Nohni werd overschaduwd door donkere gedachten en kwaadaardige bedoelingen, waardoor dit ooit vormeloze wezen veranderde in een gezichtsloze schaduwkrijger.
French: Nohni, l'esprit de la lance, n'était d'abord rien de plus qu'une coquille vide. Un être neutre, ni bon ni mauvais. Puis son foyer jusqu'alors paisible fut envahi de songes sinistres et d'intentions malveillantes, qui transformèrent cet être immatériel en un guerrier des ombres sans visage.
German: Nohni, der Speergeist, war einst nichts mehr als ein leeres Gefäß. Ein neutrales Geschöpf, das weder gut noch böse war. Das einst friedliche Heim Nohnis wurde schließlich mit düsteren Gedanken und bösen Absichten überflutet, wodurch sich das formlose Geschöpf zu einem gesichtslosen Schattenkrieger verwandelte.
Italian: Nohni, Spirito della lancia, era un tempo un libro dalle pagine completamente bianche: una creatura neutrale, né buona né cattiva. Tuttavia, un giorno la pacifica terra natale di Nohni fu invasa da pensieri maligni e da ideologie mortali. Fu questo a trasformare una creatura un tempo senza forma in un guerriero dell'ombra senza volto.
Norwegian: Spydånden Nohni var en gang i tiden en ubetydelighet. Et nøytralt vesen som verken var godt eller ondt. Men så ble Nohnis en gang så fredelige hjem oversvømt av mørke tanker og onde hensikter, noe som forvandlet dette tidligere formløse vesenet til en ansiktsløs skyggekriger.
Russian: Нохни Дуух когда-то был пустым сосудом. Нейтральным созданием, не служившим ни добру, ни злу. Однажды тихий дом Нохни наводнили темные мысли и злые намерения, превратив это бесформенное существо в безликого теневого воина.
Spanish: Nohni el lancero en su día no era más que un ente vacío; un ser neutral, sin maldad ni bondad. Su pacífico hogar se vio invadido de pensamientos perversos y malicia, lo que convirtió a un ser indefinido en un sombrío guerrero sin cara.
Swedish: Nohni, spjymfen, var en gång bara ett tomt kärl: en neutral varelse, varken ond eller god. Nohnis en gång fridfulla hem översvämmades av mörka tankar och illvilja vilket gjorde denna en gång formlösa varelse till en ansiktslös skuggkrigare.
Turkish: Mızrak Ruhu Nohni bir zamanlar boş bir kabuktan ibaretti. Varlığı ne iyi ne de kötüydü. Nohni'nin bir zamanlar huzur içindeki yuvası karanlık düşünceler ve kötü niyetle bozuldu, o biçimsiz varlığı bir gölge savaşçıya dönüştürdü.
Portuguese: Nohni, o Espírito-Lança, já foi um simples vaso vazio. Um ser neutro que não era nem bom nem mau. O lar antes pacífico de Nohni foi inundado por pensamentos obscuros e intenções malignas, transformando este ser sem forma em um guerreiro sem rosto das sombras.

English_Translator: Kin the Puffy Beast is known by many as "The Wish Granter." It listens to hear strongest desires of others and grants their wishes. However, wishes granted by this cute beast come at a price — with each gift, Kin takes something most precious from the wisher. Kin's conditions for wish-granting include that the wisher be on the brink of death, posess a strong heart, and have something precious that they hold dear. So that it can be taken as payment, of course. Kin spends his days happily wandering the land in search of people to "help." Kin needs to keep finding people. Keep taking their things. One day it will meet the only other of its kind — and it cannot come empty-handed. Kin will keep "granting wishes," and someday, meet the Prince again. But Kin is no rush - it will take his time to find his friend. Kin needs more presents for him anyway.
English: Kin the Puffy Beast is known by many as "The Wish Granter." It listens to hear strongest desires of others and grants their wishes. However, wishes granted by this cute beast come at a price — with each gift, Kin takes something most precious from the wisher. Kin's conditions for wish-granting include that the wisher be on the brink of death, posess a strong heart, and have something precious that they hold dear. So that it can be taken as payment, of course. Kin spends his days happily wandering the land in search of people to "help." Kin needs to keep finding people. Keep taking their things. One day it will meet the only other of its kind — and it cannot come empty-handed. Kin will keep "granting wishes," and someday, meet the Prince again. But Kin is no rush - it will take his time to find his friend. Kin needs more presents for him anyway.
ChineseTrad: 許多人都知道胖怪獸金是「使願望成真者」。牠會聽取他人最強烈的渴望並讓他們的願望成真。然而，這可愛怪獸讓願望成真是要收取代價的，每成真一個願望，金就會從許願者那裡拿走某樣重要的東西。
ChineseSimp: 很多人把蓬蓬兽阿金叫做"愿望实现者"。它会听取别人最强烈的渴望，并满足他们的愿望。然而，这个可爱的野兽实现愿望是有价的。每给予一件礼物，阿金都会从许愿的人那里拿走某件珍贵的东西。
Japanese: ぽよぽよ獣キンは「願いを叶えるもの」として知られています。キンは人の願望を聞き、もっとも強い願いを叶えるのです。しかしこの愛らしい獣への願掛けには代償があります。願いを叶えるたびに、キンはその人物から大切なものを奪い去るのです。
Korean: 통통한 야수, 킨은 많은 이들에게 "소원"을 들어주는 야수로 알려져 있습니다. 킨은 사람들의 열망에 귀를 기울이고 소원을 들어줍니다. 하지만 이 귀여운 야수가 들어준 소원에는 대가가 따릅니다. 소원을 들어줄 때마다 킨은 소원을 빈 사람으로부터 소중한 무언가를 빼앗습니다.
Danish: Kin det Uldne Bæst bliver ofte omtalt som "Ønskegiveren". Bæstet kan høre andre væsners stærkeste ønsker og opfylder dem. Men ikke uden at opkræve betaling. Kin tager noget værdifuldt fra alle væsner, hvis ønsker den opfylder.
Dutch: Kin het zwelmonster wordt door velen "De Wensenvervuller" genoemd. Het luistert naar de sterkste verlangens van anderen en vervult hun wensen. Maar er moet een prijs worden betaald voor de wensen die door dit schattige beestje worden verleend. Met elke vervulde wens pakt Kin iets kostbaars af van diegene die de wens heeft gedaan.
French: Beaucoup connaissent Kin, le monstre-ballon, sous le nom du "génie des souhaits". Il tend l'oreille pour entendre les plus grands désirs d'autrui et les réalise. Hélas, chaque souhait exaucé par ce mignon animal a son prix : à chaque cadeau, Kin prend quelque chose de précieux au destinataire.
German: Kin, die aufgeblasene Bestie, ist vielen als der „Wunschgewährer“ bekannt. Sie hört anderen zu, um ihre dringendsten Wünsche zu erfahren und sie zu gewähren. Trotzdem haben die von dieser süßen Bestie erfüllten Wünsche einen Preis – mit jedem Geschenk nimmt Kin dem Wünschenden etwas Wertvolles weg.
Italian: Kin, Bestia rigonfia, è nota ai più come "Colui che esaudisce i desideri". Si mette all'ascolto dei desideri più profondi di chi gli sta accanto per esaudirli. Tuttavia, i desideri esauditi da questa adorabile bestiolina hanno un prezzo: a ogni desiderio, Kin si prende un oggetto prezioso di chi l'ha espresso e se lo porta via con sé.
Norwegian: Klumpbeistet Kin er for mange kjent som «ønskeoppfylleren». Han hører på de som har de sterkeste ønskene, og oppfyller dem. Men å få sitt ønske oppfylt har sin pris – for Kin tar nemlig noe verdifullt tilbake fra ønskeren.
Russian: Кин, тучный зверь, более известен как "Дарующий желания". Он выслушивает самые заветные желания других, чтобы потом их исполнить. Однако милый зверь требует свое: за каждый подарок он забирает у загадавшего что-нибудь ценное.
Spanish: Kin, la bestia hinchada, es un animal a quien muchos llaman "Concedesueños". Es capaz de sentir los deseos más fervientes de la gente y concedérselos. Pero todo tiene un precio y, por cada deseo que concede, la adorable bestia se lleva algo muy valioso para la persona.
Swedish: Kin, puffbesten, kallas av många för "önskeuppfyllaren". Den lyssnar för att höra andras starkaste önskningar och uppfyller dem. Men önskningar som den här söta besten uppfyller kommer till ett pris: för varje gåva tar Kin något värdefullt från önskaren.
Turkish: Pofuduk Canavar Kin, kimileri tarafından "Dilek Cini" olarak bilinir. Başkalarının güçlü tutkularını dinler ve dileklerini yerine getirir. Ancak bu tatlı canavarın yerine getirdiği dileklerin bir bedeli var: Kin, her verdiği hediye karşılığında dilek sahibinden değerli bir şeyini alır.
Portuguese: Kin, a Criatura Fofa, é conhecido por muitos como “O concessor de desejos”. Ele ouve para saber os desejos mais intensos dos outros e os concede. Entretanto, os desejos que esta fofa criatura concede têm um preço: para cada presente, Kin toma algo precioso daquele que o desejou.

English_Translator: Zolom Blaster crash-landed on a planet, stranded with nothing but his star shooter. His mission was to survey the planet and either deem it a suitable part of the solar system, or sentence it to be destroyed. After the crash, his mission directives now include finding compatible parts to repair his broken ship. Zolom walked for what felt like lightyears until he came upon an alien civilization. Unfortunately, Zolom's communicator was damaged in the crash and couldn't understand a word these aliens said - File that under the "reasons-I-destroyed-this-planet" section of the mission archives. As Zolom explored Soon-To-Be-Exploded-Ville, he came across a droid that appeared to be scanning everything in sight. As an act of good faith, Zolom decided to download whatever data the droid had gathered to better understand the place. After what felt like nanoseconds, Zolom finally decoded the alien language and began going through the data to try and better understand this strange, not-yet-blown-up world. In the data, Zolom stumbled across reports of several other large extraterrestrials running rampant on the planet, terrorizing the humanoids that lived there. It seems that these so-called "Titans" were worth investigating, and possibly exploding. It was probably best to keep the droid nearby, in case he needed it for more information.
English: Zolom Blaster crash-landed on a planet, stranded with nothing but his star shooter. His mission was to survey the planet and either deem it a suitable part of the solar system, or sentence it to be destroyed. After the crash, his mission directives now include finding compatible parts to repair his broken ship. Zolom walked for what felt like lightyears until he came upon an alien civilization. Unfortunately, Zolom's communicator was damaged in the crash and couldn't understand a word these aliens said - File that under the "reasons-I-destroyed-this-planet" section of the mission archives. As Zolom explored Soon-To-Be-Exploded-Ville, he came across a droid that appeared to be scanning everything in sight. As an act of good faith, Zolom decided to download whatever data the droid had gathered to better understand the place. After what felt like nanoseconds, Zolom finally decoded the alien language and began going through the data to try and better understand this strange, not-yet-blown-up world. In the data, Zolom stumbled across reports of several other large extraterrestrials running rampant on the planet, terrorizing the humanoids that lived there. It seems that these so-called "Titans" were worth investigating, and possibly exploding. It was probably best to keep the droid nearby, in case he needed it for more information.
ChineseTrad: 爆破者佐羅姆墜毀在一顆星球上，除了他的滅星槍什麼也不剩。他的任務是調查星球並評估星球是否適合作為太陽系的一部分，還是判決星球應被摧毀。墜毀後，現在他的任務指令包含找到適合的零件來修理壞掉的太空船。
ChineseSimp: 佐龙·布拉斯特的飞船坠毁在一个星球上，他身上除了星之枪外别无他物。他的任务是调查这个星球，判断它是合适太阳系，还是应该被摧毁。在坠毁后，他的任务指令现在包括找到兼容的零件，好修复他坏掉的飞船。
Japanese: ある星に不時着したゾロムブラスター。所持品はスターライフル一丁のみでした。彼の任務は惑星を調査し、それがその星系にふさわしい存在か破壊すべき存在かを判断することでした。不時着した今、壊れた宇宙船を修理するためのパーツ探しも彼の任務に加わりました。
Korean: 조롬 블라스터는 한 행성에 불시착해 비행선을 제외하고는 아무것도 없이 곤경에 처했습니다. 조롬의 임무는 행성을 조사하고 그곳이 태양계에서 적합한 곳인지 파괴해야 할 곳인지 판정하는 것이었습니다. 불시착 이후, 이제 조롬의 임무 내용에는 호환 부품을 찾아 부서진 비행선을 수리하는 것도 포함됩니다.
Danish: Zolom Blaster nødlandede på en planet og strandede uden andre ejendele end sin stjerneskyder. Hans mission gik ud på at besigtige planeten for at vurdere, hvorvidt det var en brugbar del af solsystemet, eller om det var bedre at sprænge den i luften. Efter styrtet er hans mission blevet udvidet til også at inkludere reparationen af sit rumskib.
Dutch: Zolom Blaster stortte neer op een planeet, strandde er en had alleen zijn sterrenwapen nog. Zijn missie was om de planeet te onderzoeken en vervolgens te beslissen of het een geschikt onderdeel van het zonnestelsel was of dat het naar zijn oordeel moest worden vernietigd. Na zijn crash bestonden zijn missiedoelen nu ook uit het vinden van compatibele onderdelen om zijn kapotte ruimteschip te repareren.
French: Zolom Blaster s'est écrasé sur une planète, armé uniquement de son pistolaser. Sa mission consistait à effectuer un repérage de la planète pour déterminer si elle pouvait faire partie du système solaire ou s'il fallait la détruire. Après le crash, ses directives de mission consistent aussi à trouver des pièces compatibles pour réparer son vaisseau.
German: Zolom Blaster ist auf einem Planeten abgestürzt, woraufhin ihm nur noch sein Star-Shooter blieb. Seine Mission bestand darin, den Planeten zu untersuchen und ihn entweder als wertvollen Teil des Sonnensystems einzuschätzen oder seine Zerstörung anzuordnen. Nach seinem Absturz umfasst sein Missionsbefehl nun auch die Suche nach passenden Teilen für die Reparatur seines kaputten Schiffs.
Italian: Zolom Blaster è precipitato su un pianeta senza altra compagnia se non quella del proprio incrociatore spaziale. Era stato incaricato di sorvegliare il pianeta e giudicare se fosse adatto a diventare una parte abitabile del sistema solare... o se dovesse essere distrutto. A seguito dell'incidente, la sua missione è diventata quella di trovare pezzi di ricambio compatibili per riparare la propria nave.
Norwegian: Sprenge-Zolom krasjlandet på en planet og ble sittende fast der uten annet enn stjernepistolen sin. Oppdraget hans var å kartlegge planeten for å finne ut om den var en verdifull del av solsystemet eller om den skulle ødelegges. Etter krasjen må han nå også finne deler til å reparere skipet sitt med.
Russian: Золом Бластер потерпел крушение на планете, сохранив лишь свой звездострел. Его миссией было осмотреть планету и либо признать ее достойной частью солнечной системы, либо приговорить к уничтожению. После крушения к его приказам добавился поиск подходящих запчастей для ремонта поврежденного корабля.
Spanish: Zolom Blaster acabó en este planeta por culpa de un aterrizaje de emergencia, con su pistola de estrellas como única arma. Su misión consistía en explorar el planeta y dictaminar si este merecía ser preservado en el sistema solar o si era preferible destruirlo para siempre. Tras el aterrizaje, las directivas de la misión incluían encontrar partes compatibles para reparar su nave.
Swedish: Zolom Blaster kraschlandade på en planet, strandsatt med bara sin stjärnskjutare. Hans uppdrag var att undersöka planeten och avgöra om den var lämplig i solsystemet eller måste förstöras. Efter kraschen innebär hans uppdrag nu också att hitta kompatibla delar för att laga sitt trasiga skepp.
Turkish: Zolom Blaster kazara bir gezegene düştü ve yıldız silahıyla bir başına kaldı. Görevi, gezegeni incelemek ve güneş sisteminde elverişli bir yuva mı yoksa yok edilmesi gereken bir kara parçası mı olduğuna karar vermekti. Kazadan sonra kırık gemisini onarmak için uygun parçalar bulmak da görevleri arasına girdi.
Portuguese: Zolom Blaster caiu em um planeta provido de nada além do seu atirador de estrelas. Sua missão era explorar o planeta e verificar se era uma parte adequada do sistema solar ou sentenciá-lo à destruição. Após a queda, as ordens de sua missão agora incluem encontrar peças compatíveis para consertar sua nave quebrada.

English_Translator: Princess Titania of Fay is the daughter of the Fay King and Queen, and a descendant of the Great Fay of olde. Despite being so young, Titania displays the power and wisdom of the Golden Fay folk that hide within their impenetrable fortess. Being the sole heir to the Fay throne, Titania sometimes grows frustrated with how long she must wait to ascend as the leader of her people. The Fay are near immortals that live deep within the Sacred Forest. Their secluded home has allowed their people to enjoy thousands of years of peace and prosperity. Bored with the politics within the royal court, Titania yearns to leave the gilded walls of the Fay castle and help those outside. One day, a royal from outside the wall pleaded to the King and Queen for their aid in finding something dear that had been taken from him. Titania felt pity for the royal and stepped forward as volunteer to assist them with their plight. The King and Queen were baffled, but conceded when they saw the fire in their daughter's eyes. A look of relief passed over the royal as the King and Queen gave their approval. As each layed a gentle kiss on their daughter's cheek, the King and Queen handed her the Starry Wand, a powerful artifact that would focus her power and remind all of her noble lineage.
English: Princess Titania of Fay is the daughter of the Fay King and Queen, and a descendant of the Great Fay of olde. Despite being so young, Titania displays the power and wisdom of the Golden Fay folk that hide within their impenetrable fortess. Being the sole heir to the Fay throne, Titania sometimes grows frustrated with how long she must wait to ascend as the leader of her people. The Fay are near immortals that live deep within the Sacred Forest. Their secluded home has allowed their people to enjoy thousands of years of peace and prosperity. Bored with the politics within the royal court, Titania yearns to leave the gilded walls of the Fay castle and help those outside. One day, a royal from outside the wall pleaded to the King and Queen for their aid in finding something dear that had been taken from him. Titania felt pity for the royal and stepped forward as volunteer to assist them with their plight. The King and Queen were baffled, but conceded when they saw the fire in their daughter's eyes. A look of relief passed over the royal as the King and Queen gave their approval. As each layed a gentle kiss on their daughter's cheek, the King and Queen handed her the Starry Wand, a powerful artifact that would focus her power and remind all of her noble lineage.
ChineseTrad: 費伊的泰坦妮亞公主是費伊國王與皇后的女兒，以及偉大老費伊的後裔。儘管泰坦妮亞非常年輕，她依舊展現出堅不可破堡壘之中的黃金費伊子民應有的力量與智慧。
ChineseSimp: 仙子公主泰坦尼娅是仙子国王和王后的女儿，也是古老伟大仙子的后代。在仙子坚不可破的城堡里隐藏着金色仙子一族。虽然泰坦尼娅很年轻，但她显露着与金色仙子族人一脉相承的力量和智慧。
Japanese: フェイの姫君タイタニアはフェイ国王夫妻の娘にしていにしえのフェイ大王の子孫です。まだ幼いタイタニアですが、黄金のフェイの民が難攻不落の要塞に蓄積した力と知恵を体現しています。
Korean: 페이의 티타니아 공주는 페이 왕과 여왕의 딸이며, 위대한 고대 종족 페이의 후예입니다. 어린 나이에도 불구하고 티타니아는 난공불락의 요새 안에서 은거하는 고대 종족 페이의 능력과 지혜를 드러냅니다.
Danish: Prinsesse Titania af Fay er datter af kongen og dronningen af Fay og efterkommer af den mægtige Fay den Ældre. Selvom hun er ung, har Titania allerede lige så mange kræfter og er lige så vis som det gyldne Fay-folk, der skjuler sig i deres uindtagelige fæstning.
Dutch: Prinses Titania van Fay is de dochter van de koning en koningin van Fay, en een afstammeling van de Grote Fay van eertijds. Ondanks dat ze zo jong is, bezit Titania de macht en de wijsheid van het gouden volk van Fay dat zich in hun ondoordringbare fort verschuilt.
French: La princesse Titania des Fées est la fille du roi et de la reine des Fées, ainsi que la descendante de la grande Fée d'antan. Malgré son jeune âge, Titania fait montre du pouvoir et de la sagesse des Fées d'or qui se cachent dans leur forteresse impénétrable.
German: Feenprinzessin Titania ist die Tochter des Feenkönigs und seiner Frau und eine Nachfahrin der einstigen Großfee. Trotzdem sie noch so jung ist, erkennt man bei Titania schon deutlich die Stärke und die Weisheit des Goldfeenvolks, das sich in seiner uneinnehmbaren Festung versteckt.
Italian: Titania, Principessa delle fate, è figlia del Re e della Regina delle fate, ed è l'erede delle Grandi fate di un tempo. Nonostante sia molto giovane, Titania sente già scorrere in sé tutto il potere e la saggezza del popolo di Fatadorata, che si nasconde all'interno di un'impenetrabile fortezza.
Norwegian: Prinsesse Tatania er datter av kongen og dronningen av Fay og etterkommer av oldtidens Store-Fay. Selv om hun er ung, har Titania vist seg å ha både kraften og visdommen som skjuler seg i Fay-folkets ugjennomtrengelige fort.
Russian: Принцесса Титания де Фэй - дочь короля и королевы Фэй, а также потомок великого древнего рода Фэй. Несмотря на молодость, Титания уже способна демонстрировать силу и мудрость своего народа, который прячется за стенами неприступной крепости.
Spanish: La princesa Titania es la hija de los reyes de Fay y descendiente de un linaje repleto de figuras gloriosas. A pesar de su corta edad, la joven Titania da muestras de un poder y una sabiduría dignos de los seres dorados de Fay que se esconden en una fortaleza impenetrable.
Swedish: Älvprinsessan Titania är dotter till älvdrottningen och älvkungen, och ättling till den stora älvan. Trots sin ungdom är Titania lika stark och vis som guldälvorna i sitt ogenomträngliga fort.
Turkish: Fay Prensesi Titania, Fay Kralı ve Kraliçesinin kızıdır ve Büyük Fay'in soyundan gelmektedir. Genç yaşına rağmen Titania, kuvvetli kalelerinin içinde saklanan Altın Fay halkının gücüne ve hikmetine sahiptir.
Portuguese: A Princesa Titânia de Fay é filha do Rei e da Rainha Fay e uma descendente do Grande Fay de outrora. Apesar de ser tão jovem, Titânia tem o poder e a sabedoria do povo Golden Fay que se esconde por trás de sua fortaleza impenetrável.

English_Translator: Maya Muerta the Watcher is the blessed child of the Goddess of Death. Her powers grow stronger in times of great strife but, as of late, they have begun to grow uncontrollably. Due to her irrepressible power, Maya spends her time meditating in order to ensure that she does not harm those around her. Maya, through her deep connection to her mother, would act as a prophetess of the Goddess and often recieve visions from her. The Goddess manifested herself through Maya's dreams until one night, as a grave prophecy was unfolding before her, the Goddess' voice was silenced. Even though she was the Guardian of her village, Maya was forced to leave when the power in her wand became frenzied and insurgent. Unable to return to her home, Maya wandered the land aimlessly, fearing she would never again have the Goddess' voice to guide her. One day, while asleep, she heard a soft, gentle voice whisper, "The great seer, find her." Whoever this seer was, Maya knew that it was her only hope to regain control of her powers and once again hear the voice of her Goddess. Perhaps, after this meeting, she could finally go home…
English: Maya Muerta the Watcher is the blessed child of the Goddess of Death. Her powers grow stronger in times of great strife but, as of late, they have begun to grow uncontrollably. Due to her irrepressible power, Maya spends her time meditating in order to ensure that she does not harm those around her. Maya, through her deep connection to her mother, would act as a prophetess of the Goddess and often recieve visions from her. The Goddess manifested herself through Maya's dreams until one night, as a grave prophecy was unfolding before her, the Goddess' voice was silenced. Even though she was the Guardian of her village, Maya was forced to leave when the power in her wand became frenzied and insurgent. Unable to return to her home, Maya wandered the land aimlessly, fearing she would never again have the Goddess' voice to guide her. One day, while asleep, she heard a soft, gentle voice whisper, "The great seer, find her." Whoever this seer was, Maya knew that it was her only hope to regain control of her powers and once again hear the voice of her Goddess. Perhaps, after this meeting, she could finally go home…
ChineseTrad: 旁觀者馬雅．慕爾塔是蒙死亡女神祝福的孩子。她的力量在動盪中變得越來越強，但最近力量開始不受控制地成長。她以冥想度日，以確保不會傷害到身邊的人。
ChineseSimp: 守望者玛雅·穆塔是被死亡女神祝福的孩子。她的力量在大冲突时期开始变强，但近来它的增长已开始不受控制。她把时间花在冥想上，以免伤害她周围的人。
Japanese: 見守るものマヤムエルタは死の女神の寵児です。彼女の力は騒乱の時代になると強まるのですが、このところ制御不能なまでに大きくなりつつあります。彼女は瞑想して力を鎮め、周囲の人々を傷つけまいとしています。
Korean: 파수꾼, 마야 무에트라는 죽음의 여신에게 축복받은 아이입니다. 마야의 힘은 큰 전투에서 더 성장하는데 최근 들어 걷잡을 수 없을 정도로 성장하기 시작했습니다. 마야는 절대로 주변 사람들에게 해를 끼치지 않기 위해 명상을 하며 시간을 보냅니다.
Danish: Vogteren Maya Muerta er det velsignede barn af Dødens Gudinde. Hendes kræfter vokser sig stærkere, når der er ufred i verden, men på det seneste er de begyndte at vokse med ustyrlig fart. Hun mediterer for ikke at gøre skade på dem, hun omgiver sig med.
Dutch: Maya Muerta de wachter is het gezegende kind van de Godin des Doods. Haar krachten worden groter in tijden van grote tegenspoed, maar de laatste tijd zijn ze ongecontroleerd gaan groeien. Ze brengt haar tijd door met mediteren om ervoor te zorgen dat ze haar naasten geen schade berokkent.
French: Maya Muerta, la guetteuse, est l'enfant béni de la déesse de la Mort. Ses pouvoirs s'accroissent en temps de conflit, mais depuis quelque temps, ils augmentent de façon incontrôlable. Elle passe son temps à méditer pour éviter de nuire à son entourage.
German: Die Wächterin Maya Muerta ist die Tochter der Göttin des Todes. Zu Zeiten großer Konflikte wachsen ihre Kräfte, aber seit Neuestem ist deren Wachstum unkontrollierbar geworden. Sie verbringt ihre Zeit mit Meditationen, um ihrem Umfeld keinen Schaden zuzufügen.
Italian: Maya Muerta, Osservatrice, è la figlia prediletta del dio della morte. I suoi poteri aumentano durante le epoche più conflittuali; ultimamente, sono cresciuti a dismisura e fatica a controllarli. Passa il suo tempo immersa in meditazione, per essere certa di non ferire o uccidere coloro che le stanno intorno.
Norwegian: Maya Muerta er Dødsgudinnens vidunderbarn. Kreftene hennes vokser i vanskelige tider, men i det siste har de også begynt å vokse helt ukontrollert. Hun tilbringer tiden med å meditere slik at hun ikke skal skade folk rundt seg.
Russian: Хранительница Майя Муэрта - благословенное дитя Богини Смерти. Во времена великих войн ее силы растут, но с недавних пор контролировать силу стало почти невозможно. Она все время проводит за медитацией, чтобы не навредить остальным.
Spanish: Maya Muerta la Observadora fue bendecida al nacer por la diosa de la Muerte. Sus poderes aumentan en momentos conflictivos y, últimamente, se han vuelto casi incontrolables. Es por eso que se pasa la vida meditando, para asegurarse de no dañar a quienes la rodean.
Swedish: Maya Muerta, väktaren, är det välsignade barnet till dödens gudinna. Hennes krafter växer i armodstider, men på sistone har de börjat växa hejdlöst. Hon mediterar ofta för att inte skada de i sin närhet.
Turkish: Gözcü Maya Muerta, Ölüm Tanrıçasının kutsanmış çocuğudur. Güç münakaşaları sırasında güçleri gelişmiş, son zamanlarda ise kontrolden çıkma noktasına gelmiştir. Etrafındakilere zarar vermemek için tüm zamanını meditasyonla geçirir.
Portuguese: Maya Muerta, a Observadora, é a abençoada filha da Deusa da Morte. Seus poderes se tornam mais fortes em tempos de grande conflito, mas recentemente começaram a aumentar de forma incontrolável. Ela passa o tempo meditando para garantir que não causará mal aos que estão ao seu redor.

English_Translator: Jayce the Ruthless Cutter is a deadly and unscrupulous bandit that will do anything for fame, glory and wealth. His razor sharp claws are feared by many and he is known for his love of blood and mayhem. Once in a gang of merciless bandits, Jayce craved the power that the leader held, and plotted to kill him and take his place. After Jayce's attempt on the leader's life failed, he fled to a far away land to avoid ever crossing paths with the bandit leader again and face the shame of his defeat. One night while stalking his patron's chosen victim, he came upon a frail, blind man with a walking stick, and decided that he would make for an easy target to top off his coin purse. But that night, Jayce was defeated for a second time. In exchange for his life, Jayce swore to serve the blind man and aid him on his quest. Although Jayce despised heroics, he soon found himself enjoying his adventures and travels as a hero, saving innocent lives and no longer forced to skulk in dark alleys to live. Maybe it wasn't so bad being the good guy? Though he can never outrun his reputation or his bloody past, Jayce chooses to use his notoriety to instill fear in criminals and cutpurses alike.
English: Jayce the Ruthless Cutter is a deadly and unscrupulous bandit that will do anything for fame, glory and wealth. His razor sharp claws are feared by many and he is known for his love of blood and mayhem. Once in a gang of merciless bandits, Jayce craved the power that the leader held, and plotted to kill him and take his place. After Jayce's attempt on the leader's life failed, he fled to a far away land to avoid ever crossing paths with the bandit leader again and face the shame of his defeat. One night while stalking his patron's chosen victim, he came upon a frail, blind man with a walking stick, and decided that he would make for an easy target to top off his coin purse. But that night, Jayce was defeated for a second time. In exchange for his life, Jayce swore to serve the blind man and aid him on his quest. Although Jayce despised heroics, he soon found himself enjoying his adventures and travels as a hero, saving innocent lives and no longer forced to skulk in dark alleys to live. Maybe it wasn't so bad being the good guy? Though he can never outrun his reputation or his bloody past, Jayce chooses to use his notoriety to instill fear in criminals and cutpurses alike.
ChineseTrad: 殘酷切割者傑斯是一名致命且毫無道德的強盜，他為了名氣、榮耀與財富什麼都做得出來。許多人懼怕他那剃刀般的爪子，且眾所皆知，他熱愛的是鮮血與暴行。
ChineseSimp: 冷血屠夫杰斯是个杀戮成性的无耻强盗，他会为了名利做任何事。许多人害怕他锋利的爪子，他以热爱鲜血和混乱而闻名。
Japanese: 無情な切り裂き魔ジェイスは名声と栄光と富のためなら何でもする危険でたちの悪い無法者です。彼の鋭い金属の爪は多くの人から恐れられ、彼は流血と破壊を好むことで知られています。
Korean: 무자비한 난도자, 제이스는 치명적이고 악랄한 강도이며 명성, 부와 명예를 위해서라면 수단을 가리지 않습니다. 많은 이들이 제이스의 날카로운 발톱을 두려워하며, 그는 유혈과 난동을 즐기는 것으로 유명합니다.
Danish: Jayce den Nådesløse Dolk er en dødsensfarlig og skruppelløs bandit, som vil gøre alt for penge, ære og berømmelse. Hans barberbladsskarpe kløer skaber frygt overalt, og han er kendt for at elske blod og kaos.
Dutch: Jayce de meedogenloze hakker is een dodelijke, gewetenloze bandiet die alles over heeft voor roem, glorie en rijkdom. Zijn vlijmscherpe klauwen worden door velen gevreesd en hij staat bekend om zijn voorliefde voor bloed en wanorde.
French: Jayce, la griffe impitoyable, est un redoutable bandit sans scrupule qui est prêt à tout pour la célébrité, la gloire et la richesse. Beaucoup craignent ses griffes acérées ainsi que son goût du sang et du carnage.
German: Jayce, der rücksichtslose Schnitzer, ist ein tödlicher und skrupelloser Bandit, der alles für Ruf, Ruhm und Reichtum unternimmt. Seine rasiermesserscharfen Klauen werden von vielen gefürchtet und er ist bekannt für seinen Blutdurst.
Italian: Jayce, Tranciatore senza posa, è un bandito letale e senza scrupoli che farebbe qualsiasi cosa per la fama, la gloria e la ricchezza. I suoi artigli affilati come rasoi sono temuti da molti ed è famoso per essere assetato di sangue e devastazione.
Norwegian: Jayce den hensynsløse slakteren er en dødelig og skruppelløs banditt som er villig til å gjøre alt for heder, ære og rikdom. Med sine knivskarpe klør er han fryktet av mange og kjent for sin tørst etter blod og ødeleggelse.
Russian: Джейс Живопыра - смертоносный и беспринципный бандит, который пойдет на все в погоне за славой, триумфом и богатством. Его острые как бритва когти держат в страхе многих. Говорят, он просто обожает пускать кровь и наносить увечья.
Spanish: Jayce el carnicero implacable es un bandido mortal y sin escrúpulos capaz de hacer lo que sea a cambio de fama, gloria y fortuna. Sus garras, afiladas como navajas, siembran el pánico allá donde va, pues sus dos pasiones son la sangre y el caos.
Swedish: Jayce, den brutala uppskäraren, är en dödlig och skrupellös bandit som kan göra vad som helst för berömmelse, ära och rikedom. Hans rakbladsvassa klor fruktas av många, och han är känd för att älska blod och lidande.
Turkish: Acımasız Bıçakçı Jayce ün, şöhret ve zenginlik için her şeyi yapabilecek ölümcül ve ilkesiz bir suçludur. Jilet gibi keskin pençeleri göreni dehşete düşürür. Kan ve karmaşa sevgisini herkes bilir.
Portuguese: Jayce, o Cortador Incansável, é um bandido mortal e inescrupuloso que faz qualquer coisa por fama, glória e riqueza. Suas garras afiadíssimas são temidas por muitos e ele é conhecido por sua paixão por sangue e caos.

English_Translator: Cosette is the fiery-tempered daughter of the Sabre family, sole heir to the Sabre legacy. Quick with her blade - and even quicker to draw it against her enemies - she is known for thoughtlessly rushing into battle when innocent lives are in danger. One day, Cosette was instructed to read through the Sabre family records in the library to learn about their rich history and noble past. Cosette discovered that, strangely, all of the most recent records spoke of the Sabre family's "daughters." Cosette decided to confront her parents about what she found and, unable to hide the truth from their daughter, they broke down and told her of her twin sister. On the night of their birth, her sister vanished from her crib in the dead of night, never to be seen again. Cosette decided that she would embark on a journey to find her long-lost twin sister and bring her home. This would prove to be no easy task, as the Sabre family had gone through great lengths to conceal this kidnapping, as not to bring scandal upon the house's great name. Her search continued unsuccessfully until she received a mysterious letter, urging her to travel to the shady Smugglers' Port in the east. Cosette journeys to the port but just as she reaches the town, a hail of arrows flies towards her, cutting off her path. Enraged at such an attack, she shouts a challenge to her attacker and a fight ensues. After a few lightning quick parries and flourishes, both combatants stand rigid, sword and daggers pressed against each other's throats. The stranger laughs in apology and applauds Cosette's performance in the duel. At this standoff, the two realize that they are both in need of an ally and their combined skills could be useful in a place like the port.
English:
Cosette is the fiery-tempered daughter of the Sabre family, sole heir to the Sabre legacy. Quick with her blade - and even quicker to draw it against her enemies - she is known for thoughtlessly rushing into battle when innocent lives are in danger. One day, Cosette was instructed to read through the Sabre family records in the library to learn about their rich history and noble past. Cosette discovered that, strangely, all of the most recent records spoke of the Sabre family's "daughters." Cosette decided to confront her parents about what she found and, unable to hide the truth from their daughter, they broke down and told her of her twin sister. On the night of their birth, her sister vanished from her crib in the dead of night, never to be seen again. Cosette decided that she would embark on a journey to find her long-lost twin sister and bring her home. This would prove to be no easy task, as the Sabre family had gone through great lengths to conceal this kidnapping, as not to bring scandal upon the house's great name. Her search continued unsuccessfully until she received a mysterious letter, urging her to travel to the shady Smugglers' Port in the east. 

Cosette journeys to the port but just as she reaches the town, a hail of arrows flies towards her, cutting off her path. Enraged at such an attack, she shouts a challenge to her attacker and a fight ensues. After a few lightning quick parries and flourishes, both combatants stand rigid, sword and daggers pressed against each other's throats. The stranger laughs in apology and applauds Cosette's performance in the duel. At this standoff, the two realize that they are both in need of an ally and their combined skills could be useful in a place like the port.
ChineseTrad: 柯賽特是賽伯里家族脾氣火爆的女兒。她出刀迅速，拔刀對付敵人的速度更是快得驚人。她以魯莽地衝進戰鬥拯救無辜生命而著名。
ChineseSimp: 柯赛特是佩剑家族脾气火爆的女儿。她运刀飞快，对敌时拔刀的速度更是迅速。当无辜者遇到危险时，她会不假思索地冲进战斗，并以此著称。
Japanese: サーベル家に生まれたコゼットは勝気な娘です。彼女は手が早く（しかも敵より剣を抜くのが早く）、罪なき者が危険にさらされていると後先考えず戦闘に身を投じることで有名です。
Korean: 코세트는 불같은 성미를 지닌 사브르 가문의 딸입니다. 칼을 빠르게 다루며 눈 깜짝할 사이에 칼을 적에게 뽑습니다. 무고한 생명이 위험에 처하면 물불을 가리지 않고 전투에 뛰어드는 것으로 유명합니다.
Danish: Cosette er Sabre-familiens hidsige datter. Hun er hurtig med sin dolk — og endnu hurtigere til at trække den mod sine fjender — og hun er kendt for tankeløst at kaste sig ind i kampen, hvis nogen truer en uskyldig på livet.
Dutch: Cosette is de felgeaarde dochter van de Sabre-familie. Ze is snel met haar zwaard (vooral als ze het tegen haar vijanden moet opnemen) en ze staat er bekend om dat ze zich zonder na te denken in de strijd begeeft wanneer er onschuldige levens gevaar lopen.
French: Cosette est l'impétueuse enfant de la famille Sabre. Cosette manie l'épée avec fougue. Elle a la réputation de se ruer tête baissée au combat quand des innocents sont en danger.
German: Cosette ist die hitzige Tochter der Familie Sabre. Sie führt eine lockere Klinge – die sie sogar noch schneller gegen ihre Feinde zieht – und ist bekannt dafür, sich achtlos in den Kampf zu stürzen, wenn unschuldige Leben in Gefahr sind.
Italian: Cosette è l'audace figlia della casata della Sciabola. Lesta di lama, e ancor più lesta a usarla per uccidere i suoi nemici, è nota per non tirarsi indietro quando è il momento di combattere per salvare un innocente.
Norwegian: Cosette er den fyrige datteren i Sabre-familien. Hun er rask med klingen, særlig mot sine fiender, og hun er kjent for å kaste seg hodeløst ut i kamp når uskyldige liv står på spill.
Russian: Косетта - вспыльчивая дочь семьи Сабли. Легко управляясь с мечом, особенно если рядом враги, она готова без раздумий броситься в атаку, когда на кону жизнь невинных.
Spanish: Cosette es la apasionada hija de la familia Sable. Cuando se enfrenta a sus enemigos, blande su espada fugazmente. Quienes la conocen saben que es de las que corre al campo de batalla sin pensárselo dos veces cuando vidas inocentes corren peligro.
Swedish: Cosette är den hetsiga dottern i familjen Sabre. Hon är snabb med svärdet, speciellt mot sina fiender, men rusar ofta tanklöst in i strid när oskyldiga liv är i fara.
Turkish: Cosette, Kılıç ailesinin öfkeli kızıdır. Kılıcına -hele de düşmanlarının karşısında- çabuk davranan Cosette, masumların hayatı tehlikede olduğunda hiç düşünmeden savaşa koşmasıyla tanınır.
Portuguese: Cosette é a filha pavio-curto da família Sabre. Rápida com sua lâmina, e ainda mais rápida para sacá-la contra seus inimigos, ela é conhecida por entrar sem pensar em batalhas nas quais vidas inocentes estejam em perigo.

English_Translator: Sophia, Champion of Swords is a loyal servant of the House of Swords. Cold and calculated, she carries out the King and Queen's bidding as quickly and efficiently as possible. The royals of the House of Swords wish for the unification of the four Houses - Cups, Coin, Staves and Swords - to combat the Titans and their ever-increasing strength. Sophia was sent out with orders not to return home until she was able to gain the support of the other royal houses. In this time of great despair, the King and Queen of Swords know that no matter how strong and powerful their house may be, the divided people of the Arcanas could not survive for much longer. In order to prove her strength, and the sincerity of her people's wish for unity, Sophia must retrieve the orbs of Earth, Water and Fire and offer them to the houses as a token of peace. These orbs are the Arcanas greatest treasure and are guarded by the strong magic in the darkest depths of the realm. As the prophecy states: to find the orbs, Sophia must first find the beast who breathes fire to light the way.
English: Sophia, Champion of Swords is a loyal servant of the House of Swords. Cold and calculated, she carries out the King and Queen's bidding as quickly and efficiently as possible. The royals of the House of Swords wish for the unification of the four Houses - Cups, Coin, Staves and Swords - to combat the Titans and their ever-increasing strength. Sophia was sent out with orders not to return home until she was able to gain the support of the other royal houses. In this time of great despair, the King and Queen of Swords know that no matter how strong and powerful their house may be, the divided people of the Arcanas could not survive for much longer. In order to prove her strength, and the sincerity of her people's wish for unity, Sophia must retrieve the orbs of Earth, Water and Fire and offer them to the houses as a token of peace. These orbs are the Arcanas greatest treasure and are guarded by the strong magic in the darkest depths of the realm. As the prophecy states: to find the orbs, Sophia must first find the beast who breathes fire to light the way.
ChineseTrad: 劍術冠軍蘇菲亞是劍之家的忠實僕人。她冷靜又精於計算，盡可能迅速且有效率地執行國王和皇后的命令。劍之家的王室成員想聯合杯之家、錢幣之家與棍棒之家的力量來對抗不斷增強力量的巨人。
ChineseSimp: 剑之勇士索菲亚是宝剑王朝的忠实仆人。她冷酷又精于计算， 并会尽自己最大的努力来快速有效地执行国王和王后的命令。宝剑王朝的皇室希望能和其他三个王朝联手：圣杯家族、钱币家族和权杖家族，一并来对抗巨人们及其不断增长的力量。
Japanese: ソード王朝の勇者ソフィアは王家の忠実な家臣です。冷静で計算高い彼女は国王夫妻の命令を可能な限り迅速かつ効率的に遂行します。ソード朝の王族は力を増す一方のタイタンに対向すべく、カップ家、コイン家、ステイブ家という3つの家系を結束させたいと願っています。
Korean: 소드 챔피언, 소피아는 소드 가문의 충실한 종입니다. 소피아는 냉정하고 철저하며 왕과 여왕의 명령을 최대한 빠르고 효과적으로 수행합니다. 소드 가문의 왕족들은 타이탄과 계속 강해지는 그들의 힘에 맞서기 위해 컵, 코인, 스태프 가문의 통합을 희망합니다.
Danish: Sophia, Sværdenes mester, er en af Sværdenes Hus' trofaste tjenere. Hun er kølig og beregnende, når hun udfører kongens og dronningens ordrer så hurtigt og effektivt som muligt. De kongelige fra Sværdenes Hus drømmer om at forene de tre huse, Bægrene, Mønterne og Stavene, i kampen mod titanerne og deres tiltagende styrke.
Dutch: Sophia, kampioen der zwaarden is een trouwe dienaar van het Huis der Zwaarden. Ze is onvriendelijk en berekenend, en voert de wensen van de koning en koningin zo snel en zo efficiënt mogelijk uit. De koninklijke leden van het Huis der Zwaarden willen de drie huizen (Bekers, Munten en Staven) verenigen om de Titanen en hun steeds groter wordende kracht te verslaan.
French: Sophia, la championne des Épées, est la fidèle servante de la maison du même nom. Froide et réfléchie, elle accomplit les ordres du roi et de la reine le plus vite et le plus efficacement possible. La famille royale de la maison des Épées souhaite voir les trois autres maisons (Coupes, Bâtons et Deniers) s'unir pour combattre les Titans, dont la force ne cesse d'augmenter.
German: Sophia, Champion der Schwerter, ist eine loyale Dienerin des Hauses der Schwerter. Kalt und berechnend führt sie die Befehle von König und Königin so schnell und effizient wie möglich aus. Die Angehörigen des Hauses der Schwerter wünschen eine Vereinigung der drei Häuser – Becher, Münzen und Stäbe – zum Kampf gegen die Titanen und deren immer größere Stärke.
Italian: Sophia, Campionessa delle Spade, è una serva fedele della casata delle Spade. Donna fredda e calcolatrice, esegue con spietatezza ed efficacia gli ordini del suo Re e della sua Regina. I reali della casata delle Spade puntano a riunire tutte le altre casate (Coppe, Denari e Bastoni) per combattere i titani e contrastare la loro forza sempre crescente.
Norwegian: Sverdmesteren Sophia er en lojal tjener av Sverdhuset. Hun er kald og beregnende, og hun utfører kongens og dronningens befalinger så raskt og effektivt som mulig. Sverdhusets kongelige ønsker å forene de tre husene – dvs. koppene, myntene og stavene – for å kunne ta opp kampen mot de stadig sterkere titanene.
