Russian: София, рыцарь Мечей, - верная прислужница Дома Мечей. Холодная и расчетливая, она быстро и эффективно исполняет личные приказы короля и королевы. Члены королевской семьи Дома Мечей желают объединения трех Домов: Кубков, Монет и Посохов - чтобы дать бой грозным титанам.
Spanish: Sophia, la reina de Espadas es una sierva leal de la Casa de Espadas. Es una persona fría y calculadora, que ejecuta las órdenes de los reyes de manera rápida y eficiente. La familia real de la Casa de las Espadas es partidaria de la unificación con el resto de casas (Copas, Monedas y Bastos) para luchar contra el poder creciente de los titanes.
Swedish: Sophia, svärdens mästare, är en lojal tjänare i svärdens hus. Hon är kall och beräknelig och utför kungens och drottningens order snabbt och effektivt. Kungligheterna i svärdens hus önskar att de tre husen – bägarnas, myntens och stavarnas – ska enas för att kämpa mot titanerna och deras växande styrka.
Turkish: Kılıç Şampiyonu Sophia, Kılıç Ailesinin sadık hizmetlisidir. Soğuk ve hesaplı davranan Sophia, Kral ve Kraliçenin isteklerini mümkün olduğunca çabuk ve verimli biçimde yerine getirir. Kılıç Ailesinin soylu mensupları üç Ailenin birleşmesinden yanadır: Cups, Coins ve Staves. Böylece Titanlarla savaşabilecekler ve güçlerine güç katacaklar.
Portuguese: Sophia, Campeã das Espadas, é uma fiel serva da Casa das Espadas. Fria e calculista, ela executa as ordens do Rei e da Rainha da forma mais rápida e eficiente possível. A família real da Casa das Espadas deseja a unificação das três Casas (Copas, Moedas e Bastões) para combater os Titãs e sua força cada vez maior.

English_Translator: Lil' Ursa is a ferociously cute bear who was considered the runt of the litter. Lil' Ursa dreams of one day being the bear that reclaims the homeland of the Great Bear race. When he was a young cub, mother bear would tell him the story of how the Great Bears once thrived in a beautiful and lush land. One night, the terrible Titans flooded into their homeland and the Great Bears, taken by surprise, were soon overwhelmed. The members of the Great Bear tribe fled for their lives and became scattered across the land. Ursa decided it was he who would redeem the honor of his bear people and reunite the clan. Lil' Ursa set out in search of more bears to take up his cause. He quickly found that most bears had done their best to form a new life and were too frightened to risk it all by fighting the Titans. He continued his journey nonetheless and one day, the Titans that he had escaped many years ago found him once again. This seemed like the end for Lil' Ursa, but just as he was ready to give up hope, a small penguin zipped in as quick as lightning and began battling the Titans. With the help of the small, brave bird, he survived. Lil' Ursa decided that he would follow the small bird as thanks for saving his life, while continuing to find the remaining members of the Great Bear tribe.
English: Lil' Ursa is a ferociously cute bear who was considered the runt of the litter. Lil' Ursa dreams of one day being the bear that reclaims the homeland of the Great Bear race. When he was a young cub, mother bear would tell him the story of how the Great Bears once thrived in a beautiful and lush land. One night, the terrible Titans flooded into their homeland and the Great Bears, taken by surprise, were soon overwhelmed. The members of the Great Bear tribe fled for their lives and became scattered across the land. Ursa decided it was he who would redeem the honor of his bear people and reunite the clan. Lil' Ursa set out in search of more bears to take up his cause. He quickly found that most bears had done their best to form a new life and were too frightened to risk it all by fighting the Titans. He continued his journey nonetheless and one day, the Titans that he had escaped many years ago found him once again. This seemed like the end for Lil' Ursa, but just as he was ready to give up hope, a small penguin zipped in as quick as lightning and began battling the Titans. With the help of the small, brave bird, he survived. Lil' Ursa decided that he would follow the small bird as thanks for saving his life, while continuing to find the remaining members of the Great Bear tribe.
ChineseTrad: 小爾薩是隻非常可愛的熊，被認為是小熊窩裡最弱小的一隻。小爾薩的夢想是有一天能成為重新奪回偉大熊族祖國的那隻熊。
ChineseSimp: 小熊乌尔沙是一只既凶猛又可爱的熊，人们认为它是一窝中最小的一个。小熊乌尔沙梦想着有一天它能收复伟大熊族的家乡。
Japanese: こぐまのアーサはとんでもなく可愛いものの、一家の出来損ないと思われていました。アーサは自分が成長して大熊族の故郷を取り戻す英雄グマになる日を夢見ています。
Korean: 막내 곰, 우르사는 형제들 중 가장 연약했던 매우 귀여운 곰입니다. 우르사는 언젠가 위대한 곰 종족의 고향을 되찾는 곰이 되기를 꿈꿉니다.
Danish: Bette Ursa er en voldsomt nuttet bjørn, der uden tvivl er den mindste i kuldet. Bette Ursa drømmer om at blive den bjørn, der engang kan tilbageerobre bjørnenes hjemland.
Dutch: Kleine Ursa is een verscheurend schattig beertje dat als nakomertje wordt beschouwd. Kleine Ursa droomt ervan om ooit die beer te zijn die het thuisland van het grote beren-ras opeist.
French: P'tite Ourse est un plantigrade aussi féroce que mignonne, pourtant considérée autrefois comme le canard boiteux de sa portée. Elle rêve de devenir un jour l'ours qui reconquerra les terres natales de la grande race ursine.
German: Klein Ursa ist ein wilder süßer Bär, der als Kleinster und Schwächster seines Wurfs galt. Jetzt träumt er davon, eines Tages der Bär zu werden, der die Heimat der Großen Bärenrasse zurückerobert.
Italian: La piccola Ursa è un'adorabile orsa ferocissima, ultimogenita della sua cucciolata. La piccola Ursa sogna di poter essere, un giorno, colei che riuscirà a rivendicare la patria della razza dell'Orsa Maggiore.
Norwegian: Lille-Ursa er en fryktelig søt bjørn som ble ansett som kullets svekling. Hun drømmer om en dag å bli den som gjenerobrer Storebjørns hjemland.
Russian: Мишутка - ужасно милый медведь, которого все считали слабым. Мишутка мечтает однажды стать тем самым медведем, который вернет расе Великих медведей их родные земли.
Spanish: Ursa la Peque es una osezna adorable a la que todos consideran la renacuaja de la camada. Su mayor aspiración es reclamar la patria original de la gloriosa raza osa.
Swedish: Lilla Ursa är en söt björn som var minstingen i sin kull. Lilla Ursa drömmer om att en gång bli den björn som återtar björnrasens hemland.
Turkish: Küçük Ayı, sürünün en ufağı sayılan son derece şirin bir ayıdır. Küçük Ayı, bir gün Büyük Ayı yarışının kazananı olmayı hayal eder.
Portuguese: A Ursa Pequena é uma ursa fofa e feroz que foi considerada a mais fraca da ninhada. Ursa Pequena sonha em um dia ser a ursa que vai reivindicar a terra natal da raça dos Grandes Ursos.

English_Translator: Dex-1000 was once a filing droid in the Metallic City. He now spends most of his time gathering data by erratically firing his new weapons with little regards for safety. When he's not piecing himself back together after an experiment, he is making a digital index of everything around him. This filing droid once worked at the great library, but accidentally stumbled into the exploration pod while scanning some books. He soon found himself flying high above the earth, rocketing away from the city. This was quite a curious predicament. Dex could only watch from the window as the actual exploration bot waved happily from the ground. Dex blankly waved back. He knew that he would not be allowed back into the city until he had collected and digitally indexed every specimen within his landing zone. With nothing but his latest prototype blaster to defend himself with, he exited the pod and headed into the world. He would begin at index 0.
English: Dex-1000 was once a filing droid in the Metallic City. He now spends most of his time gathering data by erratically firing his new weapons with little regards for safety. When he's not piecing himself back together after an experiment, he is making a digital index of everything around him. This filing droid once worked at the great library, but accidentally stumbled into the exploration pod while scanning some books. He soon found himself flying high above the earth, rocketing away from the city. This was quite a curious predicament. Dex could only watch from the window as the actual exploration bot waved happily from the ground. Dex blankly waved back. He knew that he would not be allowed back into the city until he had collected and digitally indexed every specimen within his landing zone. With nothing but his latest prototype blaster to defend himself with, he exited the pod and headed into the world. He would begin at index 0.
ChineseTrad: 戴克斯-1000曾是金屬城的檔案機器人。現在他大部分的時間都在不定時發射新武器來收集資料，但毫不在意安全。
ChineseSimp: Dex-1000曾是金属城的一个文件管理机器人。现在大部分时间，他都在不顾安全地乱开他的新武器，借此来收集数据。
Japanese: デックス1000はかつてメタリックシティの事務ロボットでした。現在はほとんどの時間、安全性を考慮することなくランダムに武器を発射し、そのデータを収集しています。
Korean: 덱스-1000은 한때 금속 도시의 데이터 정리 드로이드였습니다. 이제 덱스-1000은 조심성 없이 마구잡이로 새 무기를 발사해 데이터를 수집하며 대부분의 시간을 보냅니다.
Danish: Dex-1000 var arkivar-droide i Metalbyen. Nu bruger han det meste af sin tid på at indsamle data ved at affyre sine nye våben på en foruroligende tilfældig måde.
Dutch: Dex-1000 was ooit een administratierobot in Metallic City. Hij brengt nu de meeste tijd door met het verzamelen van gegevens door zijn nieuwe wapens doelloos af te vuren zonder daarbij op de veiligheid te letten.
French: Dex-1000 était autrefois un droïde d'archivage dans la Cité Métallique. Il passe maintenant le plus clair de son temps à collecter des données et à tirer avec ses nouvelles armes en dépit du bon sens (et des précautions les plus élémentaires).
German: Dex-1000 war einst ein Archivardroide in der Metallstadt. Jetzt verbringt er seine meiste Zeit damit, Daten zu sammeln, indem er in unregelmäßigen Abständen seine neuen Waffen abfeuert, ohne groß auf Schutzmaßnahmen zu achten.
Italian: Dex-1000 era un androide archiviatore della Città Metallica. Al momento, passa la maggior parte del suo tempo a raccogliere dati sparando a caso con le sue nuove armi... senza badare troppo alla sicurezza!
Norwegian: Dex-1000 var i sin tid en arkiveringsdroide i Metallic City. Nå driver han mest og samler data ved å skyte vilt rundt seg med de nye våpnene sine – uten hensyn til sikkerheten.
Russian: Декс-1000 однажды был протокольным дроидом в Металлическом городе. Теперь же он собирает данные пальбой во все вокруг из своего нового оружия, почти не заботясь о безопасности.
Spanish: Dex-1000 fue anteriormente un androide archivador en Ciudad Metálica. Ahora se pasa la vida recopilando datos y disparando sus nuevas armas al tuntún sin tener muy en cuenta los protocolos de seguridad.
Swedish: Dex-1000 var en gång en arkivandroid i Metallstaden. Nu brukar han mest samla data genom att oberäkneligt avfyra sina nya vapen utan att bry sig om säkerhet.
Turkish: Dex-1000 bir zamanlar Metalik Şehrin memur droidiydi. Artık zamanını, güvenliğe önem vermeksizin yeni silahlarını delice ateşleyerek veri toplamakla geçirir.
Portuguese: Dex-1000 era um robô administrativo na Cidade Metálica. Agora ele passa a maior parte do tempo coletando dados disparando suas novas armas aleatoriamente com pouca consideração com a segurança.

English_Translator: Rosabella Bonnie Archer is known as the Rose of the Sea. The self-proclaimed Queen of the Sea will take bloody contracts from the highest bidder as long as the cause is just. Rosabella's refusal to hurt anyone innocent is considered one of her greatest strengths by the people of the small town she rules. Her disgust for hurting the innocent stems from her adopted father, a famed pirate of the seas. One night, the old pirate ended up on shore in pursuit of a Titan that destroyed his ship. There was no sign of the Titan, but he heard a faint cry coming from a mound of sand. To his surprise, a small baby had washed up on shore. He decided to take her in and raise her as his own. Growing up on a pirate ship, she learned to fight for herself and was taught the ropes of pirate life from her dear old dad. Even though he was a pirate, he impressed on her that she should spend her life trying to "take gold and save the lives," and not the opposite. Wishing to make a name for herself, just as her father did, Rosabella left her father's pirate crew and set off to chart her own path in the world. Before she left, her father gave her a necklace with a small sword etched into the center. She had been wearing it the night he had found her. Rosabella would take her necklace, the only link to her birth family, and use her knowledge of the high seas to track them down and discover why they were seperated.
English: Rosabella Bonnie Archer is known as the Rose of the Sea. The self-proclaimed Queen of the Sea will take bloody contracts from the highest bidder as long as the cause is just. Rosabella's refusal to hurt anyone innocent is considered one of her greatest strengths by the people of the small town she rules. Her disgust for hurting the innocent stems from her adopted father, a famed pirate of the seas. One night, the old pirate ended up on shore in pursuit of a Titan that destroyed his ship. There was no sign of the Titan, but he heard a faint cry coming from a mound of sand. To his surprise, a small baby had washed up on shore. He decided to take her in and raise her as his own. Growing up on a pirate ship, she learned to fight for herself and was taught the ropes of pirate life from her dear old dad. Even though he was a pirate, he impressed on her that she should spend her life trying to "take gold and save the lives," and not the opposite. Wishing to make a name for herself, just as her father did, Rosabella left her father's pirate crew and set off to chart her own path in the world. Before she left, her father gave her a necklace with a small sword etched into the center. She had been wearing it the night he had found her. Rosabella would take her necklace, the only link to her birth family, and use her knowledge of the high seas to track them down and discover why they were seperated.
ChineseTrad: 人稱嬌美弓箭手羅莎貝拉是「海上的玫瑰」。只要理由正當，這位自封海之后的殺手願意接受最高出價者的殺人合約。她統治的小鎮人民認為，拒絕傷害無辜是羅莎貝拉最偉大的力量。
ChineseSimp: 弓箭手罗莎贝拉·邦妮外号海上玫瑰。这位自封的海洋女王会接受最高出价者的血腥合同，只要理由是正义的。罗莎贝拉拒绝伤害任何无辜的人，她所统治的小镇的镇民认为这是她的一大优点。
Japanese: 射手ロザベラボニーは海のバラとも呼ばれています。「海の女王」を自称する彼女は、正当な理由があることを条件に、最も高い報酬を提示した者から殺しの契約を請け負います。ロザベラは無実の人間を傷つけることを拒んでおり、彼女が統治する小さな町の人々はそれをロザベラの最大の長所と考えています。
Korean: 아리따운 궁수, 로사벨라는 바다의 장미라고 불립니다. 스스로 바다의 여왕을 자처하며 정당한 명분만 있다면 높은 돈을 제시하는 자로부터 살인 계약도 받습니다. 로사벨라가 무고한 이들을 해치지 않는 것은 그녀가 지배하는 작은 마을의 주민들이 가장 큰 장점으로 꼽습니다.
Danish: Bueskytten Rosabella Bonnie er kendt som Havets Rose. Den selverklærede Dronning af Havet er altid klar til at udføre blodige opgaver for højestbydende, så længe sagen er retfærdig. Rosabella nægter at skade uskyldige, og borgerne i den lille by, hun hersker over, elsker hende for det.
Dutch: Rosabella Bonnie Archer staat bekend als de Roos van de Zee. De zelfbenoemde koningin van de zee neemt bloedige contracten aan van de hoogste bieder mits het een hoger doel dient. Rosabella weigert een onschuldig iemand pijn te doen en dit wordt als een van haar sterkste punten beschouwd door de mensen van het kleine stadje dat door haar wordt bestuurd.
French: Rosabella, la reine de l'arc est également appelée la Rose des Mers. Cette reine autoproclamée est prête à accomplir des contrats sanglants pour le plus offrant, tant que la cause est juste. Rosabella se refuse à nuire aux innocents, ce que les sujets de la petite bourgade qu'elle gouverne considèrent comme son plus grand point fort.
German: Rosabella Bonnie Archer ist bekannt als Rose des Meeres. Die selbsterklärte Königin des Meeres unterschreibt blutige Verträge des höchsten Bieters, solange es um eine gerechte Sache geht. Rosabellas Weigerung, jemand Unschuldigem etwas anzutun, wird von den Leuten der von ihr regierten kleinen Stadt als ihre größte Stärke gesehen.
Italian: Rosabella, Arciere eccellente, è nota come "la Rosa del Mare". L'autoproclamata Regina del Mare è pronta a mettersi al servizio del miglior offerente, sempre che le chieda di perseguire uno scopo nobile. Gli abitanti del villaggio su cui regna Rosabella concordano sul fatto che uno dei suoi maggiori punti di forza risiede nella volontà di non combattere mai contro gli innocenti.
Norwegian: Rosabella Bonnie Archer er kjent som «Havets rose». Hun er en selverklært havdronning som utfører blodige oppdrag for den som betaler mest, så lenge det tjener en god sak. Rosabella nekter å skade uskyldige, noe som blir sett på som en av hennes største styrker av folket i den vesle byen hun hersker over.
Russian: Розабелла Бонни Арчер известна как "Морская Роза". Эта самопровозглашенная Морская королева возьмется за любой кровавый контракт с самой высокой ценой, лишь бы дело было правое. Жители городков, которыми правит Розабелла, считают нежелание причинять вред невиновному одним из ее сильнейших качеств.
Spanish: Rosabella Bonnie Archer recibe el apodo de la Rosa Marina. La autoproclamada reina de los mares se deleita aceptando encargos como mercenaria siempre que la causa sea justa. Rosabella se niega a causar daño a gente inocente y, por ello, los habitantes de la aldea que esta gobierna le tienen una gran admiración.
Swedish: Rosabella Bonnie, bågskytten, är känd som havets ros. Den självutnämnda havsdrottningen antar blodiga avtal från högstbjudande så länge det är för en god orsak. Rosabellas vägran att skada någon oskyldig ses som en av hennes största styrkor av invånarna i den lilla stad hon leder.
Turkish: Okçu Rosabella Bonnie, Denizin Gülü olarak bilinir. Kendine Denizin Kraliçesi diyen Rosabella, uğruna savaştığı dava adil olduğu sürece en yüksek teklifi verenin kanlı işlerini yerine getirir. Rosabella'nın masumları incitmeme ilkesi, önderlik ettiği ufak kasabanın halkı tarafından en büyük erdemi sayılır.
Portuguese: Rosabella Bonnie, a Arqueira, é conhecida como a Rosa do Mar. A autoproclamada Rainha do Mar aceitará contratos sangrentos com quem pagar mais, contanto que a causa seja justa. A recusa de Rosabella em ferir qualquer inocente é considerada uma de suas maiores forças pelo povo da pequena cidade sob seu domínio.

English_Translator: Beany Sprout the 1st is the first plant able to speak and communicate with humans in over 1,000 years. Though the circumstances of his birth and evolution is unknown, Beany continues to grow with every new person he meets. Beany lived in the Garden of Eden and, while it was beautiful, Beany grew bored of just sitting in the sun all day. It felt like if he stayed any longer, he was going to grow roots! Like the inquisitive sprout that he was, Beany decided to make like a tree and leave. So Beany said goodbye to the garden and set off in search of adventure. Unfortunately for Beany, the adventures were not always fun and the outside world was full of scary, terrible creatures. The leaves on Beany's head wilted a little after every scare; Beany would need to grow stronger if he were to survive. He wanted to be brave, and needed some bite to match his bark! Beany soon realized that he missed the Garden of Eden and the friendly gardener who always played with him. To combat his loneliness, Beany decided that his new quest would be to find another friend.
English: Beany Sprout the 1st is the first plant able to speak and communicate with humans in over 1,000 years. Though the circumstances of his birth and evolution is unknown, Beany continues to grow with every new person he meets. Beany lived in the Garden of Eden and, while it was beautiful, Beany grew bored of just sitting in the sun all day. It felt like if he stayed any longer, he was going to grow roots! Like the inquisitive sprout that he was, Beany decided to make like a tree and leave. So Beany said goodbye to the garden and set off in search of adventure. Unfortunately for Beany, the adventures were not always fun and the outside world was full of scary, terrible creatures. The leaves on Beany's head wilted a little after every scare; Beany would need to grow stronger if he were to survive. He wanted to be brave, and needed some bite to match his bark! Beany soon realized that he missed the Garden of Eden and the friendly gardener who always played with him. To combat his loneliness, Beany decided that his new quest would be to find another friend.
ChineseTrad: 豆苗一世是千年以來第一株能和人類說話溝通的植物。他出生的狀況不明，但豆苗每認識新的人就會隨之成長。
ChineseSimp: 豆芽一世是一千年来第一个能够跟人类说话与沟通的植物。他出生的情况无人知晓，但豆芽每遇到一个人，就会成长一点。
Japanese: ビーニースプラウトI世は、この1000年以上の間で初めて人間と会話し意思の疎通ができるようになった植物です。彼がどうやって生まれたのかは謎ですが、ビーニーは新しい人に会うたびに成長しています。
Korean: 비니 스프라우트 1세는 1,000년이 넘도록 인간과 의사소통한 최초의 말하는 식물입니다. 탄생 배경은 불명이며, 비니는 새로운 인간을 만날 때마다 계속 성장합니다.
Danish: Beany Sprout I er den første plante, der kan kommunikere med mennesker, i mere end 1.000 år. Man ved ikke så meget om hans fødsel, men Beany vokser sig større og større for hver person, han møder.
Dutch: Boontje Spruit de Eerste is de eerste plant in meer dan 1000 jaar die kan praten en met mensen kan communiceren. De omstandigheden rond zijn geboorte zijn onbekend, maar Boontje groeit elke keer wanneer hij een nieuw persoon ontmoet.
French: Fayot 1er est la première plante depuis plus d'un millénaire capable de communiquer verbalement avec les humains. Les circonstances de sa naissance sont inconnues, mais Fayot grandit à chaque nouvelle rencontre.
German: Bohnenkeim die Erste ist die erste Pflanze seit über 1000 Jahren, die mit Menschen sprechen und kommunizieren kann. Die Umstände ihrer Geburt sind nicht bekannt, aber Bohnenkeim wächst jedes mal, wenn sie jemand Neuen kennenlernt.
Italian: Beany Sprout, L'impareggiabile, è la prima pianta in grado di parlare e comunicare con gli esseri umani negli ultimi 1.000 anni. Le circostanze della sua nascita sono ignote; tutto quel che è dato sapere è che Beany cresce con ogni persona che incontra.
Norwegian: Bønnestengel den første er den første planten på over 1000 år med evne til å snakke og kommunisere med mennesker. Omstendighetene rundt hans fødsel er ukjent, men Bønnestengel vokser for hver person han møter.
Russian: Удалой Росток Первый стал первым растением за 1000 лет, научившимся разговаривать с людьми. Подробности его рождения неизвестны, однако Росток становится все больше с каждым новым знакомством.
Spanish: Brotecito I es la primera planta capaz de hablar y comunicarse con los humanos desde hace más de 1000 años. No se conocen detalles sobre su nacimiento y crece cada vez que conoce a alguien.
Swedish: Bönis Grodd den förste är den första växten som kan tala och kommunicera med människor på över 1000 år. Det är ett mysterium hur han föddes, men Bönis växer för varje ny person han träffar.
Turkish: 1. Beany Sprout, 1.000 yıldır insanlarla konuşabilen ve iletişime geçebilen ilk bitkidir. Nasıl doğduğu bilinmese de Beany tanıştığı her yeni kişiyle biraz daha gelişir.
Portuguese: Beany Sprout I é a primeira planta capaz de falar e se comunicar com humanos em mais de mil anos. As circunstâncias do seu nascimento são desconhecidas, mas Beany cresce com cada nova pessoa que ele encontra.

English_Translator: Captain Davey Cannon is the greatest pirate to ever have sailed the high seas. The special cannon that he carries on his back has famously taken out many a fearsome Titan. It is said that Captain Davey designed it after fighting a strange Titan that was impervious to harm from his blade. Terrified by his fight with the seemingly invulnerable beast, he spent hours crafting and perfecting a weapon that would obliterate any foe. His mind often wanders back to that dreaded Titan all those years ago, and worries for the safety of his only daughter who sails the seas in search of answers. The Captain is terrified by the thought of that beastly monster running into his daughter on her journey, dragging her away into the depths of the ocean, while he is unable to protect her. Captain Davey obsesses day and night in search of the dreaded creature, to find and destroy it before it gets to his most precious treasure.
English: Captain Davey Cannon is the greatest pirate to ever have sailed the high seas. The special cannon that he carries on his back has famously taken out many a fearsome Titan. It is said that Captain Davey designed it after fighting a strange Titan that was impervious to harm from his blade. Terrified by his fight with the seemingly invulnerable beast, he spent hours crafting and perfecting a weapon that would obliterate any foe. His mind often wanders back to that dreaded Titan all those years ago, and worries for the safety of his only daughter who sails the seas in search of answers. The Captain is terrified by the thought of that beastly monster running into his daughter on her journey, dragging her away into the depths of the ocean, while he is unable to protect her. Captain Davey obsesses day and night in search of the dreaded creature, to find and destroy it before it gets to his most precious treasure.
ChineseTrad: 戴維大砲船長是在高海航行者中，有史以來最偉大的海盜。他背在背上的特殊大砲曾擊敗許多可怕的巨人而聲名遠播。據說戴維船長用刀和一隻刀槍不入的怪異巨人戰鬥後，就設計了那尊大砲。
ChineseSimp: 戴维·加农船长是横行公海的最大海盗。他背上扛着的特殊加农炮因消灭了很多可怕的巨人而为人所知。据说，戴维船长是在跟一个奇怪的巨人战斗之后设计了这门加农炮的，因为他当时的刀无法给巨人造成伤害。
Japanese: デイヴィーキャノン船長は大海原を駆け巡る史上最強の海賊です。彼が背中に担いでいる特殊な大砲は、手強いタイタン達を数多く倒してきたことで有名です。デイヴィー船長はあるとき剣の攻撃をまったく受け付けないタイタンと戦い、その後この大砲を設計したと言われています。
Korean: 선장, 데이비 캐넌은 그동안 공해를 항해한 해적 중 가장 위대한 해적입니다. 선장이 등에 메고 다니는 특별한 대포는 무시무시한 타이탄을 여럿 처치한 것으로 유명합니다. 소문에 따르면 데이비 선장이 칼이 통하지 않는 특이한 타이탄과 싸운 후 설계한 것이라고 합니다.
Danish: Kaptajn Davey Cannon er den mægtigste pirat, der nogensinde har sejlet de syv verdenshave. Han bærer rundt på en særlig kanon, som gennem tiden har besejret mange frygtelige titaner. Man siger, at Kaptajn Davey designede kanonen efter at have kæmpet mod en mystisk titan, der var usårlig over for sværd og andre klinger.
Dutch: Kapitein Davey Cannon is de beroemdste piraat die ooit de hoge zeeën heeft bevaren. Het speciale kanon dat hij op zijn rug draagt, is beroemd voor het uitschakelen van veel geduchte Titanen. Er wordt beweerd dat Kapitein Davey het heeft ontworpen na een gevecht met een vreemde Titaan die onkwetsbaar was voor zijn zwaard.
French: Le capitaine Davey Cannon est le plus grand pirate à avoir jamais écumé les sept mers. Le canon spécial qu'il transporte sur son dos est célèbre pour avoir éliminé de nombreux redoutables Titans. On dit que le capitaine Davey l'a conçu après avoir affronté un étrange Titan qui était insensible à son sabre.
German: Captain Davey Cannon ist der größte Pirat, der je über die sieben Weltmeere gesegelt ist. Der Spezialkanone auf seinem Rücken eilt der Ruf voraus, schon viele fürchterliche Titanen ausgeschaltet zu haben. Angeblich hatte Captain Davey sie nach einem Kampf gegen einen seltsamen Titanen gebaut, dem er mit seiner Klinge nichts anhaben konnte.
Italian: Il Capitano Davey Cannon è il più grande pirata ad aver mai solcato i sette mari. Il cannone speciale che porta sulla schiena ha abbattuto più di un titano. Si dice che il Capitano Davey l'abbia progettato dopo aver combattuto contro un titano particolare che non riusciva ad abbattere con il solo uso della sua spada.
Norwegian: Kaptein Davey Cannon er den største piraten som noen gang har seilt på de syv hav. Spesialkanonen han har på ryggen, har tatt knekken på mang en fryktet titan. Det sies at kaptein Davey konstruerte den etter å ha kjempet mot en merkelig titan som var immun mot klingen hans.
Russian: Капитан Дейви Залп - величайший пират из всех, кто бороздил воды великих морей. Пушка, которую он таскает за спиной, отняла жизни у множества грозных титанов. Говорят, что Капитан Дейви создал ее после встречи с неуязвимым титаном, которому не мог навредить его меч.
Spanish: El capitán Davey el Cañón es el mejor pirata que haya surcado alta mar. Ha acabado con titanes temibles con el cañón especial que lleva a sus espaldas. Se dice que el capitán Davey lo desarrolló tras enfrentarse a un extraño titán que era inmune a su espada.
Swedish: Kapten Davey Cannon är den främsta pirat som någonsin seglat på de sju haven. Kanonen han bär på ryggen har tillintetgjort många hemska titaner. Det sägs att kapten Davey skapade den efter att ha slagits mot en underlig titan som inte kunde såras av hans svärd.
Turkish: Kaptan Davey Cannon, açık denizlere açılan en büyük korsandır. Sırtında taşıdığı özel topu, söylenene göre pek çok korkutucu Titanın canını almıştır. Kaptan Davey'nin, kılıçla yaralayamadığı tuhaf bir Titan'la savaştıktan sonra bu topu tasarladığı anlatılır.
Portuguese: Capitão Davey Cannon é o maior pirata que já navegou pelos mares. O canhão especial que ele carrega nas costas é famoso por ter derrotado diversos temidos Titãs. Diz-se que o Capitão Davey o construiu após enfrentar um estranho Titã que era muito difícil de ferir com sua lâmina.

English_Translator: Sawyer the Wild Gunslinger is a foul-mouthed gunman with an itchy trigger finger. Known for doing the right thing but in the wrong way, his actions are often characterized as shady despite having good intentions. Sawyer tends to get on the wrong side of the law, and the even wronger side of most people's guns. Growing up in a small town, he dreamed of being a sheriff and helping to rid the town of riff-raff and bandits. Eventually Sawyer travelled to the big city to join the local law enforcement. A bigger city meant bigger criminals, and an even bigger name for Sawyer. He soon realized, however, that doing things by the book was getting him nowhere when it came to helping people. Always scolded by his superiors, he decided to start shooting first and apologize later. Fed up with his behavior, the city wanted him out and tasked him with finding a man known for his expert swordsmanship that went missing on a case. He was called the lightning something, something or other... Sawyer couldn't remember the rookie's name for the life of him. All he had was a picture and the place he was last spotted so he figured it would be a simple assignment.
English: Sawyer the Wild Gunslinger is a foul-mouthed gunman with an itchy trigger finger. Known for doing the right thing but in the wrong way, his actions are often characterized as shady despite having good intentions. Sawyer tends to get on the wrong side of the law, and the even wronger side of most people's guns. Growing up in a small town, he dreamed of being a sheriff and helping to rid the town of riff-raff and bandits. Eventually Sawyer travelled to the big city to join the local law enforcement. A bigger city meant bigger criminals, and an even bigger name for Sawyer. He soon realized, however, that doing things by the book was getting him nowhere when it came to helping people. Always scolded by his superiors, he decided to start shooting first and apologize later. Fed up with his behavior, the city wanted him out and tasked him with finding a man known for his expert swordsmanship that went missing on a case. He was called the lightning something, something or other... Sawyer couldn't remember the rookie's name for the life of him. All he had was a picture and the place he was last spotted so he figured it would be a simple assignment.
ChineseTrad: 狂野槍手索伊爾是個動不動就開槍的臭嘴槍手。他以用錯的方法做對的事而知名，儘管出於好意，他的行為仍然經常被認為很不可靠。
ChineseSimp: 荒野枪手索耶是个爱说粗话的枪手，手指痒痒的总想扣扳机。他以用错误的方式做正确的事情而闻名，他的行动常被描述为见不得人，尽管他本意是好的。
Japanese: 荒野の拳銃使いソーヤは口が悪く速撃ちのガンマンです。正しいことを間違ったやり方でやる男として知られる彼は、善良な意図をもって行動しても怪しまれてしまうことがよくあります。
Korean: 황야의 총잡이, 소여는 불시에 방아쇠를 당기는 입이 험한 총잡이입니다. 올바른 일도 엉뚱한 방식으로 처리하는 바람에 소여의 행동은 좋은 의도가 있음에도 불구하고 대개 수상쩍은 것으로 간주됩니다.
Danish: Sawyer den Vilde Pistolmand er grov i munden og har altid fingeren på aftrækkeren. Han er kendt for at gøre det rigtige på den helt forkerte måde, og selvom hans intentioner er gode, bliver han af mange betragtet som lidt af en forbryder.
Dutch: Sawyer de wilde revolverheld is een vuilspuitende schutter die maar al te graag de trekker overhaalt. Hij staat er bekend om dat hij altijd het juiste doet op de verkeerde manier. Zijn acties worden vaak als verdacht beschouwd terwijl hij toch goede bedoelingen heeft.
French: Sawyer, le pistolero sauvage, est un cowboy à la détente et l'insulte faciles. Réputé pour toujours agir comme il faut, mais de la mauvaise façon, il est affublé d'une réputation douteuse malgré ses bonnes intentions.
German: Sawyer, der wilde Revolverheld, ist ein vulgärer Gangster mit einem ziemlich nervösen Finger am Abzug. Er ist bekannt dafür, das Richtige auf die falsche Art und Weise zu tun. Daher werden seine Handlungen oft als zwielichtig bezeichnet, obwohl gute Absichten dahinterstecken.
Italian: Sawyer, Pistolero pazzo, è un sicario volgare e dal grilletto molto facile. È noto per fare sempre la cosa giusta nel modo sbagliato; nonostante le sue intenzioni siano spesso buone, vengono stigmatizzate da chi lo circonda.
Norwegian: Villvest-Sawyer er en rappkjeftet revolvermann som klør i avtrekkerfingeren. Han er kjent for å gjøre det rette, bare på feil måte, så handlingene hans blir ofte karakterisert som tvilsomme selv om hensikten er god.
Russian: Сойер Дикий Стрелок - ковбой и любитель сквернословить, готовый стрелять по любому поводу. Известный своими правильными поступками и неправильными методами, он не снискал особой симпатии, несмотря на благие намерения.
Spanish: Sawyer el Pistolero Salvaje tiene la lengua afilada y un tic en el dedo del gatillo. Es conocido por perseguir fines justos con métodos cuestionables. Sus acciones suelen ser turbias, pero sus intenciones son buenas.
Swedish: Sawyer, den vilda gangstern, är en oanständig och skjutglad revolverman. Han är känd för att göra rätt sak på fel sätt, och ses som lite suspekt trots sina goda avsikter.
Turkish: Vahşi Silahşor Sawyer, elini tetikten çekmeyen küfürbaz bir silahşordur. Doğru şeyi yanlış yapmasıyla tanınan silahşorun eylemleri genellikle iyi niyetli fakat şüpheli davranışlardır.
Portuguese: Sawyer, o Pistoleiro Selvagem, é um pistoleiro boca-suja com um incansável dedo no gatilho. Conhecido por fazer a coisa certa do jeito errado, suas ações são normalmente caracterizadas como duvidosas, apesar de terem boas intenções.

English_Translator: Miki the Graceful Dancer was taught throughout her childhood how to harness the magnificent power of dance. Born to an ancient clan that lived high up in the mountains, she learned their ancient and graceful movements, allowing her to move in harmony with the life force of every living creature. This grants Miki the ability to gracefully predict the movements of those around her and even manipulate their movements through the power of her magical ring; an artifact passed down from generation to generation by the most talented dancers of her clan. One day, a strange little creature claiming to be the master of music visited her village and challenged her to dance to his fastest and most complex song. Miki accepted this challenge of music and dance to prove how incredible her clan's ancient dances truly were. Miki kept time with the little musician, elegantly matching every note with beautiful movements of her own. The music master suddenly stopped, overjoyed with Miki's performance. Barely able to contain his excitement, he hurriedly told her of his quest to learn the legendary, "Song of the Gods," and his need of a dance master to harness its full potential. The idea of dancing to the "Song of the Gods" thrilled Miki and she agreed to leave her village, joining the little creature's quest.
English: Miki the Graceful Dancer was taught throughout her childhood how to harness the magnificent power of dance. Born to an ancient clan that lived high up in the mountains, she learned their ancient and graceful movements, allowing her to move in harmony with the life force of every living creature. This grants Miki the ability to gracefully predict the movements of those around her and even manipulate their movements through the power of her magical ring; an artifact passed down from generation to generation by the most talented dancers of her clan. One day, a strange little creature claiming to be the master of music visited her village and challenged her to dance to his fastest and most complex song. Miki accepted this challenge of music and dance to prove how incredible her clan's ancient dances truly were. Miki kept time with the little musician, elegantly matching every note with beautiful movements of her own. The music master suddenly stopped, overjoyed with Miki's performance. Barely able to contain his excitement, he hurriedly told her of his quest to learn the legendary, "Song of the Gods," and his need of a dance master to harness its full potential. The idea of dancing to the "Song of the Gods" thrilled Miki and she agreed to leave her village, joining the little creature's quest.
ChineseTrad: 優雅舞者米琪從孩童時期就被教導如何駕馭舞蹈的強大力量。她生在一個居住於高山的古老氏族，並學會了他們古老且優雅的舞步，因此能利用所有生物的生命之力舞出和諧的舞步。
ChineseSimp: 优雅舞者米琪整个童年都在学习如何利用舞蹈的强大力量。米琪出生于一个生活在高山上的古老氏族，她学会了族里古老优美的动作，这让她能与每个生物的生命力量和谐地律动。
Japanese: 優雅な踊り子ミキは幼少のころから舞踊がもつ偉大な力を操る術を教え込まれてきました。古代より高山地帯で暮らしてきた一族に生まれたミキは、生きとし生けるものすべてがもつ生命力と調和を保つ身のこなしを、一族伝来の優雅な踊りから学んだのです。
Korean: 우아한 댄서, 미키는 어린 시절 내내 춤의 위대한 힘을 이용하는 방법을 배워 왔습니다. 산악 고지에 사는 고대 일족으로 태어난 미키는 고대의 우아한 동작을 배워 모든 생물의 생명력과 조화를 이루며 움직일 수 있습니다.
Danish: Miki den Yndefulde Danser lærte i sin barndom at aktivere sine magiske kræfter gennem dans. Hun er født ind i en ældgammel klan, der bor langt oppe i bjergene, og hun har lært at efterligne deres oldgamle og yndefulde dansetrin, der giver hende mulighed for at bevæge sig i harmoni med alle levende væsner.
Dutch: Miki de gracieuze danseres is haar hele jeugd geleerd hoe ze de schitterende kracht van de dans kan bundelen. Ze is geboren in een oude clan die hoog in de bergen woont en zij leerde hun traditionele en gracieuze bewegingen waardoor ze in harmonie kan bewegen met de levenskracht van elk levend wezen.
French: Miki, la gracieuse danseuse, a passé sa jeunesse à apprendre comment puiser dans le magnifique pouvoir de la danse. Née au sein d'un clan ancestral vivant parmi dans les hauteurs montagneuses, elle apprit d'eux les mouvements gracieux et immémoriaux qui lui permettent aujourd'hui d'agir en harmonie avec la force vitale de toute créature vivante.
German: Miki, der eleganten Tänzerin, wurde in ihrer Kindheit beigebracht, die großartige Kraft des Tanzes zu nutzen. Sie wurde in einen uralten Clan hoch oben in den Bergen hineingeboren und erlernte dessen alte und elegante Bewegungen, mit denen sie sich in Harmonie mit der Lebenskraft eines jeden Lebewesens fortbewegen konnte.
Italian: Miki, Ballerina aggraziata, ha ricevuto un addestramento molto intenso fin da piccola per imparare tutti i segreti del meraviglioso potere della danza. Nata in un antichissimo clan che vive arroccato sulle montagne, ha appreso i leggiadri movimenti senza tempo che la contraddistinguono e che le consentono di rimanere sempre in armonia con la forza vitale di ogni creatura.
Norwegian: Miki den grasiøse danseren har lært helt fra barnsben av å utnytte dansens store kraft. Hun ble født inn i en eldgammel fjellklan som lærte henne den gamle og grasiøse dansen som gjør at hun kan bevege seg i harmoni med livskraften til hver eneste skapning.
Russian: Мики Грация с детства обучалась волшебному искусству танца. Древний клан, живущий высоко в горах, научил свою дочь двигаться в гармонии с жизненной силой любого живого существа.
Spanish: A Miki, la bailarina grácil, le inculcaron durante su niñez cómo aprovechar al máximo el poder de la danza. Nació en un clan ancestral que vive la cima de una montaña y fue allí donde aprendió a bailar con soltura y a moverse en armonía con la fuerza vital que desprenden los seres vivos.
Swedish: Miki, den graciösa dansaren, har hela sin uppväxt fått lära sig utnyttja de storslagna krafterna i dans. Hon är född i en gammal klan högt uppe i bergen och behärskar deras gamla och graciösa rörelser som låter henne röra sig i harmoni med livskraften hos allt levande.
Turkish: Zarif Dansçı Miki, çocukluğu boyunca dansın muhteşem gücünü nasıl kullanabileceği üzerine eğitim almıştır. Dağların tepelerinde yaşayan kadim bir klanda doğan Miki, her canlı yaratığın hayatıyla uyum içinde yaşamasını sağlayan zarif ve kadim hareketleri öğrenmiştir.
Portuguese: Miki, a Dançarina Graciosa, aprendeu durante sua infância como aproveitar o magnífico poder da dança. Nascida em um poderoso clã que vive no alto das montanhas, ela aprendeu seus antigos e graciosos movimentos, permitindo que ela se mova em harmonia com a força vital de todas as criaturas vivas.

English_Translator: The Great Pharaoh is a wise and powerful immortal who only awakens once every 200 years. A firm but kind leader, he lives amongst his people as one of their own for a century before resting once again. When the Pharaoh awoke this time around, he was shocked to find that the city he rested in had been completely abandoned. He found himself as a ruler without any subjects, in a land in no need of rule. In the city, streets and buildings were torn asunder, as if a great battle had taken place, and houses were left full of important possessions that its inhabitants were forced to abandon. The Pharaoh now travels from town to town, city to city, in search of clues that could reunite him with his people. The world he now walks in has lost its kind, gentle nature and turned into a very dangerous and unwelcoming place. At times he fears that it is too late for his people, but still finds the strength to persevere. His only hope now is to seek an audience with the powerful royals that reside deep within the Sacred Forest.
English: The Great Pharaoh is a wise and powerful immortal who only awakens once every 200 years. A firm but kind leader, he lives amongst his people as one of their own for a century before resting once again. When the Pharaoh awoke this time around, he was shocked to find that the city he rested in had been completely abandoned. He found himself as a ruler without any subjects, in a land in no need of rule. In the city, streets and buildings were torn asunder, as if a great battle had taken place, and houses were left full of important possessions that its inhabitants were forced to abandon. The Pharaoh now travels from town to town, city to city, in search of clues that could reunite him with his people. The world he now walks in has lost its kind, gentle nature and turned into a very dangerous and unwelcoming place. At times he fears that it is too late for his people, but still finds the strength to persevere. His only hope now is to seek an audience with the powerful royals that reside deep within the Sacred Forest.
ChineseTrad: 大法老是兼具智慧與力量、每200年才會甦醒一次的神。他是堅定而仁慈的領袖，再次休眠之前，他會和他的子民一起生活一世紀，彷彿是他們的一份子。
ChineseSimp: 大法老是个聪明而强大的不朽者，他每200年才醒一次。他是一个强硬但亲切的领导者，他融入至人民，与他们同住一个世纪之后再次休息。
Japanese: 大いなるファラオは聡明で強力な不死の存在で、200年に1度目覚めます。ファラオは厳格ながら優しさもある指導者として人々に交じって生活し、1世紀が過ぎるとふたたび眠りにつきます。
Korean: 위대한 파라오는 현명하고 강력한 불멸자이며, 200년마다 한 번씩만 깨어납니다. 파라오는 단호하지만 사려 깊은 지도자이며, 한 세기 동안 백성들을 자식처럼 대하며 살고 또다시 휴식을 취합니다.
Danish: Den store farao er en vis og udødelig kraft, der kun vågner en gang hvert 200. år. Han er en hård, men venlig hersker og lever i et århundrede, inden han lægger sig til hvile igen.
Dutch: De grote farao is een wijze en machtige onsterfelijke die slechts eens in de 200 jaar ontwaakt. Hij is een strenge maar vriendelijke leider die een eeuw lang als een gelijke onder zijn mensen leeft voordat hij opnieuw gaat rusten.
French: Le Grand Pharaon est un immortel sage et puissant qui s'éveille une fois tous les 200 ans. Chef strict mais généreux, il vit parmi son peuple pendant un siècle avant de se replonger dans le sommeil.
German: Der Große Pharao ist ein weiser und mächtiger Unsterblicher, der nur einmal alle 200 Jahre erwacht. Er ist ein starker und freundlicher Anführer, der dann für ein Jahrhundert lang unter seinem Volk als einer der ihren lebt. Danach legt er sich wieder zur Ruhe.
Italian: Il grande Faraone è un immortale saggio e potente, il cui risveglio si verifica una volta ogni 200 anni. Leader risoluto e magnanimo, vive in mezzo al suo popolo come un uomo umile per oltre un secolo, prima di tornare al suo riposo.
Norwegian: Den store Farao er en klok og mektig udødelig skikkelse som bare våkner hvert 200. år. Han er en bestemt, men god leder som lever blant sitt folk i hundre år før han igjen går i dvale.
Russian: Великий Фараон - мудрый и могущественный бессмертный, который пробуждается лишь раз в 200 лет. В течение столетия он строго, но справедливо правит своим народом, а затем снова удаляется на покой.
Spanish: El Gran Faraón es un sabio y poderoso ser inmortal que se despierta una vez cada 200 años. Es un líder firme pero bondadoso. Vive entre la gente como uno más durante un siglo y tras él se sume en un profundo sueño.
Swedish: Den stora faraon är en vis och mäktig odödlig, som bara vaknar en gång vart tvåhundrade år. En sträng men vänlig ledare som lever bland sitt folk i ett århundrade innan han återgår till sin vila.
Turkish: Büyük Firavun, 200 yılda bir uyanan güçlü ve bilge bir ölümsüzdür. Sert olmasına rağmen iyi kalpli bir lider olan Firavun, dinlenmeye çekilmeden önce yüzyıl boyunca halkın arasında yaşar.
Portuguese: O Grande Faraó é um sábio e poderoso imortal que só acorda a cada 200 anos. Um líder firme, mas bondoso, ele vive com seu povo como um deles por um século, antes de descansar novamente.

English_Translator: The Great Madame Cass is a powerful sorceress with eyes said to be kissed by the God of Sun himself. With her all-seeing eyes, she was chosen as the saviour that would defeat the mythical Titans who threaten to destroy the city. Undefeated in battle and trusted by the King of Yort, Madame Cass acts as both his most trusted advisor and one of his holy protectors. One day, while divining the King's future, Madame Cass is met with a terrible vision of the city ablaze. With the sight of her city in ruins at the hands of the Titans, she immediately rushes to warn the King of this grave danger. The King does everything in his power to prepare the city for the attack and selects the city's strongest warriors as champions to fight the Titans. Despite this effort, Madame Cass continues to see the same vision of her home being destroyed. She has no choice but to leave and face the Titans herself; it was the only chance for Yort to survive. Madame Cass' reputation precedes her while on her journey, and she soon finds a talented apprentice that seeks Cass' help to once again hear the voices in her dreams that fell silent.
English: The Great Madame Cass is a powerful sorceress with eyes said to be kissed by the God of Sun himself. With her all-seeing eyes, she was chosen as the saviour that would defeat the mythical Titans who threaten to destroy the city. Undefeated in battle and trusted by the King of Yort, Madame Cass acts as both his most trusted advisor and one of his holy protectors. One day, while divining the King's future, Madame Cass is met with a terrible vision of the city ablaze. With the sight of her city in ruins at the hands of the Titans, she immediately rushes to warn the King of this grave danger. The King does everything in his power to prepare the city for the attack and selects the city's strongest warriors as champions to fight the Titans. Despite this effort, Madame Cass continues to see the same vision of her home being destroyed. She has no choice but to leave and face the Titans herself; it was the only chance for Yort to survive. Madame Cass' reputation precedes her while on her journey, and she soon finds a talented apprentice that seeks Cass' help to once again hear the voices in her dreams that fell silent.
ChineseTrad: 偉大夫人卡絲是一名強大的女術士，據說太陽神親自吻過她的雙眼。由於擁有全視之眼，她被選為救世主，準備擊敗威脅毀滅城市的神話巨人。
ChineseSimp: 贵夫人卡斯是一个强大的女巫，据说她的眼睛被太阳神亲自吻过。因为她拥有全知之眼，她被选为救世主，以击败威胁要毁灭城市的神秘巨人。
Japanese: 肝っ玉マダムキャスは強大な力を持つ魔法使いで、その両目は太陽神に口づけされたと言われています。すべてを見通す目を持つ彼女は、町を破壊しようと迫る伝説のタイタンを倒す救世主に選ばれたのです。
Korean: 위대한 캐스 부인은 강력한 여마법사이며, 태양의 신이 직접 입맞춤한 눈을 가졌다고 합니다. 태양의 눈으로 인해 캐스 부인은 도시를 위협하는 신화 속 타이탄들을 무찌를 구원자로 선택받았습니다.
Danish: Den glorværdige Madam Cass er en mægtig troldkvinde, hvis øjne Solguden selv skulle have kysset. Hun blev udvalgt som frelseren, der måtte bekæmpe de mystiske titaner, der truer byen, på grund af sine altseende øjne.
Dutch: De fantastische Madame Cass is een machtige tovenares met ogen waarvan gezegd wordt dat ze door de Zonnegod zelf zijn gekust. Met haar alziende ogen is zij gekozen tot de verlosser die de mythische Titanen zou verslaan die dreigen de stad te vernietigen.
French: Madame Cass, la fabuleuse, est une puissante sorcière dont les yeux auraient été embrassés par le dieu du Soleil en personne. Dotée d'un regard auquel rien n'échappe, certains voit en elle l'élue qui vaincra les Titans mythiques menaçant de détruire la cité.
German: Großmadame Cass ist eine mächtige Zauberin. Ihre Augen wurden angeblich vom Sonnengott höchstpersönlich geküsst. Wegen ihren allsehenden Augen wurde sie als Erlöserin erwählt, die die mythischen Titanen besiegen würde, welche die Stadt zu vernichten drohten.
Italian: La grande Madame Cass è una potente strega i cui occhi, si dice, sono stati baciati dal dio del Sole. I suoi occhi vedono qualsiasi cosa: lei è la prescelta, la salvatrice che sconfiggerà i mitologici titani che minacciano di distruggere la città.
Norwegian: Den store Madam Cass er en mektig trollkvinne hvis øyne sies å ha blitt kysset av selveste Solguden. Med sine altseende øyne ble hun utpekt som redningskvinnen som skulle beseire de mytiske titanene som truet med å ødelegge byen.
Russian: Великая Мадам Кэсс - могущественная колдунья. Говорят, ее поцеловал в глаза сам Бог Солнца. Глаза ее видят все, и она избрана стать спасительницей и сразить титанов, угрожающих уничтожить ее город.
Spanish: Cass la Gran Dama es una poderosa hechicera. Se dice que el mismísimo dios del sol besó sus ojos. Fue elegida para derrotar a los míticos titanes que amenazan con destruir la ciudad gracias a sus ojos que todo lo ven.
Swedish: Den stora madame Cass är en kraftfull häxa med ögon som sägs vara kyssta av solguden själv. Med sina allseende ögon valdes hon ut som frälsaren som skulle besegra de mytiska titanerna som hotar att förgöra staden.
Turkish: Büyük Madam Cass, Güneş Tanrısı tarafından öpüldüğü rivayet edilen gözlere sahip güçlü bir büyücüdür. Her şeye kadir gözleriyle şehri yok etmeye ant içmiş mitolojik Titanları yenmesi için kurtarıcı olarak seçilmiştir.
Portuguese: A Grande Madame Cass é uma poderosa feiticeira cujos olhos dizem que foram beijados pelo próprio Deus do Sol. Com seus olhos que tudo veem, ela foi escolhida como a sábia que derrotaria os míticos Titãs que ameaçam destruir a cidade.

English_Translator: Jazz Rockerfellow found a guitar on the floor one day and discovered its beautiful sounds as he strummed the strings. He later realized that the instrument had magical powers and the sounds it eminated allowed him to defend himself against predators. He was so taken with the instrument that he soon spent all his waking hours playing it. The random notes became sweet melodies and thunderous riffs brought the attention of all those passing by him in the forest. One day, he ventured into the city and the songs that he had composed became instant hits with the locals. People began to journey from great distances just to see him play and he was hailed as a musical legend. After one performance, a fan from a distant village recounted to him the story of a legendary song that no ordinary instrument could play. It was knows as "The Song of the Gods." With this magical guitar, and his righteous chops, Jazz knew that he would be the one to finally learn the legendary tune. The man went on to explain that Jazz would require the aid of a legendary dancer for the song to reach its full potential. Whatever, he would worry about that later.
English: Jazz Rockerfellow found a guitar on the floor one day and discovered its beautiful sounds as he strummed the strings. He later realized that the instrument had magical powers and the sounds it eminated allowed him to defend himself against predators. He was so taken with the instrument that he soon spent all his waking hours playing it. The random notes became sweet melodies and thunderous riffs brought the attention of all those passing by him in the forest. One day, he ventured into the city and the songs that he had composed became instant hits with the locals. People began to journey from great distances just to see him play and he was hailed as a musical legend. After one performance, a fan from a distant village recounted to him the story of a legendary song that no ordinary instrument could play. It was knows as "The Song of the Gods." With this magical guitar, and his righteous chops, Jazz knew that he would be the one to finally learn the legendary tune. The man went on to explain that Jazz would require the aid of a legendary dancer for the song to reach its full potential. Whatever, he would worry about that later.
ChineseTrad: 爵士搖滾客有一天在地上發現一把吉他，他一撥動吉他弦，就發現那把吉他擁有美麗的音色。稍後他更發現那把吉他擁有魔力，且它發出的聲音讓他能對抗入侵者保護自己。
ChineseSimp: 爵士摇滚乐手有一天在地上发现了一把吉他，他发现当他拨动琴弦时，吉他会奏出美妙的声音。他后来意识到，这把乐器具有神奇的力量，它发出的声音能保护他不受掠食者的伤害。
Japanese: ジャズ・ロッカーフェローはあるとき床に転がっていたギターを手にし、弦をつまびくと美しい音色をうむことを知りました。その後彼はこの楽器に魔法の力があり、この楽器から出る音が捕食者たちから彼を守ってくれることに気が付いたのです。
Korean: 재즈 로커펠로는 어느 날 바닥에서 기타를 주워 현을 튕기다 아름다운 소리를 발견했습니다. 이후에 그는 그 기타에 마법의 힘이 있고 기타가 내는 소리가 약탈자로부터 자신을 보호할 수 있다는 것을 깨달았습니다.
Danish: Jazz Rockerfellow fandt en dag en guitar på gulvet og blev betaget af de smukke lyde, der opstod, når han rørte ved dens strenge. Han opdagede senere, at instrumentet havde magiske egenskaber, og at lydene kunne hjælpe ham til at forsvare sig mod fjenderne.
Dutch: Jazz Rockerfellow vond op een dag een gitaar op de vloer en ontdekte de prachtige geluiden toen hij de snaren beroerde. Hij realiseerde zich later dat het instrument magische krachten had en dat hij zich tegen roofdieren kon verdedigen dankzij de klanken die het maakt.
French: Un jour, Jazz-Orc a trouvé une guitare par terre et découvert ses douces tonalités en grattant les cordes. Il s'est ensuite aperçu que cet instrument était doté de pouvoirs magiques et que les sons ainsi produits le protégeaient des prédateurs.
German: Jazz Rockerfellow fand eines Tages eine Gitarre auf dem Boden und entdeckte beim Klimpern auf deren Saiten ihren wunderbaren Klang. Später fiel ihm dann auf, dass das Instrument magische Kräfte hatte und er sich mit seinem Klang gegen Raubtiere verteidigen konnte.
Italian: Jazz Rockerfellow un giorno ha trovato una chitarra sul pavimento e, toccandone le corde, ha scoperto che emetteva dei suoni stupendi. In seguito, si rese conto che quello strumento era incantato e che il suo suono gli avrebbe consentito di difendersi dai predatori.
Norwegian: Jazz Rockerfellow fant en gitar på gulvet en dag og falt pladask for den vakre musikken som kom fra den. Senere oppdaget han at instrumentet hadde magiske krefter og at lyden av gitaren beskyttet ham mot fiender.
Russian: Однажды Джаз Рокерфэллоу нашел на полу гитару и открыл для себя чудесные звуки, проведя рукой по струнам. Позже он узнал, что инструмент зачарован, а издаваемые им звуки позволяют защищаться от хищников.
Spanish: Un día Jazz Rockerfellow encontró una guitarra tirada en el suelo y se quedó impresionado al escuchar los hermosos sonidos que emitía al rasguear sus cuerdas. Más tarde, descubrió que el instrumento tenía propiedades mágicas y que su música le permitía defenderse de depredadores.
Swedish: Jazz Rockerfellow hittade en gitarr på golvet en dag och upptäckte dess vackra ljud när han slog på strängarna. Senare insåg han att instrumentet hade magiska krafter, och ljuden det skapade skyddade honom från hot.
Turkish: Caz Rockerfellow, bir gün yerde bir gitar buldu ve tellerini tıngırdattığında çıkan güzel sesleri keşfetti. Daha sonra bu aletin sihirli güçleri olduğunu ve çıkardığı seslerin onu yırtıcılara karşı koruduğunu fark etti.
Portuguese: Jazz Rockerfellow encontrou um violão no chão um dia e descobriu seus belos sons ao tocar nas cordas. Ele mais tarde percebeu que o instrumento tinha poderes mágicos e que os sons que dele emanavam permitiam que se defendesse de predadores.

English_Translator: Lady Lucy the Night Caster once wielded the power of light. However, during a great battle, Lucy was bitten by a Titan of the night. Tried as she did, there was nothing she could do to stop its venom from coursing through her veins and soon even her powerful light magic was transformed by the darkness. Terrified by this change, she fled her home leaving behind her family and her beloved sister. She knew that she could not bring herself to face them now that she belonged to the darkness. Her magic no longer healed and protected, but wreaked havoc and brought desolation. It felt as if everything that her family once stood for - light, justice, hope - was now ruined because of her. For a long time, Lucy hid high up in the mountains, frantically trying to bring her newly dark magic back to the light. She hated herself. What she allowed to happen to her was unforgivable. Lucy fell into despair. Her only comfort was the tireless training she put herself through every day. Even though Lucy was now a night caster, she vowed to not stop practicing until she found a way to use her magic for good. She would use this magic to protect others from suffering, instead of bringing it upon them. They would call her Queen of the Night and she would use the dark forbidden magic that she once feared to stop the true evils of the world.
English: Lady Lucy the Night Caster once wielded the power of light. However, during a great battle, Lucy was bitten by a Titan of the night. Tried as she did, there was nothing she could do to stop its venom from coursing through her veins and soon even her powerful light magic was transformed by the darkness. Terrified by this change, she fled her home leaving behind her family and her beloved sister. She knew that she could not bring herself to face them now that she belonged to the darkness. Her magic no longer healed and protected, but wreaked havoc and brought desolation. It felt as if everything that her family once stood for - light, justice, hope - was now ruined because of her. For a long time, Lucy hid high up in the mountains, frantically trying to bring her newly dark magic back to the light. She hated herself. What she allowed to happen to her was unforgivable. Lucy fell into despair. Her only comfort was the tireless training she put herself through every day. Even though Lucy was now a night caster, she vowed to not stop practicing until she found a way to use her magic for good. She would use this magic to protect others from suffering, instead of bringing it upon them. They would call her Queen of the Night and she would use the dark forbidden magic that she once feared to stop the true evils of the world.
ChineseTrad: 暗夜咒者露西女士曾經行使光之魔力。然而，在一場大戰之中，露西被一隻暗夜巨人咬傷。雖然她努力阻止，但卻無法方法阻止巨人的毒液流經全身血管，很快地甚至連她強大的光之魔法都被黑暗所轉變。
ChineseSimp: 暗夜术士露西女士曾拥有光之力。但在一场激战中，露西被一个夜之巨人咬伤了。尽管她努力尝试，但仍旧无法阻止毒液迅速流过她的血管，很快她那强大的光明魔法也变成了黑暗法术。
Japanese: 夜の詠唱者レディルーシーはその昔、光の力を操っていました。しかしある大きな戦いのさなか、ルーシーは夜のタイタンに噛まれてしまいます。どれだけ手を尽くしてもタイタンの毒素が全身の血管を駆けめぐるのを止めることはできず、やがて強力だった光の魔法も闇に変貌してしまったのです。
Korean: 흑마법사, 루시 부인은 한때 빛의 힘을 구사했습니다. 하지만 대전쟁 도중에 루시는 어둠의 타이탄에게 물렸습니다. 노력해 보았지만 타이탄의 독이 혈관을 타고 흐르는 것을 막을 방도가 없었고, 이내 루시의 강력한 빛의 마법도 어둠의 마법으로 변했습니다.
Danish: Lady Lucy, Nattemageren, kæmpede en gang med lysets kræfter. Men under en voldsom kamp blev hun bidt af en af nattens titaner. Selvom hun prøvede, kunne hun ikke forhindre giften i at sprede sig i årerne, og kort efter blev hendes kræfter overtaget af mørket.
Dutch: Lady Lucy de nachtwerpster had ooit de macht over het licht. Tijdens een groot gevecht werd ze echter gebeten door een Titaan van de nacht. Ze probeerde alles, maar er was niets dat ze kon doen om te voorkomen dat het gif door haar aderen stroomde en al snel was zelfs haar krachtige lichtmagie getransformeerd door de duisternis.
French: Dame Lucy, la noctomancienne, maniait jadis les pouvoirs de la lumière. Hélas, Lucy fut mordue par un Titan de la nuit au cours d'une farouche bataille. Malgré tous ses efforts, elle ne put rien faire pour empêcher son venin de parcourir ses veines. Bientôt, même sa puissante magie de la lumière fut transformée par les ténèbres.
German: Lady Lucy, die Nachtzauberin, beherrschte einst die Macht des Lichts. Eines Nachts jedoch wurde sie während eines großen Kampfes von einem Titanen gebissen. Trotz aller möglichen Versuche gab es nichts, womit sie dessen Gift davon abhalten konnte, durch ihre Venen zu fließen. Bald darauf wurde sogar ihre Lichtmagie durch die Dunkelheit verwandelt.
Italian: Lady Lucy, Incantatrice notturna, deteneva un tempo il potere della luce. Tuttavia, nel corso di una battaglia campale Lucy fu morsa da un titano della notte. Fece di tutto per impedire al veleno di diffondersi nelle sue vene, ma fu inutile. In breve tempo, la sua potente magia della luce venne trasformata dalle tenebre che scorrevano in lei.
Norwegian: Lady Lucy hadde i sin tid lyset i sin makt. Men i et stort slag ble hun bitt av en av nattens titaner. Selv om hun prøvde, var det ingenting hun kunne gjøre for å hindre giften fra titanen i å strømme gjennom årene hennes, og snart ble den kraftige lysmagien hennes forvandlet av mørket.
Russian: Давным-давно леди Люси, заклинательница ночи, владела силой света. Но в одной великой битве ее укусил титан ночи. Как леди Люси ни старалась, остановить яд уже было нельзя. Вскоре ее могущественная магия света была преобразована тьмой.
Spanish: La hechicera nocturna Lady Lucy podía blandir la energía de la luz. Un día, mientras se enfrentaba a un titán nocturno en una cruenta batalla, recibió un mordisco. A pesar de sus esfuerzos, no pudo impedir que el veneno se abriera camino por su sistema sanguíneo y tornara su magia lumínica en la más profunda oscuridad.
Swedish: Lady Lucy, nattbesvärjaren, besatt en gång ljusets kraft, men under en stor strid blev Lucy biten av en nattens titan. Fast hon försökte kunde hon inte hindra dess gift från att flöda genom hennes ådror och snart förvandlades även hennes kraftfulla ljusmagi av mörkret.
Turkish: Gecenin Leydisi Lucy bir zamanlar ışığın gücünü kullandı. Ancak büyük bir savaş sırasında Lucy, gecenin Titanı tarafından ısırıldı. Ne kadar çabalasa da Titan zehrinin damarlarına yayılmasını ve kısa süre sonra aydınlık gücünün karanlıkça esir alınmasını engelleyemedi.
Portuguese: Lady Lucy, a Lançadora da Noite, no passado dominava o poder da luz. Entretanto, durante uma grande batalha, Lucy foi mordida por um Titã da noite. Por mais que tenha tentado, não havia nada que pudesse fazer para evitar que o veneno dele fluísse por suas veias e logo sua poderosa magia da luz foi transformada pela escuridão.

English_Translator: Finn the Funny Guard is a peculiar human who lives with the droids inside the safe walls of Metallic City. Finn has only ever lived with the droids in this city. The droids have equipped him with the best possible weaponry and put him through multiple training programs to overcome the downfalls of his frail human body. His reflexes have been trained to overcome his human limitations and mimic the speed of the perfect droids around him. They have made him the only human to achieve such a feat. Despite the droids' best efforts, Finn cannot escape his humanity. Finn constantly tries to make jokes and the droids do not find this amusing.But Finn will not give up, as he is determined to one day get a chuckle out of them. Finn will leave the city to find the index droid he witnessed become accidentally ejected out of the Metallic City library. With all of its information stored, Finn has faith that this particular droid would get his jokes. He leaves the only city he's ever known to venture out into the unknown lands and look for this droid — a potential new friend.
English: Finn the Funny Guard is a peculiar human who lives with the droids inside the safe walls of Metallic City. Finn has only ever lived with the droids in this city. The droids have equipped him with the best possible weaponry and put him through multiple training programs to overcome the downfalls of his frail human body. His reflexes have been trained to overcome his human limitations and mimic the speed of the perfect droids around him. They have made him the only human to achieve such a feat. Despite the droids' best efforts, Finn cannot escape his humanity. Finn constantly tries to make jokes and the droids do not find this amusing.But Finn will not give up, as he is determined to one day get a chuckle out of them. Finn will leave the city to find the index droid he witnessed become accidentally ejected out of the Metallic City library. With all of its information stored, Finn has faith that this particular droid would get his jokes. He leaves the only city he's ever known to venture out into the unknown lands and look for this droid — a potential new friend.
ChineseTrad: 搞笑守衛芬恩是一名和機器人住在金屬城安全高牆內的奇特人類。
ChineseSimp: 怪异卫兵费恩是一个古怪的人，他和机器人一起住在金属城的安全城墙内。
Japanese: おもしろ警護官フィンはメタリックシティの頑丈な壁の内側でドロイドと暮らす変わり者です。
Korean: 괴짜 경비병, 핀은 금속 도시의 튼튼한 벽 안에서 드로이드와 함께 사는 특이한 인간입니다.
Danish: Finn den Sjove Vogter er et besynderligt menneske, som bor med droiderne bag de trygge murer omkring Metalbyen.
Dutch: Finn de vrolijke bewaker is een vreemd persoon die bij de robots woont binnen de veilige muren van Metallic City.
French: Finn, le garde cocasse, est un humain étonnant vivant parmi les droïdes dans l'enceinte de la Cité Métallique.
German: Finn, der lustige Wächter, ist ein seltsamer Mensch, der mit Droiden innerhalb der sicheren Mauern von Metallstadt lebt.
Italian: Finn, Guardia bizzarra, è un umano piuttosto particolare che vive insieme ai droidi ben protetto dalle mura della Città Metallica.
Norwegian: Finn Fjollevakt er en snodig kar som lever sammen med droidene i murene i Metallic City.
Russian: Финн Забавный Стражник - необычный человек, живущий среди дроидов за безопасными стенами Металлического города.
Spanish: Finn, el guardia gracioso, es un humano peculiar que vive a salvo entre androides tras los muros de la Ciudad Metálica.
Swedish: Finn, den lustiga vakten, är en besynnerlig människa som lever med androiderna inom Metallstadens murar.
Turkish: Komik Bekçi Finn, Metalik Şehrin korunaklı duvarlarının ardında droidlerle yaşayan tuhaf bir insandır.
Portuguese: Finn, o Guarda Engraçado, é um humano peculiar que vive com os robôs por trás das seguras muralhas da Cidade Metálica.

English_Translator: Maple the Autumn Guardian is the ever vigilant sentry, tasked with keeping a close eye on the Twilight portals. To carry out this task, the Autumn Goddess has granted her the ability to see the world that lies in the in-between. Maple has always been considered more dangerous than the Spring, Summer and Winter watchers and has thus been assigned to the Twilight portals, the thinnest veil that lies between the light and the dark. Maple is able to channel the power of the in-between through her staff, giving her both the offensive magic that lurks in dark and the defensive power that shines in the light. While patrolling, Maple noticed one of the Twilight portals beginning to shudder violently. Without warning, the portal burst open, sending hundreds of Titans flooding outwards. Maple looked around frantically for help as a large shadow formed where she stood. Above her was a huge, winged beast with green scales and sapphire eyes. Atop the flying beast sat a girl, eyes fixed on the monsters spewing from the portal. Maple was the Autumn Guardian, and it was her job to defend against whatever came through the portals. As Maple charged the growing Titan horde, a loud roar echoed through the sky and the girl and her beast dove into the fight. With their help, Maple forced the Titans back through the portal, drawing enough energy from the in-between to seal it once again. She inspected the portal and noticed large cracks beginning to form. The portal would need to be repaired to prevent another outbreak of Titans, or anything worse. To thank the beast rider, Maple would allow her to stay among the Guradians and the rest of her company, keeping watch with her until the portal could be fully repaired.
English: Maple the Autumn Guardian is the ever vigilant sentry, tasked with keeping a close eye on the Twilight portals. To carry out this task, the Autumn Goddess has granted her the ability to see the world that lies in the in-between. Maple has always been considered more dangerous than the Spring, Summer and Winter watchers and has thus been assigned to the Twilight portals, the thinnest veil that lies between the light and the dark. Maple is able to channel the power of the in-between through her staff, giving her both the offensive magic that lurks in dark and the defensive power that shines in the light. While patrolling, Maple noticed one of the Twilight portals beginning to shudder violently. Without warning, the portal burst open, sending hundreds of Titans flooding outwards. Maple looked around frantically for help as a large shadow formed where she stood. Above her was a huge, winged beast with green scales and sapphire eyes. Atop the flying beast sat a girl, eyes fixed on the monsters spewing from the portal. Maple was the Autumn Guardian, and it was her job to defend against whatever came through the portals. As Maple charged the growing Titan horde, a loud roar echoed through the sky and the girl and her beast dove into the fight. With their help, Maple forced the Titans back through the portal, drawing enough energy from the in-between to seal it once again. She inspected the portal and noticed large cracks beginning to form. The portal would need to be repaired to prevent another outbreak of Titans, or anything worse. To thank the beast rider, Maple would allow her to stay among the Guradians and the rest of her company, keeping watch with her until the portal could be fully repaired.
ChineseTrad: 秋季守護者小楓是個永遠保持警戒的守衛，身負細心守護暮光傳送門的任務。為了執行這項任務，秋季女神賦予她能觀看中間世界的能力。
ChineseSimp: 秋季卫士阿枫是个时刻保持警惕的哨兵，他的任务是监视暮光传送门。为了完成这项任务，秋之女神赐予了她看到处于阴阳两界之间的世界的能力。
Japanese: 秋の守護者メープルは決して油断することのない見張り番で、たそがれの門の監視を命じられています。この使命を全うさせるため、秋の女神は彼女に「狭間の世界」を見る力を授けました。
Korean: 가을의 수호자, 메이플은 항상 빈틈없는 감시자이며, 황혼 차원문을 예의 주시하는 임무를 받았습니다. 이 임무를 수행하기 위해, 가을의 여신이 차원의 틈에 놓인 세계를 보는 능력을 부여했습니다.
Danish: Maple, Efterårets Vogter er en årvågen vagt, der beskytter tusmørkets portaler. Efterårsgudinden har givet hende kræfter, der gør det muligt for hende at se, hvad der foregår i mellemrumsverdenen.
Dutch: Maple de herfstbewaarder is de altijd waakzame bewaker, die belast is met het in de gaten houden van de Schemerportalen. Voor het uitvoeren van deze taak heeft de Herfstgodin haar de vaardigheid geschonken om de wereld die in de schemerzone ligt te kunnen zien.
French: Maple, la gardienne de l'automne, est chargée de surveiller les portails du Crépuscule avec une attention de tous les instants. Pour y parvenir, la déesse de l'automne lui a octroyé la faculté de voir le monde qui s'étend dans l'entre-deux.
German: Der Herbstwächter Ahorn ist ein ausgezeichneter Bewacher und hält die Zwielichtportale genauestens im Auge. Damit er diesen Auftrag ausführen kann, hat ihm die Herbstgöttin ihre Fähigkeit verliehen, die Welt dazwischen sehen zu können.
Italian: Maple, Guardiana dell'autunno, è una sentinella sempre vigile, il cui compito è quello di sorvegliare da vicino i portali del crepuscolo. Affinché sia in grado di portare a termine la propria missione, la dea dell'autunno le ha dato la possibilità di vedere ciò che sta nel mezzo fra i due mondi.
Norwegian: Lønn Høstvokter er en årvåken vakt som har i oppgave å bevokte skumringsportalene. For å hjelpe ham med denne oppgaven har høstgudinnen gitt henne evnen å se inn i mellomverdenen.
Russian: Клен Осенняя Стражница всегда бдительна. Она охраняет Сумеречные порталы. Специально для этой задачи Богиня Осени наделила ее способностью видеть мир, который лежит за пределами обычного взгляда.
Spanish: Arce la Guardiana Otoñal es una centinela que está siempre alerta. Su misión consiste en defender de cerca los portales del crepúsculo. Para ello, la diosa del otoño le ha concedido el don de ver un mundo paralelo.
Swedish: Maple, höstens väktare, är den ständigt vaksamma vaktposten som håller ögonen på Skymningsportalerna. För att kunna utföra denna uppgift har höstgudinnan gett henne förmågan att se mellanvärlden.
Turkish: Sonbahar Muhafızı Maple, Alacakaranlık geçitlerinden gözünü ayırmayan uyanık bir nöbetçidir. Sonbahar Tanrıçası, görevini yerine getirebilmesi için ona, arada kalan dünyayı da görme yeteneğini bahşetmiştir.
Portuguese: Maple, a Guardiã do Outono, é uma sentinela sempre vigilante, incumbida da missão de manter um olhar atento nos portais do Crepúsculo. Para executar esta tarefa, a Deusa do Outono deu a ela a habilidade de ver o mundo que existe no meio.

English_Translator: Yzafa the Fearsome Bandit is a ruthlessly brutal bandit who targets the rich and corrupt. He takes everything from his victims, leaving them as nothing more than a mere memory to the rest of the world. Some members of Yzafa's crew fear that he's been slowly losing his sanity ever since his run-in with that mysterious, bubbling pool. He called them all cowards as he waded in it. Yzafa tries really hard to control the manic episodes that have been taking control ever since then... Well, not too hard. With each passing day, more and more of his actions seem like they're controlled by something else. He's become so erratic that some of his men talk of mutiny, even challenging him for control of the crew. They say he can't be trusted. Some of the crew have even tried to fight him — They all lost, of course. It was a mess after. It looked like he couldn't stop the rush of excitement he got from brutally pummeling them, even after they were beat. Some survived these fights, while others didn't. He says he feels terrible about it after — hates it even. I wonder if he realizes that every fight just makes him more bloodthirsty and uncontrollable. He tries to keep the sickness to himself and lets everyone think it is all a part of his act, to instill fear in others. He told a few of us to find a healer that can stop the darkness from creeping into his head. Now we steal more and more to so we can pay a healer, once found.
English: Yzafa the Fearsome Bandit is a ruthlessly brutal bandit who targets the rich and corrupt. He takes everything from his victims, leaving them as nothing more than a mere memory to the rest of the world. Some members of Yzafa's crew fear that he's been slowly losing his sanity ever since his run-in with that mysterious, bubbling pool. He called them all cowards as he waded in it. Yzafa tries really hard to control the manic episodes that have been taking control ever since then... Well, not too hard. With each passing day, more and more of his actions seem like they're controlled by something else. He's become so erratic that some of his men talk of mutiny, even challenging him for control of the crew. They say he can't be trusted. Some of the crew have even tried to fight him — They all lost, of course. It was a mess after. It looked like he couldn't stop the rush of excitement he got from brutally pummeling them, even after they were beat. Some survived these fights, while others didn't. He says he feels terrible about it after — hates it even. I wonder if he realizes that every fight just makes him more bloodthirsty and uncontrollable. He tries to keep the sickness to himself and lets everyone think it is all a part of his act, to instill fear in others. He told a few of us to find a healer that can stop the darkness from creeping into his head. Now we steal more and more to so we can pay a healer, once found.
ChineseTrad: 恐怖強盜伊札法是個殘酷無情的強盜，專以有錢人和腐敗墮落的人為目標。他會奪走受害者的一切，只留下他們殘存在這世上的記憶。
ChineseSimp: 恐怖大盗伊扎法是个针对富人和贪官的野蛮土匪。他会剥夺受害者的一切，让他们仅成为人们脑海中的一段回忆。
Japanese: 恐るべき盗賊イザファは堕落した人間や金持ちを狙う乱暴で容赦のない盗賊です。彼は獲物からすべてを奪います。残されるものといえば、そんな人が存在したなというかすかな記憶だけです。
Korean: 무시무시한 강도, 이자파는 부유한 자와 부패한 자를 대상으로 삼는 무자비하고 잔인한 강도입니다. 이자파는 희생자로부터 모든 것을 빼앗고 살해해 한낱 기억에 불과한 신세로 만듭니다.
Danish: Yzafa den Grusomme Bandit er en nådesløs og brutal forbryder, der går efter de rige og korrupte. Han tager alt fra sine ofre, så de til sidst blot er et svagt minde blandt de, der kendte dem.
Dutch: Yzafa de geduchte bandiet is een meedogenloos brutale bandiet die de rijken en de corrupten aanpakt. Hij pakt alles af van zijn slachtoffers en laat niet meer van ze over dan slechts een herinnering voor de rest van de wereld.
French: Yzafa, l'effroyable brigand, est un malfaiteur brutal et sans scrupule qui cible les nantis et les corrompus. Il dépouille entièrement ses victimes en ne laissant d'eux qu'un souvenir pour le reste du monde.
German: Yzafa, der fürchterliche Bandit, ist ein rücksichtsloser und brutaler Räuber, der es auf die Reichen und Verruchten abgesehen hat. Er nimmt seinen Opfern alles und lässt sie dem Rest der Welt nur noch als Erinnerung zurück.
Italian: Yzafa, Bandito terribile, è un bandito brutale e spietato che prende di mira i ricchi e i corrotti. Ruba dai cadaveri delle sue vittime ogni oggetto prezioso, lasciandole spoglie e abbandonate.
Norwegian: Den fryktede banditten Yzafa er en hensynsløs og brutal kar som går etter de rike og korrupte. Han tar alt han kan fra sine ofre, og når han er ferdig, er det bare et fjernt minne igjen av dem.
Russian: Йцафа Разбойник - безжалостный бандит, нападающий на богачей и развращенных властью вельмож. Он отбирает у своих жертв абсолютно все, оставляя лишь воспоминания о них.
Spanish: Yzafa el Bandido Temible es un rufián sin escrúpulos que persigue a los ricos y a los corruptos. Despoja a sus víctimas de todas sus posesiones hasta que se convierten en un mero recuerdo difuso.
Swedish: Yzafa, den skrämmande banditen, är en brutal bandit som ger sig på de rika och korrupta. Han tar allt från sina offer och lämnar bara minnet av dem till resten av världen.
Turkish: Korkusuz Harami Yzafa zenginleri ve yozlaşmış insanları hedef alan acımasız bir zalimdir. Kurbanlarını soyup soğana çevirir, onları bir hayal gibi ortada bırakır.
Portuguese: Yzafa, o Temível Bandido, é um brutal e impiedoso bandido que tem como alvo os ricos e corruptos. Ele tira tudo de suas vítimas, deixando-as com nada além de uma mera lembrança para o resto do mundo.

English_Translator: Damon of the Darkness was once the Prince of all Titans until he was overthrown by his own subjects. His rage is so overwhelming that anything which draws close to him bursts into flames; reduced to ash in the blink of an eye. Damon would never again let anyone take him lightly or doubt his power. This furious ruler longs for revenge on those who fought against him and seeks to bring order to the Titans – even if it means teaching every single one of them a lesson. Banished to the upperworld, Damon crafted a scheme to take back his throne. He needed an army, pawns that would fight for his cause. It was sickening Damon to even think about allying with mortals, but necessary if he were to ever to sit atop his throne once again. He would show those who usurped him the repercussions of their foolish actions, and the punishment that awaits for exiling him from his own home. Damon thought he could never bring himself to respect these soft, weak beings called mortals. However, something about how hard they fought for Damon and fearlessly trusted him, an outsider, began to grow on him. Maybe it was just the air in the upper world. He was beginning to feel sick again.
English: Damon of the Darkness was once the Prince of all Titans until he was overthrown by his own subjects. His rage is so overwhelming that anything which draws close to him bursts into flames; reduced to ash in the blink of an eye. Damon would never again let anyone take him lightly or doubt his power. This furious ruler longs for revenge on those who fought against him and seeks to bring order to the Titans – even if it means teaching every single one of them a lesson.
