Banished to the upperworld, Damon crafted a scheme to take back his throne. He needed an army, pawns that would fight for his cause. It was sickening Damon to even think about allying with mortals, but necessary if he were to ever to sit atop his throne once again. He would show those who usurped him the repercussions of their foolish actions, and the punishment that awaits for exiling him from his own home. Damon thought he could never bring himself to respect these soft, weak beings called mortals. However, something about how hard they fought for Damon and fearlessly trusted him, an outsider, began to grow on him. Maybe it was just the air in the upper world. He was beginning to feel sick again.
ChineseTrad: 黑暗戴蒙曾經是所有巨人的王子，直到他被自己的子民推翻。他的憤怒如此強大，任何靠近他的東西都會變成一團火焰，瞬間化為灰燼。戴蒙不會再讓任何人輕視他或質疑他的力量。這名憤怒的統治者渴望對反抗他的人復仇，並想替巨人帶來秩序，即使要教訓所有人也在所不惜。
ChineseSimp: 黑暗达蒙曾是所有巨人的王子，直到他被自己的臣民推翻。他的愤怒如此强烈，任何接近他的东西都会在瞬间燃烧殆尽。达蒙永远不会再让任何人看轻他或质疑他的力量。这个愤怒的统治者渴望向那些曾与他争战的人复仇，并力求整顿巨人们，即使这意味着要好好教训他们每个人。
Japanese: 闇生まれのデーモンはかつて全タイタンの王子でしたが、自らの家臣によってその座を追われてしまいました。彼の怒りは尋常ではなく、彼に近づくものは例外なく炎に包まれ、またたく間に灰と化してしまいます。今後はもう誰も彼を軽視し、その力を疑うことはできないでしょう。この憤激の君主は自分に歯向かったものへの復讐を望んでおり、タイタン族に秩序をもたらそうと考えています。そのためならタイタンたちを痛い目に合わせることも厭いません。
Korean: 어둠의 데이먼은 한때 모든 타이탄의 왕자였으나 신하들에 의해 타도당했습니다. 데이먼의 분노는 너무나 강해 가까이 다가온 모든 것이 불에 휩싸이고 눈 깜짝할 사이에 재가 됩니다. 데이먼은 누구라도 자신을 얕보거나 능력을 의심한다면 절대로 용납하지 않을 것입니다. 분노한 지배자 데이먼은 반역자들에 대한 복수를 열망하고 타이탄 세계의 질서를 추구합니다. 그리고 이를 위해서라면 기꺼이 한 명도 빠짐없이 처벌할 것입니다.
Danish: Damon af Mørket var Prins af Titanerne, indtil han blev væltet af sine undersåtter. Hans vrede er så overvældende, at alt, han kommer i nærheden af, går op i flammer og brænder væk på et splitsekund. Damon har sværget, at ingen nogensinde vil undervurdere ham igen. Den vrede hersker længes efter hævn over alle, der kæmpede mod ham, og at skabe orden i titanernes verden. Også hvis det betyder, at han må lære dem alle en lektie.
Dutch: Damon van de duisternis was ooit Prins van alle Titanen tot hij door zijn eigen onderdanen werd afgezet. Zijn woede is zo overweldigend dat alles wat bij hem in de buurt komt in vlammen uitbarst en in een oogwenk tot as is vergaan. Damon zal nooit meer toestaan dat iemand hem onderschat of zijn macht in twijfel trekt. De furieuze heerser verlangt naar wraak op hen die tegen hem vochten en wil de Titanen orde bijbrengen, ook als dat betekent dat hij ze allemaal een lesje moet leren.
French: Celui qu'on nomme Damon des ténèbres était le prince de tous les Titans, jusqu'au jour où il fut renversé par ses propres sujets. Sa rage est à ce point incontrôlable que tout ce qui s'approche de lui s'embrase et est réduit en cendres en un instant. Damon compte bien ne plus jamais laisser quiconque le prendre à la légère ou douter de son pouvoir. Ce souverain furieux cherche à se venger de ses opposants et à ramener l'ordre chez les Titans... quitte à inculquer une bonne leçon à chacun d'entre eux.
German: Der Dämon der Dunkelheit war einst der Prinz aller Titanen. Bis er dann von seinen eigenen Untertanen gestürzt wurde. Sein Zorn darüber ist so heftig, dass alles, was ihm zu nahe kommt, in Flammen aufgeht und in Augenblicken zu Asche verbrannt ist. Der Dämon wird niemals mehr zulassen, dass ihn jemand auf die leichte Schulter nimmt oder seine Macht bezweifelt. Der wütende Herrscher will sich an denjenigen rächen, die gegen ihn gekämpft haben und will die Titanen zur Ordnung rufen – selbst wenn das bedeutet, dass er dafür jedem einzelnen eine Lektion erteilen muss.
Italian: Damon, seguace dell'oscurità, è stato il principe dei titani fino a quando non fu rovesciato dai suoi stessi sudditi. La sua ira è talmente incontrollabile che brucia e incenerisce in un battibaleno tutti coloro che si avvicinano a lui. Damon non permetterà mai più a nessuno di prenderlo alla leggera o di mettere in dubbio il suo potere. Il sovrano iracondo brama vendetta nei confronti di chi lo ha rovesciato dal trono e desidera riportare l'ordine fra i titani... anche se questo potrebbe portarlo a dover dare una lezione ad alcuni di essi.
Norwegian: Mørke-Damon var en gang i tiden prins over alle titanene, helt til han ble styrtet av sine egne. Nå er han så rasende at alt og alle som kommer nær ham, går opp i flammer og blir til aske i løpet av et øyeblikk. Damon vil aldri mer at noen skal undervurdere ham eller tvile på hans kraft. Den rasende herskeren lengter etter å ta hevn over de som kjempet mot ham, og han vil bringe orden i titanenes rekker – om han så må gi dem alle en lærepenge.
Russian: Давным-давно Дэймон Тьмы был повелителем титанов, пока они его не свергли. Его ярость столь огромна, что все вокруг него тут же окутывается пламенем, сгорая дотла в мгновение ока. Дэймон больше никому не позволит относиться к нему несерьезно или усомниться в его могуществе. Яростный правитель жаждет отмщения для тех, кто сражался против него, и ищет способ навести порядок в стане титанов - даже если придется проучить каждого из них.
Spanish: Damon el Oscuro era el príncipe de los titanes hasta que sus súbditos lo derrocaron. Su ira es tan implacable que todo lo que se encuentra cerca se prende fuego y acaba convertido en cenizas. Damon detesta que no lo tomen en serio y que cuestionen su poder. Este iracundo gobernante arde en deseos de vengarse de quienes lucharon contra él y pretende poner a raya a los titanes, aunque eso suponga darles una lección.
Swedish: Damon av mörkret var en gång prins av alla titaner innan han störtades av sina egna undersåtar. Hans raseri är så överväldigande att allt som närmar sig honom antänds och blir till aska på ett ögonblick. Damon skulle aldrig mer låta någon underskatta honom eller tvivla på hans kraft. Den rasande regenten längtar efter hämnd mot de som kämpade mot honom, och vill skapa ordning bland titanerna, även om det innebär att lära var och en av dem en läxa.
Turkish: Karanlık Damon, kendi tebası tarafından tahttan indirilene kadar tüm Titanların Prensiydi. Öfkesi öyle kuvvetliydi ki ona yaklaşan herkes alevlere kapılır, göz açıp kapayıncaya kadar küle dönerdi. Damon, kimsenin onu hafife almasına ve gücünden şüphe duymasına izin vermez. Öfkeli lider, ona savaş açanlardan intikam almak ve Titanları düzene sokmak için yaşar, gerekirse bu amaç uğruna hepsine tek tek ders verebilir.
Portuguese: Damon da Escuridão era o Príncipe de todos os Titãs até ser deposto por um dos seus próprios súditos. Sua ira é tão grande que qualquer coisa que se aproxime dele arde em chamas, reduzida a cinzas num piscar de olhos. Damon nunca mais deixará alguém duvidar dele ou de seu poder. O furioso governante deseja vingança contra aqueles que o enfrentaram e busca trazer ordem aos Titãs, mesmo que para isso tenha de ensinar uma lição a cada um deles.

English_Translator: Mina the Priestess of Light was an orphan adopted into a family of prestigious light magic practitioners. It was discovered that she has tremendous healing abilities and is able to create impenetrable magical barriers to protect others. Mina hadn't been the same ever since her dear sister left the village and no matter who she asked, no one had any idea as to where her sister had gone. Months passed and in her sadness one night, Mina slept in her sister's room, comforted by the memories of her. In the middle of the night, Mina heard a strange sound — a loud fluttering of giant wings outside her sister's window. A terrible feeling washed over her. She wanted whatever was outside to come closer, to come inside and be with her. Mina forced these thoughts from her mind and with all the strength in her body, whispered the words of a protective incantation. A huge barrier of light grabbed hold of her and pushed the wretched thing away, retreating it into the darkness of the night. When she finally caught her breath, Mina shuddered at the thought of her sister being drawn out into the night by this evil force. Mina thought of her sister lost outside, surrounded by darkness and all alone. Mina needs to find her dearest sister, before something terrible happens.
English: Mina the Priestess of Light was an orphan adopted into a family of prestigious light magic practitioners. It was discovered that she has tremendous healing abilities and is able to create impenetrable magical barriers to protect others. Mina hadn't been the same ever since her dear sister left the village and no matter who she asked, no one had any idea as to where her sister had gone. Months passed and in her sadness one night, Mina slept in her sister's room, comforted by the memories of her. In the middle of the night, Mina heard a strange sound — a loud fluttering of giant wings outside her sister's window. A terrible feeling washed over her. She wanted whatever was outside to come closer, to come inside and be with her. Mina forced these thoughts from her mind and with all the strength in her body, whispered the words of a protective incantation. A huge barrier of light grabbed hold of her and pushed the wretched thing away, retreating it into the darkness of the night. When she finally caught her breath, Mina shuddered at the thought of her sister being drawn out into the night by this evil force. Mina thought of her sister lost outside, surrounded by darkness and all alone. Mina needs to find her dearest sister, before something terrible happens.
ChineseTrad: 光之修女米娜曾是個孤兒，被一個深具名望，善使光之魔法的家族收養。她被發現擁有強大的治療能力，能創造出堅固的魔法屏障來保護他人。
ChineseSimp: 光之女祭司米娜曾是一名孤儿，后来她被一个有名望的光之魔法师家庭收养了。后来大家发现她具有巨大的治疗能力，并能制造坚不可摧的魔法屏障来保护他人。
Japanese: 孤児だった光の神官ミーナは誉れ高い光魔法の使い手の一家に育てられました。後になって彼女にとてつもない治癒能力があり、決して破れない魔法の壁を生んで仲間を守ることができると判明したのです。
Korean: 빛의 여사제, 미나는 빛 마법을 전문으로 하는 명문 집안으로 입양된 고아였습니다. 이후에 미나는 굉장한 치유 능력을 가졌고 꿰뚫을 수 없는 마법 장벽을 생성해 다른 사람들을 보호할 수 있다는 것이 발견됐습니다.
Danish: Mina, Lysets Præstinde, blev som forældreløs adopteret af en velanset familie, der dyrkede lysets magi. De opdagede hurtigt, at hun havde helende evner og kan skabe uigennemtrængelige magiske barrierer, der beskytter andre.
Dutch: Mina de priesteres van het licht was een weesje dat is geadopteerd door een familie van prestigieuze beoefenaars van lichtmagie. Men ontdekte dat ze enorme genezingskrachten heeft en ondoordringbare magische barrières kan maken om anderen te beschermen.
French: Mina, la prêtresse de la lumière, était une orpheline adoptée par une famille de prestigieux mages de la lumière. Il est apparu qu'elle disposait d'incroyables talents curatifs et pouvait créer des barrières magiques impénétrables pour protéger les autres.
German: Mina, die Priesterin des Lichts, war ein von einer angesehenen Familie von Lichtmagiern adoptiertes Waisenkind. Man fand heraus, dass sie über gewaltige Heilfähigkeiten verfügt und unüberwindbare magische Barrieren zum Schutz von anderen errichten kann.
Italian: Mina, Sacerdotessa della luce, era un'orfanella adottata da una celebre famiglia di adepti della magia della luce. I suoi genitori scoprirono le sue incredibili abilità di guarigione e la sua capacità di creare barriere magiche impenetrabili per proteggere chi la circonda.
Norwegian: Lyspresten Mina var en foreldreløs jentunge som ble adoptert av en familie av lysmagikere. De oppdaget at hun hadde fantastiske helbredende evner og kunne skape ugjennomtrengelige magiske skjold som beskytter andre.
Russian: Майну, жрицу Света, ребенком взяла из приюта семья влиятельных светлых магов. Выяснилось, что девочка обладает потрясающими целительными способностями и может создавать непробиваемые защитные барьеры.
Spanish: Mina la sacerdotisa de la Luz es una huérfana que fue adoptada por una prestigiosa familia de magos lumínicos. Con el tiempo, se descubrió que tenía una capacidad milagrosa para sanar y que era capaz de crear barreras mágicas infranqueables para proteger a los demás.
Swedish: Mina, ljusprästen, var föräldralös och adopterades av en familj prestigefyllda ljusmagiker. De upptäckte att hon har otroliga läkeförmågor och kan skapa ogenomträngliga magiska barriärer för att skydda andra.
Turkish: Aydınlığın Rahibesi Mina, ünlü aydınlık büyücülerinden oluşan bir aile tarafından evlatlık edinildi. Daha sonra inanılmaz şifa yetenekleri olduğu ve diğerlerini korumak için büyülü engeller yaratabileceği keşfedildi.
Portuguese: Mina, a Sacerdotisa da Luz, era uma órfã adotada por uma família de prestigiosos praticantes da magia da luz. Descobriu-se que ela tem incríveis poderes de cura e é capaz de criar barreiras mágicas impenetráveis para proteger os outros.

Japanese: アレキサンダー王の苦悶

Notes: {0} number amount.  ie. x1 pet egg
{0} number amount.  ie. x1 random perk
{0} number amount.  ie. x1 Make It Rain perk
Danish: x{0} få det til at regne-fordel

Notes: {0} number amount.  ie. x1 Skill Point
{0} number amount.  ie. x1 Hero Weapon Upgrade

English_Translator: Come back every day for a reward! If you miss a day, WE'LL RESET THE CALENDAR!
English: Come back every day for a reward! If you miss a day, WE'LL RESET THE CALENDAR!
ChineseTrad: 每天回來領取獎勵！若你錯過一天，我們就會重設日曆！
ChineseSimp: 每天回到游戏中来都可获取奖励！如果你错过了一天，我们将会重置奖励日程！
Japanese: 毎日遊んで報酬をゲット！1日サボるとカレンダーがはリセットされます！
Korean: 매일 접속해서 보상을 받으세요! 하루라도 놓치면, 달력이 초기화됩니다!
Danish: Kom tilbage hver dag for at få en belønning! Hvis du misser en dag, NULSTILLER VI KALENDEREN!
Dutch: Kom elke dag terug voor een beloning! Als je een dag mist, RESETTEN WIJ DE KALENDER!
French: Revenez tous les jours pour obtenir une récompense ! Si vous ratez un jour, NOUS RÉINITIALISONS LE CALENDRIER !
German: Komm jeden Tag wieder und du erhältst eine Belohnung! Wenn du einen Tag verpasst, SETZEN WIR DEN KALENDER ZURÜCK!
Italian: Torna a trovarci tutti i giorni per ottenere una ricompensa! Se non torni anche solo per un giorno, IL CONTEGGIO RIPARTE DA ZERO!
Norwegian: Kom innom hver dag for en belønning! Hvis du går glipp av en dag, blir KALENDEREN NULLSTILT!
Russian: Возвращайтесь за наградами каждый день! Если вы пропустите хотя бы день, КАЛЕНДАРЬ БУДЕТ СБРОШЕН!
Spanish: ¡Vuelve todos los días para obtener una recompensa! Si faltas un día, ¡SE RESTABLECERÁ EL CALENDARIO!
Swedish: Kom tillbaka varje dag för att få en belöning! Om du missar en dag kommer vi att nollställa kalendern!
Turkish: Ödül almak için her gün geri dön! Bir günü kaçırırsan TAKVİMİ SIFIRLARIZ!
Portuguese: Volte todos os dias para receber uma recompensa. Se você perder um dia, VAMOS REINICIAR O CALENDÁRIO.

Japanese: トーナメント最高ランク

English_Translator: Befriend loyal creatures that will aid you in your journey.
Notes: description for the pre-pet scroll list
English: Befriend loyal creatures that will aid you in your journey,
ChineseTrad: 和能在旅程中協助你的忠實生物成為朋友，
ChineseSimp: 与忠诚的生物成为朋友，它们会在你的旅途中帮助你。
Japanese: 旅の供をしてくれる忠実なクリーチャーと仲良くなりましょう。
Korean: 여정을 도와줄 충성스런 생물들과 친구가 되세요.
Danish: Bliv venner med trofaste væsener, der vil hjælpe dig på din færd.
Dutch: Word vrienden met trouwe wezens die je zullen helpen op je reis.
French: Lie-toi d'amitié avec des créatures loyales qui t'aideront dans ton périple.
German: Freunde dich mit Kreaturen an, die dir auf deiner Reise helfen.
Italian: Fai amicizia con creature leali che ti aiuteranno nel tuo viaggio,
Norwegian: Bli venn med lojale skapninger som kan hjelpe deg på reisen,
Russian: Подружитесь с верными существами, которые помогут в путешествии,
Spanish: Entabla una amistad con leales criaturas que te ayudarán a lo largo de tu viaje.
Swedish: Bli vän med lojala varelser som hjälper dig på din resa.
Turkish: Yolculuğunda sana yardım edecek sadık yaratıklarla arkadaş ol,
Portuguese: Fique amigo de leais criaturas que vão ajudá-lo na sua jornada,

English_Translator: Oops, it looks like you're already in a clan. Showing your original clan...
English: Oops, it looks like you're already in a clan. Showing your original clan...
ChineseTrad: 糟糕，看來你已加入一個部落。顯示你原本的部落...
ChineseSimp: 糟糕，你好像已经在一个部落里了。显示你的初始部落…
Japanese: おっと、すでにクランに加入していますね。元のクランを表示します...
Korean: 이런, 이미 클랜에 가입했습니다. 원래의 클랜을 표시합니다...
Danish: Ups, du er vist allerede medlem af en klan. Viser din oprindelige klan ...
Dutch: Oeps, het lijkt erop dat je al in een clan zit. Je oorspronkelijke clan weergeven...
French: Oups, tu fais déjà partie d'un clan. Voici ton clan d'origine...
German: Hoppla, anscheinend bist du bereits in einem Clan. Zeige deinen ursprünglichen Clan ...
Italian: Ops, sembra che tu faccia già parte di un clan. Ecco il tuo clan originale...
Norwegian: Oops, det ser ut til at du allerede er med i en klan. Viser den opprinnelige klanen ...
Russian: Ой! Похоже, вы уже состоите в клане. Поиск вашего клана...
Spanish: Vaya, parece que ya estás en un clan. Mostrando tu clan original...
Swedish: Hoppsan! Du är visst redan med i en klan. Visar din ursprungliga klan ...
Turkish: Tüh, zaten bir klandasın. İlk klanın gösteriliyor...
Portuguese: Ops, parece que você já está em um clã. Exibindo seu clã original...

Notes: {0} is clan name, {1} is the level defeated
ChineseTrad: {0} 已擊敗等級 {1} 的巨人領主！
ChineseSimp: {0} 打败了 {1} 级巨人领主！
Japanese: {0}がレベル{1}のタイタンの長を倒しました！
Dutch: {0} heeft een Titanenlord van niv. {1} verslagen!
French: {0} a vaincu un seigneur Titan niv. {1} !
German: {0} hat einen Titanlord auf St. {1} besiegt!
Italian: Il clan {0} ha sconfitto un signore dei titani di liv. {1}!
Spanish: ¡{0} ha derrotado a un caballero titán de nivel {1}!

Notes: message for when a level of the clan quest is beaten

Japanese: 賢明なあなたのクレート金を過ごします！
Danish: Tilbring din kasse guld med omtanke!
French: Passez votre or de caisse à bon escient!
German: Verbringen Sie Ihre Kiste Gold mit Bedacht!
Italian: Trascorrere il vostro oro cassa con saggezza!
Russian: Проведите свой ящик золота с умом!
Spanish: Podrá pasar el oro del cajón con cuidado!
Portuguese: Passe o seu ouro caixa com sabedoria!

English_Translator: You have been kicked from the clan!
English: You have been kicked from the clan!
Japanese: あなたはクランから追放されました！
Danish: Du er blevet smidt ud af klanen!
Dutch: Je bent uit de clan gezet!
French: Tu as été exclu du clan !
Norwegian: Du har blitt sparket ut fra klanen!
Swedish: Du har blivit sparkad från klanen!

English_Translator: The Titans have blocked you from entering this clan, please try again later.
English: The Titans have blocked you from entering this clan, please try again later.
ChineseTrad: 巨人已阻止你進入這個部落，請稍後再試。
ChineseSimp: 巨人阻止你加入此部落，请稍后重试。
Japanese: タイタンによってクランへの加入が妨害されました。後でもう一度やり直してください。
Korean: 타이탄이 이 클랜 가입을 차단했습니다. 나중에 다시 시도하세요.
Danish: Titanerne har forhindret dig i at blive medlem af denne klan. Prøv igen senere.
Dutch: De Titanen hebben voorkomen dat je je bij deze clan aansluit. Probeer het later opnieuw.
French: Les Titans t'empêchent d'accéder à ce clan. Réessaie plus tard.
German: Die Titanen haben dich für diesen Clan gesperrt. Versuche es bitte später erneut.
Italian: I titani ti hanno impedito di unirti a questo clan. Riprova più tardi.
Norwegian: Titanene har blokkert deg fra å bli med i denne klanen. Prøv igjen senere.
Russian: Титаны помешали вам войти в этот клан. Пожалуйста, попробуйте позже.
Spanish: Los titanes han impedido que te unas al clan. Inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
Swedish: Titanerna hindrar dig från att gå med i klanen. Försök igen senare.
Turkish: Titanlar bu klana girişini engelledi, lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.
Portuguese: Os Titãs bloquearam sua entrada neste clã. Tente novamente mais tarde.

English_Translator: You'll need 5 characters at least to locate a clan!
English: You'll need 5 characters at least to locate a clan!
ChineseTrad: 你至少需要 5 個角色才能找出部落！
ChineseSimp: 你至少需要输入 5 个字符才能查找一个部落！
Japanese: クランの検索には5文字以上入力する必要があります！
Korean: 클랜을 검색하려면 최소 5자 이상을 입력해야 합니다!
Danish: Du skal angive mindst fem tegn for at finde en klan!
Dutch: Je hebt ten minste 5 tekens nodig om een clan te vinden!
French: Il te faut au moins 5 caractères pour localiser un clan !
German: Du brauchst mindestens 5 Zeichen, um einen Clan zu finden!
Italian: Ti servono almeno 5 caratteri per trovare un clan!
Norwegian: Du må skrive inn minst 5 tegn når du skal søke på en klan!
Russian: Введите как минимум 5 символов, чтобы найти клан!
Spanish: Para buscar un clan, ¡necesitas escribir al menos 5 caracteres!
Swedish: Du behöver minst 5 karaktärer för att hitta en klan!
Turkish: Bir klanı bulmak için en az 5 karaktere ihtiyacın olacak!
Portuguese: Você precisa de pelo menos 5 caracteres para localizar um clã!

English_Translator: Unfortunately, the fairies can only find clans using alphanumerics only.
English: Unfortunately, the fairies can only find clans using alphanumerics only.
ChineseTrad: 很可惜，精靈只能找出僅使用英文字母與數字的部落。
ChineseSimp: 不巧，仙女只能找到使用字母和数字的部落。
Japanese: 残念ながら、フェアリーは英数字を使わないとクランを探せないのです。
Korean: 죄송하지만 영숫자만 사용해 클랜을 검색할 수 있습니다.
Danish: Desværre kan feerne kun finde klaner ved hjælp af bogstaver og tal.
Dutch: Helaas kunnen de feeën alleen clans vinden met behulp van alfanumerieke tekens.
French: Hélas, les fées ne comprennent que les caractères alphanumériques.
German: Leider können die Feen Clans nur mit alphanumerischen Zeichen finden.
Italian: Purtroppo le fate possono trovare i clan solo usando caratteri alfanumerici.
Norwegian: Beklager, men alvene kan bare søke på klaner ved hjelp av alfanumeriske tegn.
Russian: К сожалению, феи могут найти клан только по буквам и цифрам.
Spanish: Por desgracia, las hadas solo pueden buscar clanes con caracteres alfanuméricos.
Swedish: Tyvärr kan älvorna bara hitta klaner med siffror och bokstäver.
Turkish: Ne yazık ki periler yalnızca harf ve rakamları kullanarak klanları bulabilir.
Portuguese: Infelizmente, as fadas só podem encontrar clãs usando caracteres alfanuméricos.

English_Translator: Seems like the fairies couldn't find the clan you were looking for.
English: Seems like the fairies couldn't find the clan you were looking for.
ChineseTrad: 精靈似乎找不到你在尋找的部落。
ChineseSimp: 似乎仙女找不到你要找的部落。
Japanese: フェアリーはお探しのクランを見つけられなかったようです。
Danish: Feerne kunne desværre ikke finde den klan, du søgte.
Dutch: Het lijkt erop dat de feeën niet de clan konden vinden waar jij naar zocht.
French: Les fées n'ont pas trouvé le clan que tu cherches.
German: Anscheinend konnten die Feen den Clan nicht finden, nach dem du gesucht hast.
Italian: A quanto pare, le fate non sono riuscite a trovare il clan che stavi cercando.
Norwegian: Det virker ikke som om alvene finner klanen du var ute etter.
Russian: Похоже, феям не удалось найти клан, который вы искали.
Spanish: Parece que las hadas no han podido encontrar el clan que buscabas.
Swedish: Det verkar som att älvorna inte kan hitta klanen du letar efter.
Portuguese: Parece que as fadas não conseguiram encontrar o clã que você estava procurando.

Japanese: 加入コードの更新に失敗しました。
Danish: Det lykkedes ikke at forny adgangskoden til klanen.
Dutch: Het verversen van de deelnamecode is mislukt.
French: Échec d'actualisation du code de connexion.
Italian: Impossibile aggiornare il codice di accesso.
Spanish: No se ha podido actualizar el código de unión.

English_Translator: The Titans have blocked you from sending the message, please try again later.
English: The Titans have blocked you from sending the message, please try again later.
ChineseTrad: 巨人已阻止你發送訊息，請稍後再試。
ChineseSimp: 巨人阻止你发送消息，请稍后重试。
Japanese: タイタンによってメッセージの送信が妨害されました。後でもう一度やり直してください。
Korean: 타이탄이 메시지 전송을 차단했습니다. 나중에 다시 시도하세요.
Danish: Titanerne har forhindret dig i at blive medlem af denne klan. Prøv igen senere.
Dutch: De Titanen hebben voorkomen dat je het bericht kon versturen. Probeer het later opnieuw.
French: Les Titans t'empêchent d'envoyer ce message. Réessaie plus tard.
German: Die Titanen haben dich gesperrt, sodass du diese Nachricht nicht senden kannst. Versuche es bitte später erneut.
Italian: I titani ti hanno impedito di inviare questo messaggio. Riprova più tardi.
Norwegian: Titanene har blokkert deg fra å sende meldingen. Prøv igjen senere.
Russian: Титаны помешали вам отправить сообщение. Пожалуйста, попробуйте позже.
Spanish: Los titanes han impedido que envíes el mensaje. Inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
Swedish: Titanerna hindrar dig från att skicka meddelandet. Försök igen senare.
Turkish: Titanlar mesaj göndermeni engelledi, lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.
Portuguese: Os Titãs bloquearam o envio da mensagem. Tente novamente mais tarde.

Notes: {0} is the name of the clan member

English_Translator: For some reason the Titans prevented the member from leaving the clan. Please try again later.
English: For some reason the Titans prevented the member from leaving the clan. Please try again later.
ChineseTrad: 巨人因不明原因而阻止成員離開部落。請稍後再試。
ChineseSimp: 不知何故，巨人阻止了成员脱离部落。请稍后重试。
Japanese: タイタンが何らかの理由でメンバーのクラン脱退を妨げたようです。後でもう一度やり直してください。
Korean: 알 수 없는 이유로 타이탄이 회원의 클랜 탈퇴를 막았습니다. 나중에 다시 시도하세요.
Danish: Af uransagelige årsager har titanerne forhindret dette medlem i at forlade klanen. Prøv igen senere.
Dutch: Om de een of andere reden hebben de Titanen voorkomen dat het lid de clan verliet. Probeer het later opnieuw.
French: Pour une raison indéterminée, les Titans ont empêché ce membre de quitter le clan. Réessaie plus tard.
German: Aus irgendeinem Grund haben die Titanen das Mitglied davon abgehalten, den Clan zu verlassen. Versuche es bitte später erneut.
Italian: Per qualche ragione, i titani hanno impedito a questo membro di abbandonare il clan. Riprova più tardi.
Norwegian: Av en eller annen grunn hindret titanene medlemmet i å forlate klanen. Prøv igjen senere.
Russian: Почему-то титаны помешали участнику покинуть клан. Пожалуйста, попробуйте позже.
Spanish: Por algún motivo, los titanes han impedido que el miembro abandone el clan. Inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
Swedish: Av någon anledning hindrade titanerna medlemmen från att gå ur klanen. Försök igen senare.
Turkish: Bir nedenden ötürü Titanlar bu üyenin klandan ayrılmasını engelledi. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.
Portuguese: Por alguma razão, os Titãs impediram que o membro saísse do clã. Tente novamente mais tarde.

English_Translator: It seems that the promotion was not approved by the Titans. Please try again later.
English: It seems that the promotion was not approved by the Titans. Please try again later.
ChineseTrad: 巨人似乎不認同升職。請稍後再試。
ChineseSimp: 似乎巨人不允许这次晋升。请稍后重试。
Japanese: タイタンが昇格を認めなかったようです。後でもう一度やり直してください。
Korean: 타이탄에 의해 승급이 승인되지 않은 것 같습니다. 나중에 다시 시도하세요.
Danish: Det lader til, at denne forfremmelse ikke blev godkendt af titanerne. Prøv igen senere.
Dutch: Het lijkt erop dat de bevordering niet door de Titanen is goedgekeurd. Probeer het later opnieuw.
French: Les Titans n'ont pas approuvé cette promotion. Réessaie plus tard.
German: Wie es aussieht, haben die Titanen der Beförderung nicht zugestimmt. Versuche es bitte später erneut.
Italian: Sembra che la promozione non sia stata approvata dai titani. Riprova più tardi.
Norwegian: Det later til at forfremmelsen ikke ble godkjent av titanene. Prøv igjen senere.
Russian: Кажется, это повышение титаны не одобряют. Пожалуйста, попробуйте позже.
Spanish: Parece que los titanes no han aprobado el ascenso. Inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
Swedish: Titanerna gillade visst inte befordringen. Försök igen senare.
Turkish: Görünüşe göre bu terfi Titanlar tarafından onaylanmadı. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.
Portuguese: Parece que a promoção não foi aprovada pelos Titãs. Tente novamente mais tarde.

English_Translator: It seems that the demotion was not approved by the Titans. Please try again later.
English: It seems that the demotion was not approved by the Titans. Please try again later.
ChineseTrad: 巨人似乎不認同降職。請稍後再試。
ChineseSimp: 似乎巨人不允许这次降级。请稍后重试。
Japanese: タイタンが降格を認めなかったようです。後でもう一度やり直してください。
Korean: 타이탄에 의해 강등이 승인되지 않은 것 같습니다. 나중에 다시 시도하세요.
Danish: Det lader til, at denne degradering ikke blev godkendt af titanerne. Prøv igen senere.
Dutch: Het lijkt erop dat de degradatie niet door de Titanen is goedgekeurd. Probeer het later opnieuw.
French: Les Titans n'ont pas approuvé cette rétrogradation. Réessaie plus tard.
German: Wie es aussieht, haben die Titanen der Degradierung nicht zugestimmt. Versuche es bitte später erneut.
Italian: Sembra che il declassamento non sia stato approvato dai titani. Riprova più tardi.
Norwegian: Det later til at degraderingen ikke ble godkjent av titanene. Prøv igjen senere.
Russian: Кажется, это понижение титаны не одобряют. Пожалуйста, попробуйте позже.
Spanish: Parece que los titanes no han aprobado el descenso. Inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
Swedish: Titanerna gillade visst inte nedgraderingen. Försök igen senare.
Turkish: Görünüşe göre bu rütbe düşürme isteği, Titanlar tarafından onaylanmadı. Lütfen daha sonra tekrar dene.
Portuguese: Parece que rebaixamento não foi aprovada pelos Titãs. Tente novamente mais tarde.

English_Translator: Are you sure you want to kick {0}?
Notes: {0} is the name of the clan member that you're trying to kick
English: Are you sure you want to kick {0}?
ChineseTrad: 你確定要將 {0} 除名嗎？
Japanese: 本当に{0}を追放しますか？
Danish: Er du sikker på, at du vil smide {0} ud af klanen?
Dutch: Weet je zeker dat je {0} eruit wilt zetten?
Norwegian: Er du sikker på at du vil sparke ut {0}?
Portuguese: Tem certeza de que quer expulsar {0}?

English_Translator: Your first equipment will be available at stage 55. Collect equipment to make you more powerful and customize your look.
English: Your first equipment will be available at stage 55. Collect equipment to make you more powerful and customize your look.
ChineseTrad: 你可在第 55 關獲得第一個裝備。收集裝備來使自己更強大並自訂外觀。
ChineseSimp: 你的第一件装备将在第 55 关可用。收集装备会让你更加强大，并能定制你的外观。
Japanese: 最初の装備が手に入るのはステージ55です。装備を集めて自分を強化し、外見をカスタマイズしましょう。
Korean: 첫 번째 장비는 스테이지 55에서 얻을 수 있습니다. 장비를 수집해 더 강력해지고 외관도 입맛대로 변경하세요.
Danish: Dit første udstyr bliver tilgængeligt på niveau 55. Saml udstyr for at blive stærkere og tilpasse dit udseende.
Dutch: Je eerste uitrusting is beschikbaar op stadium 55. Verzamel uitrusting om sterker te worden en je uiterlijk aan te passen.
French: Ton premier équipement sera disponible au secteur 55. Récupère de l'équipement pour gagner en puissance et personnaliser ton aspect.
German: Deine erste Ausrüstung ist ab Level 55 verfügbar. Sammle Ausrüstung, damit du stärker wirst und dein Aussehen ändern kannst.
Italian: Il tuo primo equipaggiamento sarà disponibile al livello 55. Raccogli equipaggiamento per diventare più potente e personalizzare il tuo aspetto.
Norwegian: Det første utstyret vil være tilgjengelig på brett 55. Samle utstyr for å bli mektigere og tilpasse utseendet ditt.
Russian: Ваше первое снаряжение станет доступным на этапе 55. Собирайте снаряжение, чтобы увеличить свою мощь и сменить облик.
Spanish: Tu primera pieza de equipo estará disponible en la fase 55. Recoge equipo para incrementar tu potencia y personalizar tu aspecto.
Swedish: Din första utrustning blir tillgänglig på bana 55. Samla utrustning för att bli starkare och få anpassa ditt utseende.
Turkish: İlk ekipmanın 55. aşamada kullanılabilecek. Daha güçlü olmak ve görünümünü kişiselleştirmek için ekipman topla.
Portuguese: Seu primeiro equipamento estará disponível na fase 55. Colete equipamentos para ficar mais poderoso e personalizar seu visual.

English_Translator: You failed to defeat the boss in time...
English: You failed to defeat the boss in time...
ChineseTrad: 你沒有擊敗老闆的時間...
ChineseSimp: 你没有击败老板的时间...
Japanese: あなたは時間内にボスを倒すことができませんでした...
Korean: 당신은 시간에 보스를 격파하는 데 실패했습니다 ...
Danish: Du undlod at besejre boss i tiden ...
Dutch: Je hebt gefaald om de baas te verslaan in de tijd ...
French: Vous avez omis de vaincre le boss dans le temps ...
German: Sie konnte den Chef in der Zeit zu besiegen ...
Italian: Non siete riusciti a sconfiggere il boss nel tempo ...
Norwegian: Du klarte å beseire sjefen i tid ...
Russian: Вы не смогли победить босса вовремя ...
Spanish: Usted no pudo derrotar al jefe en el tiempo ...
Swedish: Du misslyckades med att besegra chefen i tid ...
Turkish: Sen zamanında patronu yenmek için başarısız oldu ...
Portuguese: Você não conseguiu derrotar o chefe no tempo ...

English_Translator: You can try again by tapping the Fight Boss button. Don't forget to upgrade your Heroes and come back when you are stronger!
English: You can try again by tapping the Fight Boss button. Don't forget to upgrade your Heroes and come back when you are stronger!
ChineseTrad: 您可以通過點擊打BOSS按鈕再試一次。不要忘記升級你的英雄回來當你更強！
ChineseSimp: 您可以通过点击打BOSS按钮再试一次。不要忘记升级你的英雄回来当你更强！
Japanese: あなたはファイトボスボタンをタップしてもう一度試すことができます。あなたのヒーローをアップグレードして、あなたをより強くしているときに戻ってくることを忘れてはいけません！
Korean: 당신은 싸움 보스 버튼을 눌러 다시 시도 할 수 있습니다. 당신의 영웅을 업그레이드하고 강한 때 돌아올 것을 잊지 마세요!
Danish: Du kan prøve igen ved at trykke på knappen Fight Boss. Glem ikke at opgradere dine helte og komme tilbage, når du er stærkere!
Dutch: U kunt het opnieuw proberen door te tikken op de Fight Boss knop. Vergeet niet om je helden te upgraden en kom terug als je sterker bent!
French: Vous pouvez essayer de nouveau en appuyant sur le bouton combat de boss. Ne pas oublier de mettre à niveau vos Héros et revenir quand vous êtes plus fort!
German: Sie können es erneut versuchen, indem Sie den Kampf Boss-Taste tippen. Vergessen Sie nicht, Ihre Helden zu aktualisieren und kommen zurück, wenn Sie stärker sind!
Italian: Si può provare di nuovo toccando il pulsante boss. Non dimenticare di aggiornare i vostri Eroi e tornare quando si è più forte!
Norwegian: Du kan prøve på nytt ved å trykke på Fight Boss-knappen. Ikke glem å oppgradere dine helter og komme tilbake når du er sterkere!
Russian: Вы можете попробовать еще раз, нажав на кнопку Boss Fight. Не забудьте обновить героев и вернуться, когда вы сильнее!
Spanish: Puede intentarlo de nuevo pulsando el botón de lucha contra el jefe. No se olvide de actualizar sus héroes y volver cuando usted es más fuerte!
Swedish: Du kan försöka igen genom att trycka på Fight Boss knappen. Glöm inte att uppgradera dina hjältar och komma tillbaka när du är starkare!
Turkish: Sen Dövüş Boss düğmesine dokunarak tekrar deneyebilirsiniz. Heroes yükseltme ve daha güçlü olduğunda geri gelmek unutmayın!
Portuguese: Você pode tentar novamente tocando no botão Boss Fight. Não se esqueça de atualizar seus heróis e voltar quando você é mais forte!

English_Translator: WOAH! You just won a tournament! Maybe it's time to buy some stuff to celebrate!
English: WOAH! You just won a tournament! Maybe it's time to buy some stuff to celebrate!

English_Translator: Congratulations! You and your clan is growing stronger and stronger!
English: Congratulations! You and your clan is growing stronger and stronger!

English_Translator: Welcome! You know, I've always wondered about the other Great Bears and what they do. Do you think there are other bear stores around?
English: Welcome! You know, I've always wondered about the other Great Bears and what they do. Do you think there are other bear stores around?

English_Translator: Welcome! Hey Hero, some odd people have been coming into the store lately, they looked kinda familiar. I'll tell you about it when you have some time.
English: Welcome! Hey Hero, some odd people have been coming into the store lately, they looked kinda familiar. I'll tell you about it when you have some time.

English_Translator: Welcome! I just managed to nab two very intricate daggers from a recent customer! I wonder who their previous owner was. Maybe a ninja! Or was it a samurai?
English: Welcome! I just managed to nab two very intricate daggers from a recent customer! I wonder who their previous owner was. Maybe a ninja! Or was it a samurai?

English_Translator: Welcome! The greatest store to ever bear arms!
English: Welcome! The greatest store to ever bear arms!

English_Translator: Welcome! I'm trying to replicate a famous staff that can manipulate flame. Do you think it's easy to do? Stories say a powerful sorcerer once used it.
English: Welcome! I'm trying to replicate a famous staff that can manipulate flame. Do you think it's easy to do? Stories say a powerful sorcerer once used it.

English_Translator: Welcome! I'm even nice to the Nomadic people who are always so difficult. I think they're descended from those people…. What were they called again? Valrunes?
English: Welcome! I'm even nice to the Nomadic people who are always so difficult. I think they're descended from those people…. What were they called again? Valrunes?

English_Translator: Welcome! Today I managed to get my hands on a set of beautiful Golden armour. I heard a Valkyrie once wore it into battle. Or was it a human blessed by the Valkyrie? I forget…
English: Welcome! Today I managed to get my hands on a set of beautiful Golden armour. I heard a Valkyrie once wore it into battle. Or was it a human blessed by the Valkyrie? I forget…

English_Translator: Welcome! The beary dependable store with all the latest goods!
English: Welcome! The beary dependable store with all the latest goods!

English_Translator: Welcome! I played a strange wooden game today that was supposed to move all on it's own. I was told a great hero once used this technique to see into the future. Do you think it's true?
English: Welcome! I played a strange wooden game today that was supposed to move all on it's own. I was told a great hero once used this technique to see into the future. Do you think it's true?

English_Translator: Welcome! I'm so nervous; a member of the Terrible family is coming to visit today. They're looking for a missing book filled with the secrets of the noble families. I hope I can help them find it.
English: Welcome! I'm so nervous a member of the Terrible family is coming to visit today. They're looking for a missing book filled with the secrets of the noble families. I hope I can help them find it.

English_Translator: Welcome! Do you know what a leopard is? I came across a dress made from this creature. It's said to have once been worn by a powerful and free spirited mage.
English: Welcome! Do you know what a leopard is? I came across a dress made from this creature. It's said to have once been worn by a powerful and free spirited mage.

English_Translator: Welcome! There's been an odd rumbling of sorts from the Knights of Mini. They're short in numbers ... bwahaha sorry that was a bad joke. But seriously, they're slowly disappearing.
English: Welcome! There's been an odd rumbling of sorts from the Knights of Mini. They're short in numbers ... bwahaha sorry that was a bad joke. But seriously, they're slowly disappearing.

English_Translator: Welcome! The friendliest store you could ever walk into. Ouch!
English: Welcome! The friendliest store you could ever walk into. Ouch!

English_Translator: Welcome! When I was a small cub, I heard stories about a famous blacksmith.  Someday I'll get my paws on one of their legendary weapons for the store.
English: Welcome! When I was a small cub, I heard stories about a famous blacksmith.  Someday I'll get my paws on one of their legendary weapons for the store.

English_Translator: Welcome! Are you fond of interesting and intricate blueprints? Today I acquired a very rare set of blueprints from a merchant.
English: Welcome! Are you fond of interesting and intricate blueprints? Today I acquired a very rare set of blueprints from a merchant.

English_Translator: Welcome! Those blueprints I found are supposedly a weapon designed by an innovative pair known for their many interesting creations.
English: Welcome! Those blueprints I found are supposedly a weapon designed by an innovative pair known for their many interesting creations.

English_Translator: Welcome! I heard whispers of a mythical mace owned by a very powerful lord. I'm going to see if I can make a trade for it later today!
English: Welcome! I heard whispers of a mythical mace owned by a very powerful lord. I'm going to see if I can make a trade for it later today!

English_Translator: Welcome! They say the owner of that mace I traded for was particularily brutal when punishing those that disobeyed him.
English: Welcome! They say the owner of that mace I traded for was particularily brutal when punishing those that disobeyed him.

English_Translator: Welcome! The next best thing to a shopping maul!
English: Welcome! The next best thing to a shopping maul!

English_Translator: Welcome! A man with a lion was in earlier and I could bearly understand them.
English: Welcome! A man with a lion was in earlier and I could bearly understand them.

English_Translator: Welcome! Who befriends a lion? Apparently, some shepherd's daughter was once great friends with a goat.
English: Welcome! Who befriends a lion? Apparently, some shepherd's daughter was once great friends with a goat.

English_Translator: Welcome! You will not believe the day I've had.
English: Welcome! You will not believe the day I've had.

English_Translator: Welcome! Hero! You just missed an elf from the Noble tribe. They were carrying a staff with a green gem.
English: Welcome! Hero! You just missed an elf from the Noble tribe. They were carrying a staff with a green gem.

English_Translator: Welcome! I asked if I could buy a staff from that elf but they said that they couldn't part with such a precious weapon. They said it belonged to a hero.
English: Welcome! I asked if I could buy a staff from that elf but they said that they couldn't part with such a precious weapon. They said it belonged to a hero.

English_Translator: Welcome! Hero do you have any bread on you? I met a giant blue bird that was part of a coven. Birds like bread right?
English: Welcome! Hero do you have any bread on you? I met a giant blue bird that was part of a coven. Birds like bread right?

English_Translator: Welcome! That bird was worn out form her search for a particular grave. I hope she's okay.
English: Welcome! That bird was worn out form her search for a particular grave. I hope she's okay.

English_Translator: Welcome! We're home to a large variety of weapons that I've managed to collect from some pretty interesting folks.
English: Welcome! We're home to a large variety of weapons that I've managed to collect from some pretty interesting folks.

English_Translator: Welcome! It's so odd, some people from Luft came in today. They said something about making their master's vision come true.
English: Welcome! It's so odd, some people from Luft came in today. They said something about making their master's vision come true.

English_Translator: Welcome! Those people from Luft seem quite determined ever since a child with visions was born recently.
English: Welcome! Those people from Luft seem quite determined ever since a child with visions was born recently.

English_Translator: Welcome! I think my store is getting really popular. The master administrator came in to visit.
English: Welcome! I think my store is getting really popular. The master administrator came in to visit.

English_Translator: Welcome! The administrator is making a guest list for some event; A hero's welcome or something. I wonder who the guest of honour is.
English: Welcome! The administrator is making a guest list for some event; A hero's welcome or something. I wonder who the guest of honour is.

English_Translator: Welcome! One second! Bear with me!
English: Welcome! One second! Bear with me!

English_Translator: Welcome! I remember this one time I was crossing a bridge and saw some old-looking marking on the side.
English: Welcome! I remember this one time I was crossing a bridge and saw some old-looking marking on the side.

English_Translator: Welcome! Ever seen markings of a name that started with an S? I wonder they what they mean.
English: Welcome! Ever seen markings of a name that started with an S? I wonder they what they mean.

English_Translator: Welcome! Lately, I've been trying my hand at using an enchanted weapon. It's not going so great.
English: Welcome! Lately, I've been trying my hand at using an enchanted weapon. It's not going so great.

English_Translator: Welcome! I think only the creator can use some of these weapons. Some great Enchantor probably.
English: Welcome! I think only the creator can use some of these weapons. Some great Enchantor probably.

English_Translator: Welcome! Does this helmet look good on me? I'm hoping that it will give me the power of foresight.
English: Welcome! Does this helmet look good on me? I'm hoping that it will give me  the power of foresight.

English_Translator: Welcome! A near immortal once used a helmet like this to amplify her powers. Do you think she was related to the Great Seer?
English: Welcome! A near immortal once used a helmet like this to amplify her powers. Do you think she was related to the Great Seer?

English_Translator: Welcome! We offer whittling classes on the side.
English: Welcome! We offer whittling classes on the side.

English_Translator: Welcome! A woman from some society dropped off this bow today. It looks like it's seen many battles. I can think of a certain archer who would really like this!
English: Welcome! A woman from some society dropped off this bow today. It looks like it's seen many battles. I can think of a certain archer who would really like this!

English_Translator: Welcome! A professor was just here earlier looking for some research material on the Titans. He got very distant when I asked about his apprentices.
English: Welcome! A professor was just here earlier looking for some research material on the Titans. He got very distant when I asked about his apprentices.

English_Translator: Welcome! I've been trying to find spare parts for this odd drill called The Poker. Some travelling merchant sold it to me.
English: Welcome! I've been trying to find spare parts for this odd drill called The Poker. Some travelling merchant sold it to me.

English_Translator: Welcome! I heard a castle filled with very precious artifacts once had a powerful giant protecting it. I want artifacts!
Notes: Teeny Tom, Keeper of the Castle
English: Welcome! I heard a castle filled with very precious artifacts once had a powerful giant protecting it. I want artifacts!

English_Translator: Welcome! I'm thinking of applying as a castle keeper.
English: Welcome! I'm thinking of applying as a castle keeper.

English_Translator: Welcome! I tried to go to see where the old hero once worked but the guards got upset and made me spend the night.
English: Welcome! I tried to go to see where the old hero once worked but the guards got upset and made me spend the night.

English_Translator: Welcome! I spent the night in a dungeon.
English: Welcome! I spent the night in a dungeon.

English_Translator: Welcome! Something amazing arrived at the store today, an old painted skull.
English: Welcome! Something amazing arrived at the store today, an old painted skull.

English_Translator: Welcome! That old skull was found in Yort. I think I know someone who would really like this don't you think so?
English: Welcome! That old skull was found in Yort. I think I know someone who would really like this don't you think so?

English_Translator: Welcome! One of the Nomadic people was visiting today.
English: Welcome! One of the Nomadic people was visiting today.

English_Translator: Welcome! Those Nomads were telling me about their Queen and a hero called the Banisher. No wonder their champion the Frost Demon is so fearsome.
English: Welcome! Those Nomads were telling me about their Queen and a hero called the Banisher. No wonder their champion the Frost Demon is so fearsome.

English_Translator: Welcome! I think my eyes are playing tricks on me.
English: Welcome! I think my eyes are playing tricks on me.

English_Translator: Welcome! I think I saw some children and piglets training for battle. Do you think they're somehow related to that legendary Hero?
English: Welcome! I think I saw some children and piglets training for battle. Do you think they're somehow related to that legendary Hero?

English_Translator: Welcome! I met an old lion that was roaring about some tamer. I bet his name was Charles or something.
English: Welcome! I met an old lion that was roaring about some tamer. I bet his name was Charles or something.

English_Translator: Welcome! You know one day I want to just spend time in the Dragon's clearing.
English: Welcome! You know one day I want to just spend time in the Dragon's clearing.

English_Translator: Welcome! I've read that the winged Dino and its tamer Mo... uhh something used to live in the clearing happily.
English: Welcome! I've read that the winged Dino and its tamer Mo... uhh something used to live in the clearing happily.

English_Translator: Welcome! I wonder if any of the dragons are related to the Dino?
English: Welcome! I wonder if any of the dragons are related to the Dino?

English_Translator: Welcome! Take a look at this map. Weird eh?
English: Welcome! Take a look at this map. Weird eh?

English_Translator: Welcome! I heard that this leads to a place where a very dangerous witch with a wooden face used to live.
English: Welcome! I heard that this leads to a place where a very dangerous witch with a wooden face used to live.

English_Translator: Welcome! People say the witch was said to have disappeared into a void of Titans during a great battle.
English: Welcome! People say the witch was said to have disappeared into a void of Titans during a great battle.

English_Translator: Welcome! It's been unbearably busy today!
English: Welcome! It's been unbearably busy today!

English_Translator: Welcome! I'm always surprised when I meet Fay folk.
English: Welcome! I'm always surprised when I meet Fay folk.

English_Translator: Welcome! The Fay folk were in town performing a ritual to celebrate and mourn one of their Heroes: the rebel who once fought against the darkness and protected the world.
English: Welcome! The Fay folk were in town performing a ritual to celebrate and mourn one of their Heroes: the rebel who once fought against the darkness and protected the world.

English_Translator: Welcome! This is serious; a mask of a mythological creature was brought in today.
English: Welcome! This is serious; a mask of a mythological creature was brought in today.

English_Translator: Welcome! That creature was the Ballfire or something like that… A powerful creature that perished fighting against the Titans.
English: Welcome! That creature was the Ballfire or something like that… A powerful creature that perished fighting against the Titans.

English_Translator: Welcome! I can't believe someone so powerful was defeated, the monster that defeated them must be incredibly powerful.
English: Welcome! I can't believe someone so powerful was defeated, the monster that defeated them must be incredibly powerful.

English_Translator: The bear shopkeeper is busy at the moment, will be available soon! Try again later!
Notes: The bear shopkeeper is busy at the moment, will be available soon! Try again later!

Danish: Fyld din manna helt op igen
Italian: Ricarica interamente la tua riserva di mana.

English_Translator: Thank you for submitting a ticket. You should receive an automated email shortly. if not, try submitting a ticket at {0}
Notes: {0} is the support website URL, http://www.gamehive.com/support
English: Thank you for submitting a ticket. You should receive an automated email shortly. if not, try submitting a ticket at {0}
ChineseTrad: 感謝你提交問題。你應該很快就會收到一封自動回覆郵件。若未收到，請嘗試在 {0} 提交問題
ChineseSimp: 感谢你提交客户服务单。你应该会很快收到一封自动发送的邮件，如果没收到，请尝试在 {0} 提交客户服务单
Japanese: チケットの送信ありがとうございます。すぐに自動返信メールが届くはずです。届かない場合は{0}でチケットの送信を試みてください。
Korean: 티켓을 제출해 주셔서 감사합니다. 곧 자동 응답 이메일을 받게 됩니다. 받지 못하는 경우, {0}에서 티켓을 제출해 보세요.
Danish: Tak, fordi du har sendt os en besked. Du bør modtage en e-mail inden længe. Ellers kan du sende os en besked på {0}
Dutch: Bedankt voor het indienen van een ticket. Je ontvangt binnenkort een geautomatiseerde e-mail. Als dit niet zo is, probeer dan een ticket in te dienen bij {0}
French: Merci d'avoir envoyé un ticket. Tu devrais recevoir un e-mail automatique sous peu. Si ce n'est pas le cas, essaie d'envoyer un ticket à {0}
German: Vielen Dank, dass du ein Ticket eingesendet hast. Du solltest bald eine automatische E-Mail erhalten. Wenn nicht, dann versuche bitte erneut unter {0} ein Ticket einzusenden.
Italian: Grazie per aver inviato un ticket. Dovresti ricevere un'e-mail automatica a breve. Se non dovesse essere così, invia un ticket su {0}
Norwegian: Takk for at du sendte inn denne saken. Du vil snart få en automatisk bekreftelse på e-post. Hvis ikke prøver du å sende inn saken på {0}
Russian: Спасибо, что обратились к нам. Скоро вы автоматически получите письмо. Если письмо не придет, отправьте запрос на {0}
Spanish: Gracias por enviar una incidencia. En breve recibirás un correo electrónico automático. Si no lo recibes, prueba a enviar una incidencia a {0}.
Swedish: Tack för att du lade till ett ärende. Du bör få ett automatiskt mejl inom kort. Försök annars att lägga till ett ärende på {0}.
Turkish: Bilet gönderdiğin için teşekkürler. Kısa süre sonra otomatik bir e-posta alacaksın. Almazsan {0} aracılığıyla bir bilet göndermeyi dene.
Portuguese: Obrigado por abrir um chamado. Você deve receber um email automático em breve. Se não receber, experimente abrir um chamado em {0}.

English_Translator: It looks like there was an error submitting your ticket, try submitting again. If that still doesn't work, try submitting a ticket at {0}
Notes: {0} is the support website URL, http://www.gamehive.com/support
English: It looks like there was an error submitting your ticket, try submitting again. If that still doesn't work, try submitting a ticket at {0}
ChineseTrad: 提交你的問題時似乎發生錯誤，請再提交一次。若仍無法成攻，請嘗試在 {0} 提交問題
ChineseSimp: 似乎提交你的客户服务单时出现了错误，请尝试重新提交。如果依旧出现错误，请尝试在 {0} 提交客户服务单
Japanese: チケット送信時にエラーが発生したようです。もう一度送信してください。それでもうまくいかない場合は、{0}でチケットの送信を試みてください。
Korean: 티켓 제출 중 오류가 발생한 것 같습니다. 다시 제출해 보세요. 여전히 오류가 발생할 경우, {0}에서 티켓을 제출해 보세요.
Danish: Vi kunne ikke indsende din besked. Prøv at sende den igen. Hvis det stadig ikke fungerer, kan du sende os en besked på {0}
Dutch: Het lijkt erop dat er een fout is opgetreden bij het indienen van je ticket. Probeer het opnieuw. Als dat nog steeds niet werkt, probeer dan een ticket in te dienen bij {0}
French: Une erreur s'est produite lors de l'envoi de ton ticket. Essaie de l'envoyer à nouveau. Si le problème persiste, essaie d'envoyer un ticket à {0}
German: Anscheinend gab es bei der Einsendung deines Tickets ein Problem. Versuche es bitte erneut. Sollte dies nicht funktionieren, dann versuche bitte unter {0} ein Ticket einzusenden.
Italian: Sembra che si sia verificato un errore durante l'invio del tuo ticket. Prova a inviarlo di nuovo. Se non dovesse ancora funzionare, prova a inviare un ticket su {0}
Norwegian: Det ser ut til at det oppsto en feil under innsending av saken. Prøv på nytt. Hvis det fremdeles ikke fungerer, prøver du å sende inn saken på {0}
Russian: Похоже, во время отправки запроса произошла ошибка. Попробуйте еще раз. Если это не сработало, отправьте запрос на {0}
Spanish: Parece que se ha producido un error al enviar la incidencia. Inténtalo de nuevo. Si sigues teniendo problemas, prueba a enviar una incidencia a {0}.
Swedish: Det uppstod visst ett fel när ditt ärende skulle läggas till. Försök igen. Om det fortfarande inte fungerar kan du försöka lägga till ett ärende på {0}.
Turkish: Biletini gönderirken bir hata oluştu, lütfen tekrar dene. Bu da işe yaramazsa {0} aracılığıyla bir bilet göndermeyi dene.
Portuguese: Parece que houve um erro ao abrir seu chamado, experimente abrir novamente. Se isso também não funcionar, experimente abrir um chamado em {0}.

English_Translator: Please describe the issue you're having in the comment box.
English: Please describe the issue you're having in the comment box.
ChineseTrad: 請在意見箱描述你遇到的問題。
ChineseSimp: 请在说明框内描述你所遇到的问题。
Japanese: 不具合の内容をコメント欄に記入してください。
Korean: 발생하고 있는 문제를 코멘트 상자에 서술해 주세요.
Dutch: Beschrijf het probleem dat je hebt in het opmerkingenvak.
French: Décris ton problème dans la case Commentaire.
German: Beschreibe bitte das Problem, das du im Kommentarfeld hast.
Italian: Descrivi i problemi che hai riscontrato nello spazio per i commenti.
Russian: Пожалуйста, опишите проблему в поле для комментариев.
Spanish: Describe el problema que tienes en el recuadro de comentarios.
Swedish: Vänligen beskriv ditt problem i kommentarsrutan.
Turkish: Lütfen yorum kutusunda yaşadığın sorunu açıkla.
Portuguese: Descreva o problema que está tendo na caixa de comentários.
